Apple does not have a fix for this but is working to fix it with the next update. The headphones can be connected manually, it just won’t connect automatically as a new device.I received my beats headphones today. These headphones are beautiful. The sound quality and comfort is great so far, as I’ve only had them for a day. However, one of the features that is advertised is the ease of pairing. The headphones that I received will not automatically pair to my iPhone. My iPhone has the latest update. And my AirPods do automatically pair, so I don’t think it is a device issue. The Beats do show up on my phone as if it’s trying to automatically pair, but it looks like it won’t actually pair. After a quick google search, I have tried resetting the headphones, and turning my phone on and off. Still won’t pair. I followed the Amazon link to the manufacturer, which is Apple, and it does not list Beats as a device that they can help with. I’m having difficulty finding any technical support. I’m greatly disappointed and frustrated, as “ease” of pairing” was one of the selling points for me. Sadly, I’m considering returning because for the price of these headphones, I think they should do what is advertised.

product_name: Beats Solo 4 - Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Apple & Android Compatible, Up to 50 Hours of Battery Life - Slate Blue
description: I did not like these and I returned them to Amazon. These were designed for low bass listening and do not have a good range. Evidently when studying these, I learned that they were not an upgrade to the beat solo 3's but simply a different kind of headphone for people who do not like heavy bass. I do. It's not that they don't have good clear sound, it is that they sound very flat because of the low bass response. I go to a lot of concerts and I like my music loud and proud. These are not the headphones for me. I returned them and got beat solo 3's which have a very heavy bass response. Be aware that these headphones cannot be manipulated properly even with an equalizer on your source. It will not bring up the bass enough. If you do not care about the bass, then try these headphones out and see if you like them. They are certainly high quality and crystal-clear. I need a heavy bass and so they are not for me.

product_name: Beats Solo 4 - Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Apple & Android Compatible, Up to 50 Hours of Battery Life - Slate Blue
description: Total honesty; you’re better off buying a pair of AirPods Pro OR paying the extra money for the over-ear Beats… I have had a few pairs of Beats headphones. 3 on ear style and 1 pair of PowerBeats Pro… If you like on-ear headphones these are pretty good! But I prefer the previous generations as they had volume and track control from both sides not just the left one like these.The color is beautiful and it’s probably my favorite thing about these to be honest. Sound quality is good, but despite the high price point; they don’t have noise cancellation. And It could just be me… but these seem to cause a bit more “soreness” in my ears during and for some time after wearing them -for a relatively short period of time as well-.These are definitely a pair of headphones to avoid if you’re even slightly sensitive to that. It keeps me from wearing them as often as I would like to for what I spent.Another thing that I have noticed is that they seem to be more durable than the previous generations and do hold a charge somewhat longer. Although this gen does not have the led indicators on the side of the ear cup to indicate charging progress and what is left in the battery. Just a single light this time to tell you which mode they’re in and whether they are currently on.

product_name: Beats Solo 4 - Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Apple & Android Compatible, Up to 50 Hours of Battery Life - Slate Blue
description: I have always been one to ignore Beats headphones, but recently, I decided to try a pair of the Beats Studio Pros because they were on an irresistible sale. I was more impressed with them than I thought, even with some of their shortcomings.Which is why I decided to give the new Solo 4s a try. For me, these simply didn't have enough for me to keep them in my collection, particularly given that I own the Studio Pros.Recently, I have become a fan of on-ear headphones (as distinct from over-ear). I own the Skullcandy Riff 2, the Sony WH-CH520, and the JBL Live 670. The Solo 4s are the only ones I've returned. And it's not because they were so offensive or horrible; they simply didn't add anything to my collection.First of all, the clamping force was inordinately tight for my head. Normally, this doesn't bother me. But these simply were too uncomfortable from the moment I put them on, and they only got worse the longer I wore them.Then there was the sound. Like I said, I own the Beats Studio Pros, and have an appreciation for what they are and what they do. Even though they don't have the ability to be EQed, which I prefer, I like them in and of themselves and enjoy the sound they provide. The Solo 4s are similar in that they are a what-you-get-is-what-you-get sound. In this case, however, I found myself wishing for an equalizer. They sounded thin and harsh, not full like the Studio Pros.When I compared them to my other Bluetooth headphones, I couldn't justify keeping them in the collection. To be fair, there was a lot to like about them: the iPhone and Android compatibility, the folding design, the carrying case, and the look/style. However, the comfort and sound were just too much of a negative for me.I can see that many people will like these a lot, and I'm glad. They fill a niche and they fill it well. But for me, there are just too many other options I like better.

product_name: Beats Solo 4 - Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Apple & Android Compatible, Up to 50 Hours of Battery Life - Slate Blue
description: The sound quality of Beats has always been a little above average.. not the greatest, but not horrible.  Not as good as Sennheiser, but far better than Skull Candy.  The Solo 3 cans were good value travelers.. worth listening to on the road, but if they got broken or stolen you wouldn’t die of a broken heart (or wallet).  Sadly, this new Solo 4 introduced some size changes.. the most egregious of which is smaller ear cups.  They’re now painful to wear.. even my youngest daughter and her tiny head can’t find comfort in these things.  Had to send them back.

product_name: Beats Solo 4 - Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Apple & Android Compatible, Up to 50 Hours of Battery Life - Slate Blue
description: I had high hopes for this item.  Had great reviews.I really liked the sound.  It's not in the 'top notch' category, but it's excellent for the price.  The battery life is really incredible....40+ hours...wow.  Although I wish I had read the fine print, and assumed that most Apple type products have the 'sound through' option, or touching a button and being able to hear externally.  This one's on me for not checking.The only issue (a big one), is that these are EXTREMELY uncomfortable on your ears for more than a short amount of time.  I wore them for about 2 hours on a plane to watch a movie, and kept fidgeting with them for comfort.  When I arrived, on the bus trip to the destination, I really thought that I had an ear infection from how achy one of my ears was.  It faded after an hour or so, but the cushions are so small that they can only sit on top of the ears, not around them.  Just didn't work for me.I tried to give them to one of my daughters with smaller ears, and she refused within 15 minutes as she could tell immediately that they would hurt over time.This is just an FYI for anyone who might consider these.  Short term, awesome, long term, no no.  My advice is that if you are in the market for headphones, save your pennies for the higher end over the ears.

product_name: Beats Solo 4 - Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Apple & Android Compatible, Up to 50 Hours of Battery Life - Slate Blue
description: These do not perform as well as apple AirPods. They are only slightly compatible with iPhone  they stay connected even when off your head.They do not work well for phone calls. There is an echo of your voice. Also if you walk and talk you can hear your footsteps in your ears with each step….thud thud. They also slip off my head when moving around

product_name: Beats Solo 4 - Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Apple & Android Compatible, Up to 50 Hours of Battery Life - Slate Blue
description: They are very good when they work. Sometimes only one side of the headphones work and you have to plug the headphones in to get the one side to work again. But when they do work they are amazing, they are loud, comfortable, and fit well, they just aren’t very reliable.

product_name: Beats Solo 4 - Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Apple & Android Compatible, Up to 50 Hours of Battery Life - Slate Blue
description: The sound is good, it seems like mic for conference calls is good too, and battery life. But they are not comfortable at all. After wearing them for 15 - 20 minutes my ears start to hurt, which didn't happen with other headphones I've had before.

product_name: Beats Solo 4 - Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones, Apple & Android Compatible, Up to 50 Hours of Battery Life - Slate Blue
description: Good sound, but you can't wear them for more than a half hour without taking them off and rubbing your numb ears back into existence. Just not enough padding around phones, and the ear cup isn't big enough for an adult.

product_name: LISEN Retractable Car Charger [69W USB C Car Charger Adapter] iPhone 16 Car Charger Fast Charging, Fast Charging Car Charger, Type C Retractable Car Charger for iPhone 16 15 14 13 12, Samsung, Gray

product_name: LISEN Retractable Car Charger [69W USB C Car Charger Adapter] iPhone 16 Car Charger Fast Charging, Fast Charging Car Charger, Type C Retractable Car Charger for iPhone 16 15 14 13 12, Samsung, Gray

product_name: LISEN Retractable Car Charger [69W USB C Car Charger Adapter] iPhone 16 Car Charger Fast Charging, Fast Charging Car Charger, Type C Retractable Car Charger for iPhone 16 15 14 13 12, Samsung, Gray

product_name: LISEN Retractable Car Charger [69W USB C Car Charger Adapter] iPhone 16 Car Charger Fast Charging, Fast Charging Car Charger, Type C Retractable Car Charger for iPhone 16 15 14 13 12, Samsung, Gray

product_name: LISEN Retractable Car Charger [69W USB C Car Charger Adapter] iPhone 16 Car Charger Fast Charging, Fast Charging Car Charger, Type C Retractable Car Charger for iPhone 16 15 14 13 12, Samsung, Gray
description: Update (Oct 2024):  The product still works great, still gets hot, but no damage to my phone. And worth noting, the Seller did reach out to me to troubleshoot and / or offer a refund.  All to say, appreciate the customer service on this one. Moving my star rating from 3 to 4 due to high customer service and that I’ve used this quite a few times now and my phone performance is strong! ***This is a huge help because I drive a very old car with limited charging capabilities.  That said, the iPhone plug gets extremely hot rather quickly.  So I use it to charge up my phone but I need to keep an eye on it and take it off when it starts to feel a little too risky. Even my phone gets more hot than normal. Hopefully it’s not harming the iPhone battery. Really handy to have a charging option when doing long car rides tho!

product_name: LISEN Retractable Car Charger [69W USB C Car Charger Adapter] iPhone 16 Car Charger Fast Charging, Fast Charging Car Charger, Type C Retractable Car Charger for iPhone 16 15 14 13 12, Samsung, Gray

Tough to try and pull them out (plug is too small) to connect to your phone for charging and the same when trying to unplug the cord from the phone your phone. Good idea but could use improvement.

product_name: LISEN Retractable Car Charger [69W USB C Car Charger Adapter] iPhone 16 Car Charger Fast Charging, Fast Charging Car Charger, Type C Retractable Car Charger for iPhone 16 15 14 13 12, Samsung, Gray

Problem was, when I pulled it out, it damaged the cars lighter and Infiniti wanted$ 350 to fix it.Update: Customer service reached out to me and offered to replace. product_name: LISEN Retractable Car Charger [69W USB C Car Charger Adapter] iPhone 16 Car Charger Fast Charging, Fast Charging Car Charger, Type C Retractable Car Charger for iPhone 16 15 14 13 12, Samsung, Gray
