product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: We received the watch and it charged once and then the charger quite working.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: Great quality. Get the new Apple Watch 9 instead. Ultra is overkill

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: I purchased this watch back in July of 2024 for fitness and to replace a faulty series 6 Apple Watch. I thought this product would be more durable as my previous Apple Watch stopped working when I went to Florida for a vacation. I did even get fully submerged and my last Apple Watch bit the dust. The current Apple Watch Ultra 2 already has a huge scratch on the surface from just being used during workouts. I don’t do a whole lot as I work from home so I am uncertain how it scratched so easily. I think I’m done with buying Apple Watches.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: The backtrack feature does not work without iCloud and Apple no longer reads blood oxygen level.For the money it is not work it.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: Comes with a USB-C charger where all my wall outlet chargers, nightstand charger, my computer, vehicles and boat all have the standard USB Plugin. Pull your head out of your...

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: Lesson learned, DO NOT BUY APPLE PRODUCTS on amazon. I was very excited to go my apple watch and when it came, it looked legitimate. However after only a half a day of use, the watch quickly started showing signs of concern. First, there was a constant lag in the touch screen. Then, when trying to connect to my cell service, it was never getting calls as it should. Therefore, I brought the watch to an actual Apple Store for help. Literally while seated working with the IT tech person at Apple, the watch would not stop glitching, they could not figure out why the cell service was not working, and to TOP IT ALL OFF... the watch was on 2% so she plugged in a super charger and placed the watch on to get some charge. Apparently these chargers are supposed to get watches up to a minimum of 50% in 10min. While working with the IT person and waiting we noticed the watch WAS NOT CHARGING AT ALL and ultimately ended up dying and would never turn back on. The watch would not charge and that is when the tech stated it is likely NOT a new watch as advertised and rather a refurbished watch that simply won't work due to a poor refurbish. Apparently this is VERY common with apple products on Amazon so BEWARE. Long story short, I learned my lesson. DO NOT BUY apple products outside of an official Apple Store.<END RANT>Good luck!

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: I like it but I don't have an I-phone to pair I-watch and continue setup . I returned the  item on May 1st and got approved of delivery to the store by UPS on May 6th . Till now not get response and my refund yet .

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: A very ordinary looking watch and actually looks like a cheap plastic watch.Not much to offer other than longer battery life when compared to Apple Watch latest series .By the way, getting a refund on this watch was like pulling teeth

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: Battery life is still not great. Sport functionality is lacking as is user friendly interface. If you want a watch the you can text on, albeit you must have small fingers, then this is for you. For everything else, stick to Garmin.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: I'm absolutely in love with my Apple Watch Ultra 2! As an avid outdoor enthusiast, I need a smartwatch that can keep up with my active lifestyle, and this one delivers.The durable titanium case and toughened sapphire crystal make it perfect for rugged activities like hiking, biking, and swimming. The always-on display is incredibly bright and easy to read even in direct sunlight.I've been using the Action button to quickly access my favorite workout apps and features, and it's a game-changer for my training sessions. The battery life is impressive, and I can easily get through a full day of activity without needing to recharge.The cellular connectivity is a huge plus, allowing me to stay connected and make calls even when I'm far from my phone. The built-in GPS is accurate and reliable, making it perfect for tracking my workouts and exploring new trails.If you're looking for a rugged, durable, and feature-packed smartwatch, I highly recommend the Apple Watch Ultra 2. It's the perfect companion for active individuals who demand the best.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: I like this watch band. I think it is functional and attractive. It is very adjustable. The band can be tighter or loser where it goes through the slot of the watch. It can also be tighter or loser when you hook it. It is slightly stretchy due to the design of the loops to hook through without using elastic(I believe). The material also seems very strong. It is much more adjustable than a standard watch band with holes. The material seems more breathable and less sticky than plastic or leather. The blue looks good with jeans. It is very easy to put on with one hand.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: Loving this watch. The large, bright display. The number of complications. The battery life. I’ve had it a little over a week and think it’s worth every penny of the great deal I got!

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: I'm really happy with the Apple Watch Ultra 2. The battery life is a huge improvement. I am averaging about 3 days on the battery with 1 to 2 hour workouts each day and sleep tracking.  I also like the larger screen, more rugged titanium construction, Alpine strap and increased GPS accuracy.  It's pricy but I plan on keeping this for 5 years, if not longer.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: If you are outdoorsy and can’t give up the Apple ecosystem than this watch is for you. Now if you are a serious runner I highly recommend getting a garmin for performance. That will be my next purchase but this watch is still fantastic. The running data can be slightly off, the lack of being able to upload custom workouts is rather sad, and also Apple is seeking to personally destroy my self confidence by telling me my vo2 max is around ten points lower than my true lab tested vo2 max. However, the build is fantastic, the texting function is superb, accessibility is glorious, and sleep tracking data is just the best.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: I had an SE watch and I was becoming unsatisfied that it would be at 40% by the time I got home in the evening from work. What would happen if I was out late? I would have a dead watch. And since I use the watch at the gym as well as apple maps, the battery would go quickly.So I decided to get the Ultra 2. Could I justify buying an $800 watch just for longer battery? I was iffy at first, but I am SO grateful that I pulled the trigger. Not only is this thing a beast with battery life, I am finding more features that I didn't even know it had.First, when I ping my phone using my watch, a numerical distance pops up on the watch face and tells me how many feet I am away from the phone. And as I walk around my house, the numbers go down when I'm closing in on my phone. This is such a nice little feature (maybe for those who are in a loud house and can't hear the ping, or if it's under the couch cushions and the sound is muffled. I have this exact feature  when I'm using my phone to locate my Airpods. I'm very glad they added it to the watch.Additionally, the display is amazing. The keyboard looks so much sharper and more crisp when texting, and the size allows for additional complications. I can see the weather, the high and the low, chance of rain, time and date, battery life, etc. all in one glance.I'm even excited to use the Wayfinder feature! If you are hiking and you see a waterfall or a bridge, you can mark it and pin the location. You can then basically build a map of all the things you see, so you can loop back to it, or if your going on a curve, you can say "We're about to loop back towards the old bridge we were just at." You can even use the "Backtrack" feature which will guide you to retrace your steps so you'll never get lost in the woods again.There's a "Where did I park my car?" feature that will guide you back to your car, as well as a "Siren" feature that will begin to emit a loud sound that can be heard in a large radius in case you are in danger or need help.These are only some of the very cool features that are included on the watch.Now, was I worried that going from a 40mm to a 49mm be too much? Yes.IS it too much? NOT AT ALL! I don't think it's too big, and it's not heavy at all. I am very glad I got the watch. I am grateful that I was able to use Affirm for this purchase and only pay $49 a month, otherwise, I would never have been able to get it.(PS - The images wouldn't load, but that's okay)

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: Love the new black titanium Apple Watch Ultra 2!  It is a great smart watch no matter which color you choose. I especially like the ocean band with the black hardware to match the watch. It was really nice to buy it at a discounted price from retail. If you are on the fence, buy it. You won’t be disappointed.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: I owned an apple watch for almost 4 years. After it cracked along the side while I was rock climbing the issue slowly got worse until the watch slowed down and became much less useful. The battery was already kind of dead and it had already seen like 7 years of life total between me and my brother. I have always used it for the amazing exercise tracking, and the ability to listen to music/podcasts on the go without my phone. I upgraded to the Ultra 2 last week, and it was an instant change!!!!!!The battery alone makes the device worthwhile (especially if you use it for exercise and sleep), but I’m finding new use cases every day with the much larger display and veritable trove of options available to me compared to my old hand me down model. The cost is kind of an instant drawback, but if you have always been a fan of the design then I personally think it is worth the money.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: This watch is big and relatively heavy, which is why I took so long to go ahead with the purchase. I have average size wrists, at best, and I was comfortable with the look and feel of my 40mm Series 6.I also balked at the price, but you need to remember it's a titanium body and is also has cellular capability. Plus, there's the Action button and a few other perks not found on the Series 10 and earlier models.Then there's the battery life. I've been wearing mine for 12 hours today and the battery is at 85%.FWIW, I found the Ocean Band to be clunky and the other Apple bands to be even worse. So I ordered the four-pack of Odbeai bands from Amazon and am extremely happy with them. They are at least as good as the original Apple bands, at a fraction of the cost. I have to wonder who at Apple thought it was reasonable to charge $100++ for a silly watch band.

product_name: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Black Ocean Band. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life
description: I'm amazed and impressed with how comfortable this watch is. When I first picked it up, my initial assumption was that because it's quite a bit heavier (and thicker) than what I'm use to, that it would feel bulky, and that it would shift around too much. But the opposite is true, as because of the slightly convex shape of the bottom, and the great stap it comes with, it feels more like it's not even there. Also, much more comfortable to wear sleeping than my old Garmin watch. I also assumed that it would not be comfortable while on bike rides, but again, not the case at all.

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: It works, it’s functional but feels lightweight. Not sure how I feel about keeping it plugged in full time .

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: i got this on oct 13th, its the 15th. i only used the c-type ports and my devices were only actually plugged into the extension cord for maybe a total of 14 hours, so i know i didnt over use it. it completely stopped working this morning. i tried to see if my outlet blew out, plugged it into a different one, still wasnt working. extremely disappointed. now i have to wait a whole week for a new one to come. really hoping this was just a faulty one, because all the other reviews are extremely positive. if you are considering buying this, id definitely just keep in mind that you might end up getting one that stops working very quickly.

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: Purchased this power strip mainly for the C charger port July 20th. As of September 30th the charger ports no longer work. Of course I am out of my return window. I do not recommend this product!

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: I really appreciate the angle of the plug. The braided cord is nice too, but it's a little of a "looser" braid than some cords - not bad though. The fact that you can plug in multiple different types of form factors is really impressive.One issue I  noticed that was surprising to me is that it's not a "fast charger". Using USB-C to USB-C, my phone told me it was a standard charger.

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: The Flat Extension Cord has some useful features, like the flat plug design and the 6-foot length, which makes it convenient for tight spaces and reaching distant outlets. The inclusion of 4 widely spaced outlets and 3 USB ports, including 2 USB-C, is definitely a plus, especially for charging multiple devices simultaneously.However, there are a few drawbacks. The overall build quality feels a bit flimsy, and the cord itself is not as durable as I expected. Additionally, the USB ports charge devices slower than I'd like, which can be frustrating when you're in a hurry. It's a decent power strip for basic use, but it may not hold up well under heavy or frequent use.Overall, it's an okay product for the price, but it could be improved in terms of durability and charging speed.

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: This is a neat extension cord that can easily bring power and charging to a table or countertop. The flat braided cord does feel really premium and durable. It's also very compact, which makes it easy to place as it won't take up too much room. That said, it seems like a couple corners were cut to achieve this design. The most significant one is charging speed - there is no fast charging of any sort, and the 15W total output means you can only charge a phone and maybe something very low-power, such as earbuds. Trying to charge two devices at once or anything power-hungry, such as a power bank, will result in very slow charging. The other compromise to the design is that the placement of the 2-prong outlets makes it so you can't mount it to a table without making these plugs inaccessible to bulkier chargers.So the product itself is very mediocre and not exactly the all-in-one power hub it appears to be. There's also pricing shenanigans going on - at the time of writing, the 5ft version is $40 and the 6ft version is $12 (on "sale" from a list price of $20.) It's an OK cord if you get it at a good price, but before you buy, make sure you know it's limited to standard 5V slow charging, and generally only good for one device at a time.

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: Works great, compact & practical, buy it!

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: Works great.

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: flat plug, lots of outlets, surge protection, what more do you you need?

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: Nothing fancy just a nice quality extension cord. The plug is flat against the wall which is nice and it also includes USB ports in addition to the standard plugs.

product_name: Flat Extension Cord 6 feet, Flat Plug Power Strip, 4 Widely Outlets with 3 USB Ports (2 USB C), 3 Side Outlet Extender with Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home, Office, Dorm Room Essentials
