product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: Installed in a PCIe 4x4 slot rated for 7500 MB/s, I only see 3500 MB/s on linux.  Investigating further, a propriatary "Turbo Write" needs to be enabled to hit max speed, and the software needed to do so only fully runs on windows, and partially on OSX (no linux at all).  Couldn't find any information on the buffer/burst size, or what happens if a power loss happens before the buffer is flushed.From the product page Q&A:Turbo Write technology, which increases the write speed of low-capacity 3Bit MLC SSD by using internal SLC buffering to improve performance.The technology does not write directly into 3Bit MLC.instead, it writes to the SLC Buffering area.Data is moved to 3Bit MLC when the SSD is not writing/reading, freeing up space in the SLC Buffering area.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: I tested the 4 TB version of the 990 Pro. Save your money. The drive can produce good synthetic benchmarks. Real world the drive slows to 1.5 GB/s around 600 GB during long transfers. If you're looking for a drive that will not quit, look at a Micron 9300 pro. 4, 8 and 15 TB capacity. These are U.2 and will out class any M.2 drive on the market. Continuous 3.5 GB/s read write.Only get this drive for small size, but other brands have small 2880 size in 8 TB (WD 850X) also lower pricing at same capacity.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: WHY THEFAWK A mounting screw wouldn’t be included.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: Thankfully the products wasn’t damaged but shipper must of sat on it cause the box is thrashed. Works great overall. The detrimental update was pre installed so it saved me the trouble

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: i was initially excited to receive 2 KOREA manufactured units in new & pristine condition, for US$20/ea LESS than the non-heatsink variant.but then, the SHOWSTOPPING DISAPPOINTMENTS...the integrated heatsink physically won't fit either of my slim workstation notebooks. (no elevation views on AMZ or Damsung websites.) i could accommodate the humongus, flat, non-chip-side heatsink by removing all m.2 nvme slot standoffs (that support normal form factor m.2 nvme sticks), BUT THERE IS NO WAY TO RECLOSE THE NOTEBOOK CASE, DUE TO THE RIDICULOUS, PEAKED-ROOF, CHIP-SIDE HEATSINK, W/ 4-CORNERS, SQUARE "CHIMNEY" PROTRUSIONS.additionally, while the external form factor is 2280, the diameter of the mounting/retaining screw slot is abnormally 1+mm too wide to be held by standard slot screw heads. this 2280 requires an oversized screw head, or a washer, neither of which Damsung provides.both completely unusable by me.the gratuitous LED along the roofline of the peaked/chimneyed heatsink provides ZERO COOLING BENEFIT & DRAWS MORE POWER from a m.2 nvme slot.now i know why Damsung "fire-saled" the heatsink version.CAN'T BE EXCHANGED. RMA return-to-AMZ can take upto a ridiculous 30-days to actully refund. may go to a different marketplacd & a sanely, graphene heatsinked HP FX990 Pro 4TB, with 5-year, 2400TBW warranty/endurance.buyer beware...

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: Was a little worried about drive performance after reading reviews but I've been monitoring my drive health for months and its health hasn't deteriorated at all. In fact, I was so happy with it that I ordered a second one, apparently that was a bad move. Instead of a ~$150 NVMe drive, I received a ~$50 SATA drive, one with half the amount of storage at that.Obviously, wasn't happy, I was kind of annoyed that I had to return the item to get a refund since it wasn't me who messed up. I don't know why I have to go out of my way to the UPS store to send back an item that cost $100 less than what I ordered but whatever, I guess they have to make sure I'm not trying to scam them out of a pricey SSD drive. I just checked the status of that return today and noticed that my refund still hadn't been processed (I returned the item over a month ago). Luckily a quick chat with an Amazon associate got that finalized, but damn, that was a lot of hoops to jump through to get my money back when I didn't do anything but receive something that I never ordered in place of something I did order.Anyway, just putting this out there because while it's possible that this is a one-time mistake, it could be a pattern if other customers have had similar issues (and if you have, I recommend you write a review so other people know about it). It's just a shame because the actual product itself has been performing great. It's possible that it's doing better than other customer's because mine's under an included MOBO heatsink so I guess keep that in mind.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: I installed this, updated the firmware, cloned my drive to it, and within a minute of rebooting, my PC froze such that I could move the mouse but nothing responded to keyboard or mouse input. After restarting, it froze again on the login screen. I initially figured the software I used to clone the drive had skipped or corrupted some files Windows needs to run, so I reformated the drive and cloned the old one again.The second time around, it worked without any freezing for several days, but then it started happening every other day or so. I tried setting it to full power mode in Samsung Magician, doing all sorts of checks to make sure all the files Windows needs were intact, and checking the drive for errors. None of that helped, and I figured it still didn't clone properly, so I planned to use different software to clone the old drive a third time.I then booted from the old drive to copy some new files off this one and clone the drive again, but in the process of copying the files, the drive stopped responding again. Since it wasn't the boot drive this time, it didn't freeze the whole OS, but anything that tried to access files on the drive, read its SMART data, or interact with it in any other way immediately stopped responding. In Task Manager, it was sitting at 100% activity with 0 read and write speeds and occasionally showed average response times over 200,000ms.I restarted again, and that time the drive showed up in Windows but had no capacity, no volumes, and everything acted like it wasn't actually there. After that, it worked long enough to copy my files off and secure erase it to return it.Hopefully I just got a low-probability defect, but it was a major pain to diagnose and unsuccessfully attempt to fix the problems. If it could work flawlessly for a few days before the problems came back, I wouldn't trust another one to not work fine for a few weeks or months and then develop similar problems.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: The newest version of Samsung Magician, which you need to fully configure and optimize the drive and make sure it is up to date, simply will not run and encounters and error even on a brand new windows 11 install. This appears to be a known problem, but Samsung has not addressed it for months and months. This is not acceptable.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: I used it for about an hour to set up the new monitor, and it is still good. It has a high refresh rate, but the brightness is barely up to standard. The height of its bracket is low and cannot be adjusted, and the most important thing is that the monitor heats up severely. The temperature in the upper part of the monitor is below 30 ℃, while the temperature at the bottom is close to 60 ℃. Oh my goodness, this is just the heat generated by my one hour screen setup. I am very worried about how long this monitor can last in such high temperatures. That's it for now, I haven't tested the audio because I'm using speakers.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: I bought this because it was the latest Samsung NVMe m.2 SSD drive, and I needed a 2 tb drive but...it's slower than the old drive! I have a Samsung laptop, so it seemed a no brainer to buy a samsung SSD, but hmmm...I open and save some very large files and so far, definitely definitely slower than my old drive. And heck if I know why. I've searched the heck out of this, and I can't find any definitive answers because the Samsung BIOS is toddler level and won't let me tweak my pcie port or even see what gen it is to see if it's maybe a compatibility issue. UGH. I'm guessing it might work fine on a custom pc, but on my laptop, it really doesn't seem to be living up to the hype. :\edit: I figured out that my pcie port on my motherboard is a v3 instead of a v4 (THAT took a while to figure out.) so...that essentially bottlenecks this drive. I also turned off write caching then turned it back on (go to disk management-->right click on drive--->properties--->policies --->enable write caching) and wierdly...that seemed to do the trick. My programs aren't hanging up loading and saving files anymore. I also benchmarked both drives after doing that, and this one is performing faster...just obviously not up the speed it's capable of. SO. Keeping the drive because I need the space, and one day, whenever I upgrade my laptop, then I can take this SSD with me.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: 23 June 20241) SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD NVMe M.2 PCIe Gen4 MZ-V9P2T0B/AMSold by: Amazon.com Services, Inc $169.992) Thermalright HR09 2280 PROSold by: Thermalright Direct $8.993) Noctua NF-A6x25Sold by: Noctua Cooling Solutions $14.95TLDR: Good M.2I decided to go ahead and put a heatsink on this. Heat has been, is and shall always be the #1 enemy to electronics. Unfortunately, heat dissipation engineering is often underrated, overlooked and badly done, if done at all. With this setup, it never gets above 30c during Samsung Magician performance test. Base mobo temp is 29C.Before attaching the HR09 I removed the sticker form the M.2, the silicone pad from the HR09 and applied Prolimatech PK-3 to the HR09. The picture shows TF-7 but I found that stuff way too thick and didn’t spread well. I used Acetone and q-tips to get the sticker gum off the chip tops. The bottom of the HR09 is steel and really needs to be aluminum but the chips are on top of the M.2 so that is where the most heat can be dissipated. I then attached an NF-A6x25 to the HR09 using some nickel wire. I also needed to augment the foam pad between the M.2 and the mobo. Without doing these mods, it was as if the HR09 wasn't there.My tried and true method of applying heatsink paste that works perfect every single time, no fuss, no worry, and gives visible indication it worked and that the paste isn't old dried out beyond it's shelf life: Every heatsink is always a mm or two wider than the object it is sinking. Simply run tape down the sides a mm or two in from the sides and spread paste on with a single edged razor blade. The narrow thin tape on the edges act like runners for the razor blade to skate on. Hold blade at an angle, it isn't critical, between 10 and 60 degrees doesnt matter. Then peel the tape off. Apparently I didn't take a picture of the HR09 when I did that so I am including a picture of the CPU heatsink done in the exact same manner to give you the idea. They really should include some narrow, thin cellophane tape and a single sided razor blade instead of a uselss spatula.Great drive for a reasonable price. Very fast.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: it works so well! tons of storage and it runs quick! super easy to install and worth the extra money for all the space!

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: Spent a long time researching specs and bought this on prime day. It met all minimum requirements for ps5 and exceeded some. The performance seems on point have not had any issues playing games directly from memory. Very easy to install and drive is recognized immediately by PS5. It comes with a built in heat sink but I bought a separate slotted vent to help just in case. I don't remember much about the warranty but I haven't had to use it so that's a win. Great value for the money actually the best price for the specs needed. I'm assuming warranty is good since product seems to be free of defects.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: Works perfect for my PS5, and its easy to install! Would definitely recommend.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: I  purchased a "mini dock" with an open slot for an SSD for my Apple Mac mini Desktop Computer. The Samsung 990 Pro nearly quadruples the Mac mini's storage. It is fast and stable.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: Bought this to increase my capacity and speed of storage on a gaming machine. The Samsung 990 Pro does EXACTLY what I want, and the cool black & Red heatsink is a nice touch... I installed the Samsung Magician software to monitor the drive, and it remains nice and cool (under 50-60c) even during heavy writing. - It's not the fastest drive in the world, but has excellent TBW capacity for a prosumer drive and I am very happy with it.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: Order these to add to QNAP NAS and they where east to install and the system recognized right after booting. Working great and nice and speedy for high demand files.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: The Samsung 990 PRO with Heatsink SSD 2TB is an excellent upgrade for the PlayStation 5. Its impressive sequential read speeds of up to 7,450MB/s ensure that games load quickly and run smoothly, enhancing your overall gaming experience. The built-in heatsink effectively manages heat, preventing thermal throttling and maintaining consistent performance even during intense gaming sessions. The 2TB capacity provides ample space for a large library of games and content. Overall, the 990 PRO is a high-quality, reliable choice that significantly boosts the storage and performance of your PS5.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: Until Gen 5 motherboards become more common and affordable, there is no better SSD on the market. Fastest Gen 4 SSD I've tested and I've tested many. There are some obscure brands on the market that are much cheaper and very fast, but as far as their longevity, I can't answer that. There are some brands out there that claim to match or even beat the performance of the Samsung 990 pro, but the one's I've personally tested, they didn't even come close. Brands that people would definitely recognize and trust because of the name. The one's I've tested myself, it is the brands that nobody has ever heard of and much cheaper that have came the closest to matching the 990's performance.

product_name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7,450 MB/s for High End Computing, Gaming, and Heavy Duty Workstations, MZ-V9P4T0B/AM
description: I realize that the SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 4TB PCIe 4.0 was developed with gamers, the film/video industry and scientific use in mind but I'm using it as an external HD for my Mac Mini M2 Pro that has 2 TB of native storage on it.Apple wants too much money for extra storage on their computers ($1200.00 for 4 TB ) and the 2 TB that the computer came with is woefully inadequate, that once I transferred my system from my previous computer over, I had less than 90 GB of storage left.So I purchased the 4 TB 990 Pro, installed it in a Zike Z666 SSD enclosure (read/write @ 40 GPS)  which is the fastest at the moment.I realize that even though the Zike is the fastest, it does throttle down the speed of the 990 Pro.I know this is  overkill but for me it's worth it because I don't have to wait for the transfer of large files.Eventually the development of SSD enclosures will get faster, I'll change up and get more out of the 990 Pro's speed.And I'm sure that the SAMSUNG 990 PRO will be cheaper in the future as well...But for a little over $400.00  and 1/3rd the price of what Apple wants, I have a future proofed hot rod for an HD with 4 TB  that holds my docs, media and apps to as well as the 2 TB that the Mac Mini comes with.I moved hundreds of gigs over in a couple of minutes.And it's already proved itself... I had restore the entire computer from a back up and the 990 Pro did it in approx. 8 minutes.. so fast that it surprised the Apple tech (who was getting ready to bail and have me back rather than wait) .. Normally it takes about ninety minutes to two hours to restore the computer from a back up.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: I bought the Hexeum Night Vision Binoculars because I hear animal noises in the woods behind my house at night with the windows open, which sometimes is so loud that it wakes me up and I wanted to see what was going on.  I did not install the 32GB memory card because I only wanted it for viewing, not storing photos or videos.User manual says “viewing distance in all dark: 200M-300M”.  I used it to see out my back window in total darkness, with no house lights on.  I could see gray tree trunks and gray leaves on bushes up to 36’ (=11M), and barely discernable gray tree trunks a few meters beyond that, but everything else was just a gray screen.  I turned the focus wheel a lot in both directions, with no improvement.  When observing through a window, the bright screen light causes a reflection off the window, so I was actually viewing things in the room (lamp, etc) instead of outside.  I thought the solution was to view through the screened portion of my window, not the glass.  But after working with it for several nights, I decided it was just a horrible product….until one final try.  I noticed when viewing close-up that there was a very faint grid over the image, which was actually my window screen.  I removed the mesh screen from my window and OH MY GOSH….THE WOODS LIT UP IN THE DARK!  It was transformational.  There is nothing in the instruction manual or in the product description that says don’t use it for viewing through a glass window, or window screen.SOME DRAWBACKS:Black writing on black buttons on a black case.  It’s very hard to read the writing, but you also can’t feel or identify the buttons in the dark.  The power and menu buttons are level with the case, and the four outside buttons are raised just slightly above the case.The viewing screen is very bright and lights up my face.  This would not be good if you don’t want to be easily seen while using it at night.  There is a “screen brightness” setting under the Menu button, but the user manual doesn’t tell you how to adjust Menu settings at all.  Mine was defaulted to level 5.  After playing around with the buttons while on the Menu screen, I found that the “Shot” button displays the 7 levels, then use the up/down IR buttons to change the level, then press Shot button again to retain the setting.  But regardless of the setting, the screen will still light up my face.  The “Night Vision Sensitivity” in the Menu screen was defaulted to “mild”, so I changed it to “high” with the same Shot/IR/Shot buttons.I installed 6 AA batteries and saw the 7 IR levels on the screen the first time I used it, but the next time it would not rise above IR level 4 without automatically shutting off.  User manual says “when the battery power is low, the IR levels will down automatically”.  I bought new AA batteries and was now able to raise the IR level to 7 (max) with each use.  This product should be equipped with a rechargeable battery instead, because the bright viewing screen will drain batteries quickly.During daylight, without using IR, the quality is really bad.  The view is mostly gray, not much color, and very grainy.  Can definitely see much better with the naked eye.I tried the “New and Special Color Effects” listed in the manual, which changes everything you are viewing to either Luminous Green or Purple.  I don’t know what the point of that is, to put a shocking green or purple filter over everything.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: These are okay but not great. IR light is weak and picture clarity is lacking. Does okay within 20yds, start getting out to 50yds and you can barely tell what you're looking at

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: You get what you pay for. It does the job. Quality is sub par for what it retails price wise. Explains why it was 80% off.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: Worked well seeing in the dark - however … even on the lowest setting, the view screen brightness meant eyes needed a minute or two to adjust after using.  And attracted insects outside.  This was attempted usage for varmints in the yard - I suspect even for animals in range of the unit that didn’t detect the projected night-sight light source, the screen’s white light would’ve been noticeable (like it was for insects).  I’m sure there are other uses it would work for, just not any for meUnit seemed to work well - particularly at this price point; so this may have been a good starting point if it was worth pursuing use of the technology.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: Can only see close up. Blurry from a distance. Not very impressed.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: I like the night vision capability of these, but unfortunately the video playback is super choppy despite being in 4k. Pretty disappointed in that as the videos give me a headache to even watch since they're so choppy / low FPS.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: A fun camera, not night vision binoculars though.  These are a more like an enhanced nighttime camera with a built in IR flashlight and viewing screen. Very very narrow field of view. Only 18 inches wide at 10 feet. Fair digital zoom, see the photos.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: I do not have a problem with the products it is what I ordered. My problem is I didn’t do my homework. The advertising for this product was great it fooled me. so my advice do your homework after going back I’ll check in prices after I get the product instead of before four different vendors under $50. product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: As far as night vision goes,it seems to work alright. For the money, especially. It even allows true color if there's a tiny bit of sunlight left. But if you wanna use it to observe, remember you have to hold it a few inches from your eyes , enabling any animal or person to see you. Other than that, it's fun to use. (I camp in a place where you're not supposed to camp. Sometimes someone shows up after dark to kick us out, so we hide. I bought this thing to observe the bad guys.)

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: I still have mixed feelings about this thing, I have not taken it outside at night to really test the night vision yet, I've only used it in a dark room so far and I think it works- the quality reminds me of the low quality scary videos. Someone in the reviews mentioned the settings that were not included in the handlers manual, I really don't want to get caught lacking in the dark...

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: I am thoroughly impressed with these binoculars! They offer excellent performance and reliability at a very reasonable price. The night vision is particularly impressive, making them perfect for low-light conditions. The binoculars are incredibly easy to use, with simple navigation through the menus, which I really appreciate. The display is clear, and the picture quality is outstanding, making it a joy to use them for both day and night activities. Overall, a fantastic product that offers great value for the money!

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: I recently purchased the Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars and I am beyond impressed with the quality and performance of this product. The 3'' HD screen provides crystal clear images even in the darkest of environments. The night vision capabilities are exceptional, allowing me to see clearly up to 300 feet away.One of the standout features of these binoculars is the ability to save both photos and videos directly onto the included 32GB TF card. This is incredibly convenient and ensures that I never miss a moment, whether I am out in the wilderness or simply observing wildlife in my backyard.The build quality of these binoculars is also top-notch, with a durable and ergonomic design that feels comfortable to hold for extended periods of time. The adjustable focus and zoom options make it easy to customize the viewing experience to my preferences.Overall, I highly recommend the Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars to anyone in need of high-quality night vision capabilities. Whether you are a wildlife enthusiast, a hunter, or simply someone who enjoys exploring the outdoors, these binoculars are sure to enhance your experience.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: I saw these & were rated well. Good price, so I ordered.  they are not googles, like binoculars, they have a screen, more like a digital camera. They are light, they feel kinda cheap, & pretty basic.ButThey work pretty well. Pretty simple & easy to work with. I live along a woods line & my pets are always reacting to things I can’t see, but now I can. I’d say it’s a good value for the price.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: Worth the buy! Night vision is better than expected and I’m able to see small detailed things at night(geckos and lizards eye will light up, pretty cool!) it won’t zoom in enough to see craters on the moon but the picture quality is definitely 4k. They’re great, work great, comfortable grip on them and don’t hurt around your eyes like some binoculars can.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: The quality of the product is amazing. The case is also very nice and protects the device well.The night vision is very clear and excellent. I feel it's perfect for an adventure as it provides quality images.Especially I like LCD Screen quality, Battery life long enough for several days, and saving view as photo and video features.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: This is a very reasonable priced pair of night vision binoculars.  I wouldn't call them goggles-when I hear goggles, I think wearable.  These are more hand-held.  I was impressed with the way these assist in seeing in the dark or very low light situations.  Magnification, focus and the ability to capture images.  Really nice features at this price point.  Do not confuse these with the military grade night vision goggles.  What you see is a black and white image, like a security camera with infrared.  This uses an IR light to make the subject visible.  This means that if you are the subject being looked at, you will see the red infrared light.  Animals-most don't even care or can't see this spectrum.  People-most can see it, some will not notice.  But-really cool for looking to see what our dogs are barking at.  Camping-we can see the "wildlife."  Enjoy.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: Crisp and clean view however you need to hold the screen from your face which aluminates where you are.  The IR Red light is very pronounced in front of the binoculars, so if you are playing a night game, humans are well aware of your location.  Decent zoom capabilities, I could see over 500ft away & relatively crisp with the digital zoom and monocular zoom.  Better than my old Gen 2 but still it is very apparent where the user is at night.  Overall, great price for a cool toy and even came with a 32G stick for pics.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: I recently got the hobby of camping with my friends so I decided to get a night vision goggle or camera to bring it to my camp and use it instead of a flashlight. I searched for nigh vision goggles and this was the first on my screen. I've used this several times at night, and the recording quality is really good and smooth for its price. Switching between night vision and normal camera mode is also really easy and the camera itself is also easy to control. The only downside is I cannot put this directly on my face because the screen is close to the front. However, that is a small problem compared to the quality and it brings for its cheap price compared to others. Overall pretty great product.

product_name: Night Vision Goggles - 4K Night Vision Binoculars for Adults, 3'' HD Screen Binoculars can Save Photo and Video with 32GB TF Card, Black
description: I first say this product when my Brother bought one. I was so impressed I had to give in and get one too.The pic is of my yard at night by a bush, it is not impressive by content, but the fact that it was completely black and couldn't be seen by the naked eye versus what the screen was showing me is very impressive.Plus you can use these during the day with a color screen as well. Comes ready to go out the package. Zooming in and out capabilities, pictures, and video capture.Hard to believe technology that was once only in the hands of military personnel, can be now in your hands so inexpensively.To watch creatures of the night, to watch and protect your perimeter, or just to see what's out there, I recommend for sure.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: I couldn't find this anywhere in the listings of ETL certified power strips. I'm finding a lot of cheap power like this are not actually certified or listed for safety standards, so I'd be careful using it or leaving it plugged in unattended.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: It works well. I connected iPhone and iWatch and few other things to it. Either one got hot like with some other chargers. I bought two for myself and another one for a friend of mine. I recommend it.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: It arrived on time. The cord length was just right, it works perfectly it's easy to use.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: I didn't think much of the cube design plug when I got this, but I don't love it simply because when having multiple things plugged in it looks a little sloppy. I prefer the strips. The plug works as expected, and the low profile plug (end that connects into the wall) is nice because it doesn't stick out as much.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: this is a great bang for your buck. It’s slim and sleek fit makes it look modern. 10$ for this is great.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: This power strip has been super handy for my workspace. The compact design fits perfectly on my desk, and I love that the usb ports on one side make it easy to charge my devices without needing extra adapters. It feels sturdy, and the cord length is just right for reaching outlets without being too bulky. I've noticed that the layout keeps the plugs from crowding each other, which is a great touch. Overall, it's been a solid addition to my setup, offering both convenience and efficiency.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: The Kakyanill Power Strip Cube is a useful little addition to a home office, dorm, or laptop bag. I particularly like the cube shape -- in contrast to the usual power-strip) because it gives more flexibility with over-sized plugs. While this little cube isn't big enough to accommodate *everything, allowing bits of pieces of various plugs room to overhang the cube without interfering with each other does increase the useability!3.0A USB-A port works as intended. I plugged my phone into a USB cord attached to a 2.4A charger, and the charge rate was identical to what I got from the USB port on this power strip (not fast-charging). The USB-A port checked out; I did not test the USB-C ports but I imagine they are no different.The safety features are also reassuring:- rated for 1250W and 10A max, which is about what you expect for a slightly-higher than you need for most common household devices.- Conforms to UL 1363 standard for relocatable power taps (RPTs), which include power strips. This standard covers basic safety requirements, construction standards, and performance criteria, including overcurrent protection (typically a circuit breaker or fuse).- Certified to CSA C222 No.308, the Canadian equivalent of UL 1363. It is ETL listed, which indicates compliance with North American safety standards. It's equivalent to UL listing in terms of meeting minimum safety requirements, and compliance with relevant standards for construction and performance. It is also FCC certified, which indicates compliance with EMI standards, not electrical safety. The FCC is the Federal Communications Commission, and has nothing to do with electrical standards per se.Cons:- It doesn't include surge protection (UL 1449).Overall, it does what it's advertised to do, and because safety is always a concern for power strips like this, the UL1363 conformity and CSA C222 certification are huge.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: This Power Strip with USB Ports, 5 ft flat Extension Cord is something I like so much, I'm ordering another one!For doing photography, I always need a short extension cord for a light and some lights these days use USB.  This is much better than a flat power strip as it's not a much in the way.  Quick and easy way to have access to AC or USB power.This is going in the laptop bag next time I travel.  Being that the outlets are on a cube, it's easier to fit into a bag.  With a laptop, I always need additional outlets:  printer, cellphone/USB misc chargers.I do have a laptop table at my bedside and have a dedicated laptop that I leave there for watching videos or working if I want.  This will be a lot more handy to simply put to the back to have AC access and USB outlets to charge the phone and other USB items.  It'll make life a lot easier and neater than an extension cord with a couple of chargers attached to it.It does have a flat plug and while that's something new I've seen on U.S. male AC plugs, it's not a great problem.  I think it's more of a style issue than anything else.  However, if you plan on plugging this into a long power strip, that plug may overlap and make it hard to access the next outlet over.  In other words, unless you're able to plug this  into the end outlet of a power strip, you probably will have this overlapping just enough on the next power strip outlet that you won't be able to use it.  For a regular wall outlet, this should be no problem.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: Love this cube on my desk. Looks great and charges well. High quality. Perfect size to hide behind a picture frame.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: I've always liked these power "cubes", it makes it really easy to plug in many large power adapters that never seem to fit on regular strips.  This one has some bonus outputs though!  The USB ports are great if you travel a lot, this is an all in one solution for a phone and laptop, just don't expect a super fast charging speed out of these ports.  The USB-C ports will charge a laptop, albeit slowly, so bring your own proprietary charger to get fast charge for your devices, a phone should be fine however.Be wary of electronic feedback loops.  Wireless headphones (while charging using this power cube) connected to a laptop which is also connected to the cube will create some auditory buzz in your ears.  This has been the case for every power strip that has USB ports.  There just isn't proper shielding to prevent this with the way most of these things deliver power to USB devices.

product_name: Kakyanill Power Strip Cube with USB Ports, 900 Joules Surge Protection, 5 ft Flat Plug Extension Cord, 3 AC Outlet 3 USB Ports(2 USB C), Desk Charging Station for Home Office Travel, White
description: I’m not that impressed with the weird cube shaped design but I love a flat cord that allows me to push my furniture back and has USB plugins. I needed to replace a power strip that was being bent behind some furniture to accommodate the cords I had and this fit the bill. Would recommend!

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: Samsung talks about video frame speed, but Bluetooth audio performance is severely lacking! While the overall Bluetooth performance has better sound than the best of their phones, performance is frustrating! The audio gaps occasionally on devices using Qualcomm APT-X Bluetooth and fails completely when LDAP is demanded from the driver. I now understand why a wired headphone jack is provided...there aren't enough resources to do Bluetooth satisfactorily. My A9+ has Android 14 but it appears this tablet barely has enough resources to run it. Also, compared to my previous Galaxy Tab S6, maximum SD card size is limited to 1GB instead of 2GB. I put all my data on the SD card and only use the internal for apps and the operating system. This assures my data cannot be monitored by Google & Samsung. Also, it's alot bigger than the 128GB internal storage which I use for the operating system and apps. These are the main bones of contention with the Galaxy Tab A9+While there is no fingerprint login on this tablet, the face tracking works remarkably well! Even in relatively low light, the tablet opens right up. If you are backlit however, the face tracking doesn't work...that's pretty much to be expected. For a screen that is not OLED, the image quality is quite good. Both cameras work nicely for videoconferencing and it takes reasonably good photos and video, something my Galaxy Tab S6 did not do well at all! Plays even 4K video I've shot with my Note 20 Ultra and Canon M50 nicely. Photos are reproduced very accurately.In conclusion I can say the following: Some of us don't play video games, in fact I could care less for that. A tablet should have strong suits not only in video performance but audio as well. This A9+ seems to fall flat on it's face in this area and I am somewhat disappointed by this! While it may be better than previous A series tablets, it's not even close for even older S series tablets. Perhaps back to the drawing board?

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: Good news and bad news abut this tablet.  The good news is the large screen makes it easier to read.  The bad news is that the larger size makes slipping it into a purse and taking it with me impossible.  Also, nowhere did it say you needed to purchase an SD card.  Since I don't have any lying around the house, I had to make a special trip to buy one.  Also, charging the thing is ridiculous.  One end of the data cable fits nicely into the tablet, but the other end doesn't fit into anything.  I had to buy a special charger, and even with that, it seems that my hair grew longer while waiting for the thing to charge.  I would not recommend this to anyone who does not have a gazillion accessories in their home already.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: Just got the tablet. Loved everything about it. Installed my SD in the holder and inserted it. Tablet says there was no SD card installed. So I ejected the holder, but the card had dislodged and got wedged all the way in the slot!The card was inserted properly and worked fine in my old Samsung Galaxy A7 Tablet. Never an issue inserting or ejecting the card. So now I've lost the data on the card and I have a brand new tablet with an SD Card slot that's useless.But, I have 128GB storage, which is more than enough for me, and I love everything else about it from the display and audio, to the performance, which is way faster than my old Samsung A7 Lite that finally stopped working. I was surprise how quickly everything from the A7 transferred over to this one.PROS: Sleek, lightweight, excellent display and audio. And FAST.CONS: Terrible MicroSD card tray. Out of all the Samsung tablets I've ever owned, this is the first time I've had an issue with it not handling the card. Proceed with caution.Win some, lose some...

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: Overall, this tablet was perfectly functional and usable. If you're looking for a tablet for games/movies/general entertainment purposes, it'll probably be just fine for you!My main complaint is that I bought this tablet for note-taking since I'm starting school soon, and what they don't make clear is that this tablet is NOT ideal for that. There is no feature that allows for palm rejection, meaning you can't rest your hand on the tablet while writing, and this was something I only learned after purchasing, unpacking and setting up the tablet. I did some research to see if there was a way to make it work, but from what I could tell there is simply no option to do so. I wanted the tablet to replace pen-and-paper notes but there's just no way to write comfortably/nautrally without being able to rest your hand on the screen, so I had to return the product. Now I'm using the Samsung S6 Lite and it's already miles better (I'd recommend if you're looking for a note-taking tablet).One thing I'll say is that this tablet was totally compatible with non-Samsung styluses, so if you prefer to use styluses and want to use this tablet for anything besides note-taking it will still probably work for you, with no need to invest in the super expensive styluses out there.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: We had an old Samsung tablet at our office and needed to upgrade our gear, so we decided to get this one instead. Right when I turned it on, the device had some minor lags when swiping on the screen. I also don’t like the placement of the buttons on the sides. This device is primarily designed for horizontal (landscape) display. While you can use it in vertical (portrait) mode, the overall design is clearly intended for landscape use. iPad would've been a better investment in the long run. Oh well.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: ordered this near the middle of the year 2024 I've had it a few months now. I've been using it a lot for shopping reading listening to music movies and audio books. I did stress test it on the 3d mark on wild life. overall score is 1 203 average FPS 7.21 its score range was only better then 15% of other devices that have been tested. I will say the temp on this device does maintain a nice 27C with how much I use it the battery can hold for on average 4 days unless I use it for something big like watching a movie or playing a game will run it out in less then 5 hours. I have noticed when I opened it on day one system ran smooth but it was fallowed by updates needed after updates where finished the bootup on the device became slow and sluggish even unlocking it would cause a small loading screen after launch.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: I ordered this as an extra device to use with TikTok to stream video lives. The video camera was very poor. The resolution is lower and the pictures are washed out. It does not even have auto focus. I guess that I have been spoiled with the S series for phones and tablets. This is nowhere close to the quality of picture as my Tab S8+ or my S23 ultra. I am returning it to order the Tab S9+. If the picture and camera quality are not of importance to you, the Tab A9+ will probably be fine for you. I did like that it had 4 speakers which assists if you want to use the tablet in vertical rather than horizontal. Other that resolution and camera, it seems to be a quality device. Fortunately Amazon has an convenient return policy. Sadly, the replacement will take seven days, even though I have PRIME. Why has shipping taken from 5-7 days for my last few orders?

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: I bought this to use as an inexpensive tablet I could use while backpacking. I was looking for something really basic that I could read at camp, check maps, and listen to music offline while hiking. Being a Samsung, it meant I would be able to find a decent case for it to provide at least some basic protection. If it got damaged during the hike, well... it was a cheap tablet so it should be good enough.It had 55% battery when it arrived, so I plugged it into a USB-C cable I had plugged into the USB port on my wall outlet. I figured this would be alright since it would need to be charged from a portable power source in the field anyway. After 48 minutes, it managed to charge only to 64%! I wanted to err on it being my cable, so I plugged it into a USB-C power brick instead and put that in my outlet. My wall outlets are 20w, and this requires 15w to charge, so it should totally work.It managed to hit 100% 4.5 hours later. Taking four and a half hours to charge anything 36% is insane. When I finally was able to power the tablet on, the screen was so dim, I could barely see anything. After rushing through the typical Android setup, I managed to increase the display brightness to around 50%. After installing 3 apps, I noticed that the battery was at 93% for less than a half hour of use.I definitely do not recommend this tablet. The cons far outweigh the pros in this device, especially since finding a budget tablet is not really that hard to find these days.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: I think I would like this tablet so much better than my past run of Kindles if it would just work properly.  The charge cord that came with it does not work, the tablet doesn't see it at all.  Unfortunately, the wifi isn't working well either. It loses connection approximately every 10 mins, sometimes more, rarely less than that. This would be the only device dropping the wifi in the household. It happens no matter what wifi I connect to in any household of my friends and family. Last and most importantly, I have never been able to talk to any human at the customer service contact info. So Samsung doesn't seem to care if their devices don't work, just as long as they have been sold. Never buying another device by them.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: So I had my tablet for about 5 months and now I tried charging it and it's just a black screen it won't turn on I don't know what is wrong with it I suggest just buy them more expensive ones cheap don't last that long

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: I recently purchased the SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet, and I must say, it has exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I unboxed it, I was impressed by its sleek design and the quality of its build. The 11-inch screen is a perfect size, offering a large enough display for all my needs without being cumbersome to carry around. The screen resolution is stunning, providing crisp and clear visuals that make watching videos, browsing the web, and reading e-books a pleasure.One of the standout features of this tablet is its quad speakers. The sound quality is phenomenal, with rich, deep bass and clear highs that make listening to music and watching movies an immersive experience. Whether I’m using it for entertainment or for video calls, the audio performance is top-notch. The speakers are strategically placed to ensure that the sound is evenly distributed, no matter how I hold the tablet.The performance of the SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ is equally impressive. With 64GB of storage, I have plenty of space for all my apps, photos, and files. The tablet runs smoothly and efficiently, thanks to its powerful processor and ample RAM. Multitasking is a breeze, and I haven’t experienced any lag or slowdowns, even when running multiple apps simultaneously. The battery life is also excellent, easily lasting through a full day of heavy use.Another feature I appreciate is the user-friendly interface of the Android operating system. It’s intuitive and easy to navigate, with plenty of customization options to tailor the tablet to my preferences. The pre-installed apps are useful, and there are countless additional apps available for download from the Google Play Store. The tablet also supports a variety of accessories, such as keyboards and styluses, which enhance its functionality even further.In terms of connectivity, the SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ has everything I need. It connects seamlessly to Wi-Fi and Bluetooth devices, and the signal strength is consistently strong. The tablet also has a USB-C port for fast charging and data transfer, which is incredibly convenient. The camera quality is decent for a tablet, allowing me to take clear photos and videos when needed.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of the SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet. It offers a perfect blend of performance, design, and functionality, making it an excellent choice for anyone in need of a reliable and versatile tablet. Whether you’re using it for work, entertainment, or staying connected with loved ones, this tablet delivers on all fronts. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality Android tablet.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: Last April, I bought my Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ as a replacement for my old Windows 10 laptop which I will be forced to retire next year. I was wondering how well this tablet could serve as a laptop replacement, but I needn't have worried. It does everything my old laptop does, and it does it much faster and much more efficiently. Needless to say, I am very pleased with this device.The things I like best about my Galaxy Tab A9+ tablet:1. The 11-inch screen is large enough for me to see clearly with my aging eyes. Colors are vivid, and the text is crisp and clear. I can make the text bigger whenever I need to.2. The sound is great! The tablet featores four speakers (two on eack end) that pump clean, crisp audio into my room.3. Processor speed is very fast. Apps open in just a few seconds (or less), and there is almost no lag between my screen tap and program execution.4.  My tablet came with 128gb of storage and 8gb of RAM. I have had no issues with storage space or with slowed-down multitasking. I've had as many as 20 apps open in the background at the same time, with no noticeable lag.5. My tablet came with Android 13 and UI 6.0 unstalled, but both programs automatically updated to Android 14 and UI 6.1 within a month. These latest versions of these programs are outstanding.6.  I bought my tablet with two key essential accessories: a Bluetooth keyboard and a heavy-duty tablet case/stand combination. (I am typing this review on the Bluetooth keyboard right now.) These accessories integrate perfectly with my Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ and help immeasurably in, making it an outstanding laptop replacement.I'm sure I could think of many more features I like, but you get the idea. This is one fantastic tablet - the best I have ever owned! Most highly recommended.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: PRO:1.  Amazing display, really clean and crisp, bigger, and very responsive OS.2.  Price is much more reasonable than years ago.3.  11" size is nice for my older eyes.4.  Still has a 3.5mm headphone jack, which is nice as I use up my older headphones.5.  Can nowCON:1.  Cases for this are somewhat limited.2.  Touch sensitivity, a tiny bit on the sensitive side.OTHER:1.  BUY this as it's a great upgrade from older tablets.2.  DON'T BUY if you are just looking for something for a kid to play angry birds on, there are cheaper and whatnot tablets out there.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: The SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ is an excellent tablet for the price! The 11-inch display is sharp and vibrant, making it perfect for watching videos, reading, and browsing the web. With 64GB of storage, there’s plenty of space for apps, media, and files, and it can easily be expanded with a microSD card if needed.The tablet runs smoothly with Android, and I’ve had no issues with lag, even when multitasking or using it for gaming. The battery life is impressive, easily lasting a full day with regular use. It’s also lightweight and easy to carry around, making it great for on-the-go use.Overall, I’m very satisfied with the performance and features of this tablet. It’s a solid choice for anyone looking for a budget-friendly, reliable Android tablet!

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: PRO - This tablet gives up a few “Bells & Whistles” to deliver great value that many users will appreciate. Internal speakers have great clarity. Bright, clear display. Great battery life. User interface is intuitive.CON - Charging from a near empty battery takes longer than it should.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: This is my first Samsung Galaxy tablet and its performance is smooth, polished and reliable. But I'd give it 4 and 1/2 stars if I could. I hate the keyboard. When you want to use emojis, hand gestures, animals and all that -- it's divided up into separate sections instead of one page. So when you want to access say a hand gesture instead of a face, you have to press a button at the top of the keyboard to get to it. And if there isn't a symbol for what you want at top of the keyboard, you have to hit the search to find it. I find this very inconvenient. After all the fuss I've heard about Samsung Galaxy, I can't believe how small and clumsy this keyboard is. Charging takes awhile, so I'm using a block -- plugging it into the wall seems to improve the speed of the recharge. The charger cable that comes with it is very short and flimsy -- so I'm using a sturdier cable I bought for it. Setup for this tab was the worst I've ever experienced. I was ordered to get an app in my Playstore called SmartSwitch in order to set it up. Google Setup has always worked fine for me with every other tab I've purchased, but I wasn't allowed to use it with this one. It had to be SMART SWITCH or not at all, which required me to plunk out $7.50 with my credit card! And the setup was no better than Google and took a few hours besides. I paid extra and bought the 8gb version of this tablet because I'm a serious gamer and I must have speed. I used it constantly this past weekend during my online team tournament and it worked very smoothly with long lasting battery life. It's been interesting to check out a Samsung Galaxy at last and it is a beautiful tablet well worth having.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: The tablet is easy to use. All instruments are in the box. A C type adapter will be needed for the USB cord to charge the tablet. Lightweight. Easy to carry. Value for money. Able to carry out the basic functions and user friendly.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: I've been a computer user for many years (not an expert though) and I own a Samsung smart phone and laptop, so I'm not a novice to technology but I am for a tablet. It comes with a lot of bloatware, easily removed, and I was able to easily pair my phone settings to the tablet wirelessly - no problem. Haven't tried using the tablet as a phone yet but I probably will in the future just because it would be handy bedside. So far I have enjoyed it, but I am disappointed that Samsung has sooooo many updates that consume a lot of time. I knew there would be a lot of updates when I first turned it on, but several days in I can still expect a Samsung update almost on a daily basis, and this is after I've done all the customizing that I want. Drives me nuts, so I encourage any new user to take advantage of being able to NOT do auto updates or you'll be without use of the tablet which can be very exasperating and circumvents the desire to quickly search for something!  Do them on command or schedule them!  Samsung - get with it and bundle updates so they are less frequent, albeit more time consuming for each one. Other than that, apps load quickly and the display is crisp and clear and the sound is very good as are response times when moving from app to app or screen to screen. The battery life has been very good so far, and seems better than my cell phone. One thing I don't understand is why Samsung has offset the search bar on the home screen.....it is off center to the left on the screen no matter how I turn the device. Not a deal breaker but just looks very odd, if not outright silly on an otherwise very classy looking screen. The tablet is quite light, very thin, and the 10" size is great for people who may be visually impaired like me. I especially like the touch keyboard that automatically displays with the Google search bar. Once I get past my learning curve, I'm sure I'll have more to say, but all in all, I'm mostly happy with the purchase.

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: I got this tablet in May 2024, it's fast and does what it needs to do.  Two weeks ago I would have given more stars, a week ago the screen started flashing intermittently, then all photos and videos got very dark and hard to see. Now it's got massive burn in problems.  The app doesn't even have to be on screen very long before you can see a shadow image in the background.  After a search I found this is a very common issue with no fix. I could deal with the shadow image but being able to see images is important to me and how I use my tablets so I am looking for a different brand. I've had Samsung tablets before with no issue. Very annoying.  Edit: I hadn't been going to try to return or repair as I thought it might have been too long. But I did and as of the moment it has been repaired (I hope) and will be shipping to me soon. So I have updated to 5 stars. Until it went funny it was a great tablet, hope it will be again. Customer service A+

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Tablet 11” 64GB Android Tablet, Big Screen, Quad Speakers, Upgraded Chipset, Multi Window Display, Slim, Light, Durable Design, US Version, 2024, Graphite
description: I'm very happy with this purchase and got a great price on prime day. The home screen is a little awkward compared to Apple product but it's something I can get past. With that said the Google Play store definitely offers more options. I've done some simple gaming on here which has been really nice and this thing absolutely destroys the fire tablet in terms of performance. The bluetooth works well with a keyboard and headphones and I really have no complaints after using it for a few months. I'm kind of disappointed there is no app for apple tv but I can get past that. After doing my research and testing a few products this is definitely the best option for under $200.

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: I repeat they do not block out background noise! I will say the sound quality is great but not suitable for the work from home peeps!

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: I don't know if I received a dud but noise cancellation doesn't seem to work on this device. I read the one-paged manual front to back multiple times to rule out user error. There's just one button located on the ears on the microphone to turn the noise cancellation feature on/off that's confirmed by a voice prompt. There's no discernible difference in ambient background noise either way. A big raspberry on this one.

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: Excellent for noise cancellation, it cancels the background noise 99%. Hands free headset features a wide range. Easy to use as well as to pair up. It sounds great and comfortable to wear, such a light weight and it is recommended

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: I got this for my son-in-law, and he loves them! He needed a headset that blocked out all the background noise, and didn’t pick up the sounds in the room like the dog barking or kids running around, and it works so good. The headphones are super comfortable, and the mic works great, so it was a win! He’s able to work from home without worrying about his clients hearing every sound in his house. I tried it out and was so impressed I’m buying one for myself now as well! Love it!

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: This wireless headset has such a quality sound. It has great functionality, you can switch the microphone from one side to the other. I found it very easy to set up and use. Connectivity remains strong at all times. Excellent product

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: My granddaughter has confiscated my headset.  Just Kidding!  But she is learning so quickly to use this to call her mom. This headset is very comfortable and fits easily over my hearing aids. Most people I have talked to have mentioned how quiet it is, they only hear my voice and ask how is that so. I tell them I specifically order a noise-cancelling microphone headset to block out all the background sounds so they only hear my voice – not the chaos around me, like my granddaughter dancing to whatever is on her tablet. It's easy to connect to my tablet, laptop and even TV, for zoom meetings with my director, or talking with my clients in my 'side-hustle' and others. The Bluetooth allows me cordless use and is easy to adjust.

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: This headset's noise-cancelling microphones block out all the background sounds so your caller only hears your voice – not the chaos around you. They’re comfortable and definitely work!

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: The setup for this noise-canceling headset was quick and easy, and the sleek design is a definite plus. It excels in noise cancellation, making calls crystal clear, and the audio quality for voice is impressive.  It's perfect for a work-from-home setup.  The audio clarity during calls is excellent, and it performs well when paired with both my iPhone and computer. However, the sound quality for music is only average, as it lacks richness in the upper and lower registers.  Highly recommended for professional use and calls, but less so for audiophiles seeking great music performance.

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: The COOLPO Wireless Headset features advanced noise-canceling technology, effectively minimizing background distractions. Its smart microphone rotates 270 degrees, allowing for flexible placement. This design enhances audio clarity, particularly in office settings. Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity provides wireless freedom, eliminating tangled cords. The ergonomic design ensures comfort during extended use, making it suitable for prolonged calls or video conferences. Battery life is impressive, lasting up to 40 hours on a single charge. Fast charging quickly replenishes power when needed. Setup is straightforward, requiring only a USB dongle connection. Muting is easily accessible via the microphone boom. Audio quality is clear and reliable across various platforms, including phone calls, Zoom, Teams, and Microsoft Teams. Overall, the COOLPO Wireless Headset offers a blend of advanced technology and practical design, catering to professionals seeking efficient communication solutions. Highly recommended!!

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: Used for couple days, connection is strong. Pretty comfortable and it does not cover a whole ear. Sounds quality is good

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: Seems very well made and very comfortable! Nice padding and slides nice to change size. The ear piece is labeled with right and left like shown in picture. Great sound and my son was over the moon to get a headset with mic!

product_name: COOLPO Wireless Headset with AI Smart Mic, Bluetooth 5.2 Headphones, Dual Chips 13K+ Noise Reduction Mic, 40Hrs HiFi Computer Headset with USB Dongle, Mute Boom, Call/Meeting/Remote Work/Call Center
description: These are the best headphones ever!  My husband uses them when mowing our 8 acres, and I wear them when running!  The sound quality is awesome.  Great value and performance!

product_name: Apple iPhone 13, 128GB, Midnight - Unlocked (Renewed)
description: The phone is great, there is a few scratches, none are actually visible except for one tiny one. The others are only visible if I flash a light onto my phone while it's turned off. The phone runs very smooth compared to my iPhone 7, and has an 87% on battery health. My only issue with this is the item was delayed multiple times. I was told it was to be delivered on Saturday but for whatever reason it wasn't and I was home all day. On that same day I called them, I am told it was to be picked up at my local CVS, so I went there, just for them to tell me, they don't have it until Monday. So I went back home, waited a few days, and on Monday morning I recieve a text telling me the package is ready for pick-up at CVS, so I went and it still wasn't there. They told me to come back in on the afternoon, and I did. After 3 different occasions of being told to come in, I explained my situation to the seller and they offered me just a small $10 for compensation... I finally got the product today on Tuesday when they told me to come in this morning. It should never be this difficult to communicate with a customer in my opinion, but it is what it is. Good product, terrible delivery.

product_name: Apple iPhone 13, 128GB, Midnight - Unlocked (Renewed)
description: In September 2024, I purchased a renewed Apple Iphone 13, when it arrived I (as always) put a glass protector on the phone before starting it up.  When I placed the glass protector on the screen, the glass protector would not adhere around the edges of the screen (yes, the two dust dots in the middle of the screen are my fault in the picture above).  I have not seen this problem before but it looked like a liquid must have damaged the screen under the prior owner(s). Battery capacity for a used phone was fine at 86%, one of the camera lenses had a scratch right through the middle.  Perhaps this is the difference between Amazon renewed and premium renewed. Other than the inconvenience of sending it back for exchange, I have purchased other renewed items and this is not major disappointment because of the return policy.

product_name: Apple iPhone 13, 128GB, Midnight - Unlocked (Renewed)
description: Le pongo 3 estrellas porque  el tema de cargador no me anduvo bien. De la nada me salta un cartel de  “Charging not available”  y mi celular nunca estuvo expuesto a lugares con agua o humedad. De hecho siempre que me baño, NUNCA dejo el celular en el baño. Esto me apareció al segundo día que usé el celular nuevo. Es raro, debe ser una falla del sensor. Después dejo de aparecer y el celular me cargo bien pero cada tanto me tira el cartel. A raíz de esto, me compré un cargador inalámbrico y esta todo Ok. Igual con el cargador de cable también me anda pero de la nada pira y tira ese cartel, pasa cuando paso cerca de un baño que quizás alguien se bañó, pero es raro. Lo peor de todo es que lo compré refurbished pero en excelente condiciones. Esto no debería pasar. Ademas vivo en Argentina y no estoy en USA para poder arreglarlo o quejarme con Amazon. El resto del celular anda todo ok, esto del cargador me pasa cada tanto, pero no debería pasarme!! Eso

product_name: Apple iPhone 13, 128GB, Midnight - Unlocked (Renewed)
description: I ordered the iPhone 13 in starlight, waiting a week for it to come in despite originally being told I would get it with two day shipping, and opened the box to a different coloured phone. Luckily my mum liked the colour of the phone and bought it off me so I didn’t have to go through the hassle of returning it, but I had to order a different phone so I’m without a phone for nearly two weeks longer than expected.Colour aside, I ordered the excellent quality and it’s appearance was as promised with no visible damage to the exterior of the phone. The battery life was at 90% and charged quickly and seems to hold its charge for a good amount of time. It’s fairly easy to use, though the touch screen wasn’t perfectly responsive (though in my experience no iPhones are). Didn’t seem to generate heat while being used which was a big issue with some of the iPhones.Overall good value for the money but I can’t say that the wrong colour and how long it took to arrive didn’t rub me the wrong way.

product_name: Apple iPhone 13, 128GB, Midnight - Unlocked (Renewed)
