product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: This frame does have nice picture quality but unfortunately one simple configuration choice on the Android build makes it a horror for a secure home network.How? Every time it boots up it generates a random MAC (Media Access Control) address for its WiFi interface. If you have secured your home network so that the only devices you allow to connect to your Wifi is on a white list of MAC addresses then every time you turn this off and boot it back up again it will warn you it is being blocked because the new random MAC address does not match the one you allowed last time it was running.This also prevents you giving it a reserved IP address.Frameo (which is the app or mini OS running on top of Android) does not have access to change to a static MAC address according to their support because it was a built in setting at the time of compiling the Android OS. I should also mention that they are not necessarily the manufacturer of any particular frame using their software, which is why they can't control it.Unless you are planning on setting it up on a public WiFi in a coffee shop this makes it an unusable pain in the you know where.So, if you have an unsecured WiFi at home then you may love it and not even notice the problem but if you do care about security and have a MAC white list then you should avoid avoid avoid.On an additional note the Frameo app will try and get you to subscribe to use more features. Personally I have enough subs for TV, movies and whatever that I aint paying just to have a more featured photo frame.

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: The Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere, Christmas was properly packaged and delivered safely the next day. The Frameo Digital Picture Frame is a wonderful addition to any home, especially during the holiday season. Its 10.1-inch HD touch screen delivers vibrant, clear photos and videos, making it a delightful way to showcase your cherished memories. With 32GB of memory, it holds a significant number of images, ensuring that special moments are always on display. The setup is incredibly user-friendly—just download the app, connect to WiFi, and start sharing photos and videos instantly from anywhere. The auto-rotate feature allows for flexible placement without sacrificing image quality. Whether you’re sending a snapshot from a family gathering or a travel highlight, the Frameo makes sharing easy and enjoyable. This smart photo frame is perfect for gifts, especially for those who might not be tech-savvy yet wish to stay connected with family. Overall, the Frameo Digital Picture Frame is a practical, thoughtful gift that promotes joy and connection, making it an excellent choice for Christmas or any occasion.

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: I have a few of these frames, and they all work very similar.  This one is nice because it has a while border frame around the picture that adds a little bit of realism to the black frame, making it look more picturesque.The image quality is fantastic, and the controls are easy to set up on Wi-Fi, connect to it with the app, and upload pictures quickly for a good slideshow from anywhere.  Also, if you don't want to connect to Wi-Fi, you can just put the pictures on an SD card and have it locally do a slideshow from that, so you don't have to connect this to the Internet if you don't want to.

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: I really like this digital picture frame.  I have it mounted in my office, and several friends & family have uploaded pictures.  Its great to see different perspectives of shared events, family gatherings, and the random meme.  Many of my friends are not tech savvy and they've had little to no issues with the Frameo app.While I love the frame so far it couldn't use some polishing.1- Plan to mount it on the wall.  I tried placing it on my desk, but it kept falling over.  It has a leg on the back, but the hinge side doesn't have enough tension to hold it upright.2- Power.  The included power brick is 5VDC @ 1.5A.  The frame also has a USB-C port.  I tried using the USB-C port for power (5V 1.5A is well within its spec), but no dice.  This isn't a showstopper but would be nice since most outlets in my home have USB-C ports.Despite the two items above its a nice addition to my office and I have no regrets on the purchase.

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: My teen daughter got one of these after her sister got a digital frame for her dorm room.  This frame is similar to her sisters except that it feels more traditional "frame" looking with the matting as an added touch to give it less of a tech feel and more of a homey feel.  It's also thin, too.  The frame has a clear beautiful picture and can hold an impressive amount of photos. Short videos, too! She loves that she can have others add pictures to her frame as long as they get the app, just like her sister's frame can. The setup and use of this frame is also comfortingly simple, and with these kids growing up with the instagram of it all, they will be sharing pics with each other all the time!  Love this as a gift for teens/older teens

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: Digital picture frames have come a long way! This particular frame is very easy to use. But let me tell you I am almost totally blind so I had my daughter help me set this up. Of course she went through and added all the pictures but walking me through. It was very easy to add pictures and lots of them. The amount of storage it has is great and we’ve put I couldn’t tell you how many pictures on it and it is not even half full yet. the pictures are high-quality and the frame looks wonderful sitting on the TV stand and going through all the memories that we love to relive! 100% would recommend

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: This is such a great gift idea for a parent or grandparent. It is really simple to operate. The size is perfect and it’s really good quality

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: This digital picture frame combines modern technology with functional design, making it a versatile addition to any home or office. It features a high-resolution display that showcases photos and videos in vivid detail, enhancing your viewing experience. The frame supports various multimedia formats and allows for easy uploading of content. Overall, if you're looking for a stylish and efficient way to display your digital memories, this frame offers convenience and quality in a sleek package.

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: I am really tech challenged and so hesitated to order this smart photo frame. I was pleasantly surprised by how easy it is to set up and add photos. The graphics are sharp and make your pictures look great. This can be connected to WiFi and can be hung or stood up on a shelf.This would make a really great gift- as a wedding gift so the bride and groom could add memories of their day, for a graduation gift- with lots of pictures of memorable times loaded or the frame left for the recipient to load, or for grandparents who live a distance away loaded with pictures of the grandchildren.

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: I couldn't have asked for a better digital image frame from QOCEN. Crisp, colorful images can be seen on the 10.1-inch full HD touch screen, and there is enough of storage space thanks to the 32GB RAM. It was simple to set up and use the Frameo app to share photographs immediately from my phone when I connected it to WiFi. The auto-rotate feature and slideshow feature work well for presenting images both vertically and horizontally. It's a great way to keep in touch with family members, especially the less tech-savvy ones. I heartily suggest this frame to everyone who wants to elegantly showcase their memories!

product_name: Frameo Digital Picture Frame WiFi 10.1 inch, QOCEN Smart Digital Photo Frame with 32G Memory, HD Touch Screen, Auto-Rotate, Slideshow, Easy Setup, Share Photos and Videos Anywhere
description: My family has a couple other Frameo frames. We enjoy seeing new photos appear magically from our daughter. The Frameos work well, but this new Frameo frame has some improvements over the models we have:* this new frame looks more modern, with a thinner frame* our original frame had a removal brace to allow the frame to stand; this new one has a hinged brace. The latter is much nicer (the removable brace falls out when we lift up the frame)

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: I have both the 2 and 4 Port versions.They work much better than other cheap alternatives, went through a few before these and should have just paid more initially.The port placement is poor though as I'll explain below:2-HDMI Version:With Cables coming out of both sides, this is very difficult to mount anywhere as there isn't really a "front" to the device so mounting is near impossible in any good way. Additionally, the button and light indicators are on top which further makes this device more annoying to mount.This device could be improved by moving all ports to one side, and the button and indicators on the front.4-HDMI Version:A slight improvement of the 2 port version, all the HDMI are on the back with indicator lights on the front. Where this one goes wrong is the additional power cable which doesn't exist on the smaller one. The power cable inputs to the side of the device making any mounting instantly more difficult and ugly. I strongly recommend a right-angle USB-C power cable if you get this.This device could be improved by moving USB-C port to back, and the button to the front.

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: I bought this device to swap a single input between two monitors.The initial product I received was defective.  Anker did send me a replacement which functioned, but not to the specs advertised.Even with short, high quality cables I cannot get a good 4k60 signal.  I get lots of artifacts on screen and occasionally the monitor will not wake up.This does not happen using the same cables direct into my Mac Studio.If you are okay with 4k30, this would probably work great for you.

description: The product description says "or use one device across two screens."  You cannot, this product only allows toggling between two screen.  You cannot use two screens/monitors in dual mode.  Otherwise the product is fine for switching between hdmi screen devices

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: I'm not sure why, but when the source of one HDMI powers off, this switch automatically switches to the second source even if that one is also powered off. I'm using this for my Nintendo Switch and my PS4, so as an example: If my Switch needs to install an update and turns itself off, the HDMI switcher detects that the Switch has powered down and seems to switch to the second HDMI input (PS4), even though the PS4 is off. So when the Nintendo Switch powers back on, it isn't being displayed on the screen because the HDMI input is now on the PS4. So every time this happens, I have to get up, walk over to the TV, and hit the button on top of the HDMI switch to fix this.Other than this one extremely annoying feature, it works great! Note that it does not come with any HDMI cords at all (not even a short one to plug this into the TV) so you will have to purchase your own cord to connect this to the TV.

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: Does not support DVI to HDMI cables

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: I’ve just about decided that I’m never going to buy any accessory unless it’s from Anker, if possible. Their products just seem to work for me and last long enough. I tried four HDMI splitters from three different brands—two cheap ones didn’t work at all. I figured I needed to spend more, so I bought a model that sort of worked. However, the power adapter for it didn’t work at all, so I had to use my own. Since the picture quality was good and it was easy to use, I decided to upgrade to a higher-end model because I needed one more HDMI slot.Unfortunately, that one didn’t work with my soundbar because it controlled the ARC, and my TV didn’t like that. I even called their tech support, which was useless and gave me completely wrong advice. I had to do my own research online to figure out what was going wrong and realized that, even though they told me the unit I bought would work with ARC, it absolutely couldn’t, given how my TV controlled it. I wasted a ridiculous amount of time on that. Both units were from Monoprice.I was about to give up and settle for the three-slot Monoprice model when I noticed  this Anker splitter  for cheap and remembered having good luck with their products in the past. It was a third of the price, so I bought it, hooked everything up, and I’ll be damned—it worked perfectly. Setup was much easier, and the remote uses standard batteries instead of those annoying flat ones. Switching is quick, and the picture looks great. I still can’t believe I spent so much on the other brands. At least I can return them.If you’ve been struggling to find an HDMI switch that works, this one is a dream. I’ll try to post a follow-up after some time has passed to see if it holds up, but so far, so good.

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: What impressed me is that the device doesn't need an extra power cable, it is smart enough to know the difference between the monitors and five that feedback to the PC. This allows seamless switching after first time setup. Even allowing different frame rates and resolutions. Pretty cool tech. Get some tape and it's sturdy very enjoyable clicking. The switch process is so stable.

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: Another day, another W for Anker. Simple product, didn’t break, never had a hiccup. I’d like to see a version with a remote one day

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: We own many different devices made by Anker, including this little HDMI switch box, and they all work very well. When our 12 year old Pioneer AV receiver located in the master bedroom died, I (ok the wife actually...lol) decided that we didn't want to spend the nearly $700 (for now anyway) to replace it with the latest equivalent Pioneer or Denon AV receiver, as we already have a great home theater setup in the living room. Instead, we purchased this 2 into 1 Anker HDMI switch box, and a Fosi 2.1 channel mini amplifier, to replace the Pioneer AV receiver. This combination works very well together for our audio and video needs in the master bedroom now. Albeit, we no longer have ARC/eARC capability in order to control everything, but such is life.This Anker HDMI switch box has a Roku Ultra and a Sony Blu-Ray player connected to the two HDMI inputs, and the single HDMI output is connected to a 40 inch Sony LED TV. Everything is connected with three, 3 foot long Silkland HDMI 2.1/w Ethernet cables. This combination of devices work flawlessly together, and the Anker HDMI switch box switches back and forth between the Roku and Blu-Ray player with no issues at all.The audio is sent from the Sony TV to the Fosi 2.1 channel amplifier via the 3.5 mm audio-out port on the TV. The video and sound both work perfectly, transmitted first through this Anker HDMI switch box, from the Roku and Blu-Ray player to the TV.This Anker HDMI switch box is very small in size, and made of plastic. It is 2-3/16 inches by 2-3/16 inches square, and 1/2 an inch tall. This Anker HDMI switch box takes up no space at all. It also changes input devices with a push of the single button centered on top of the box. There are also 2 faint (not blindingly bright) blue LED lights on top that indicate which HDMI channel the device is currently operating on. The Anker HDMI switch box requires no external power supply, and it runs very cool while operating.Also, while Anker states that this HDMI switch box will transmit 4k @ 60hz video resolution, I cannot verify this as our Sony TV is only capable of 1080p at 120hz (the Roku Ultra is 4k @ 60hz capable, however). In any case, the Anker HDMI switch box does transmit the 1080p resolution flawlessly. I can however verify that this Anker HDMI switch box will transmit both basic 5.1 Dolby and DTS surround sound audio, but most likely won't transmit the higher bandwidth Dolby Atmos or DTS-X 7.2.2 surround sound audio specifications.Overall, I am very impressed with this Anker HDMI switch box. It is small, works very well, and does not require external power to function. However, if the power is turned off to all connected devices, this Anker HDMI switch box will default back to the #1 HDMI input channel, so just make sure that the most often used input device is on that channel. I highly recommend this inexpensive Anker HDMI switch box for anyone that has two HDMI devices, and limited HDMI ports on their TV/monitor (or doesn't want multiple HDMI cables running to the TV), and doesn't want to shell out hundreds of dollars for a home theater AV receiver. Pick up one of these great Anker HDMI switch boxes today!

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: It has a nice compact, clean design, clear indicator light, easy to press button, quick switching, solid construction, and works well. I'd buy it again.Plus, to be honest, I'm gradually becoming a fan of Anker products. I've bought quite a few things from them and never had a problem (so far).When I bought mine ,it was a bit on the high side, price-wise, but not terrible. I'd keep an eye out for sales. For instance, as I write this review, its about 30% less than what I paid for it...so a much better deal.Full transparency, I have noticed an occasional random video glitch, but they're extremely infrequent. Its not something that bothers me and not something to worry about. Though, technically not perfect, so that's why I docked a star :)

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: Very easy to set up, one long press of the button and your monitor(s) switch from PC to laptop - just what I needed as I bounce between the corporate laptop and my personal PC in the home office

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: No brainer to hook up. Works perfectly.

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: This is a life saver, being able to switch btw computers without the need for yet another monitor!

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: Well, well, well, what do we have here? It’s the Anker HDMI Switch, and let me tell ya, it’s the best thing since… well, cable! You know how it is when you’ve got a sweet setup with your TV, gaming console, Blu-ray player, and who knows what else, but only one HDMI port? That’s like having a party with only one seat. But with this little beauty, now everyone’s invited!This Anker HDMI Switch is like the golden ticket to entertainment heaven. It’s got THREE ports! You heard me right—THREE. It’s like being upgraded from basic cable to premium, baby! Just plug in your devices, hit the button, and BOOM, you’re switching between your Xbox, PlayStation, and whatever else you’ve got hooked up faster than I can quote a line from ‘The Silence of the Lambs.’And the picture quality? Oh, it’s crispier than my Aunt Edna’s fried chicken! 4K at 60Hz, baby! It’s like having a front-row seat to the greatest show on earth. Every detail is so sharp, you’ll think you’re right there in the middle of the action—whether you’re blowing stuff up in your favorite game or watching your favorite cable guy on TV.Setup is so easy, even my buddy Rick could do it—and he’s still trying to figure out how to program his VCR. Just plug it in, and it’s ready to go. No mess, no fuss, no having to wait on hold with customer service (trust me, I know what that’s like).In conclusion, if you want to make your home entertainment system as smooth as my way with a remote, get yourself the Anker HDMI Switch. It’s the key to unlocking endless fun and the ultimate way to stay connected. Remember, if you can’t decide which device to use next, with Anker, you don’t have to!

product_name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz Bi-Directional HDMI Splitter, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
description: Using as a video switch between 2 cameras in live stream application feeding single preview monitor. Overall, functional and works well. My only issue is a 2-3 second delay after pressing the switch. I need faster image change on my preview monitor. My low rating is only for the speed in which the image is displayed after changing input selections. Will test this weekend. Likely return due to switching speed.UPDATE: Not returning. Completed testing. Only 1/2 second slower than original switch that was flaky. Tested with this new switch during most recent livestream. Works like a charm! I'm working on my impatience! :)

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: This product gets 3 stars because it does the job. It certainly has it's downsides.The good:I think the idea is clever. I think the price is fair since you're receiving two trays for a little less than double the price. I think the openness of the design works in my favor. I think the provided cable management gadgets are thoughtful.The bad:The clamp and the mounting system are not well aligned. Usually when you have an arm or a mount, and you put a clamping force on it, it flattens and applies equal force to the contacting surface. This is not really the case here. The top of the mount is crooked even when the bottom of the mount (the clamp) is putting a whole lot of force on this. There is so much force that I can see the cushion being squeezed out. The trays themselves aren't too wobbly, but aren't completely rigid. I don't know how much other people put on their trays, but I have 5 power bricks resting on there, and I'm planning on adding a 6th, and this is not including the surge protector. I fully expect this to be a temporary solution to my cable problems because I expect the steel to undergo deformation overtime.

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: The coating quality is mediocre: grainy texture and not shiny. The metals are too thin to be structural sound. The rack will bend significantly if your feet caught on some cables and pull the cable and the rack.The rubber anti-slip pad are but cheapo thin sponge pads that does not do a great job.You feel like you can tighten the clamp forever because the metal yield and bend as you mount the rack to your desk.

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: It does the job but it’s very cheaply constructed and flimsy. Mine came with one of the threads crooked. See pictures

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: I purchased this to improve my office setup. I have a hub for my computer with several things plugged into that. I was using my keyboard drawer to house these pieces but realized it wasn’t easily accessible if I had to check a connection or change things, and I could not use that drawer for my keyboard.Install was as quick as I could turn the screws to secure it. Overall less than two minutes. Then some extra time to put everything in the organizer. The bonus is the other pieces for cable management that come with the product.  I am definitely happy with the outcome. I give it 5 Stars for being exactly what I expected.My only gripe is that I wished the “hooks” could be turned around. (They might, just never looked into it) They fold down into the tray/basket, which is convenient if I remove it and need to store somewhere in the future. But if I could mount it facing the other direction, the it would put the hub closer to the opening for the equipment and keep the basket further from my legs. (I’m pretty tall so the current setup I find my knees bump it every now and then).

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: I used these to clean up my work from home desk. I like how you can take dangling wires and hook them onto the tray edges to bring them up higher and tuck them away.  My desk has 3 monitors, each with 2 video cables going to 2 separate computers, a 2.1 speaker setup, 2 lamps, and many other wired accessories - it made a huge difference.

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: I like the first one so much, that I bought a second one. It's fairly compact in the box, it swivels open and you clamp it on. A bit easier than drilling additional holes, especially if you don't know where it will eventually end. End. Nice touch that it comes with some extra pieces of velcro and such. Until I find The Sweet spot to hang this, I am waiting to clean up all the wiring. That's what's so nice, is you're not forced to keep it in one spot if you don't like it. Just loosen the knobs and slide it over. If I had to pick a negative, I would say the metal is of thinner lesser quality. However, I don't think that would keep me or anyone else from using this.

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: man this just what the doctor ordered. my desk is clear of cables and there was enough room for a secound small power strip

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: Help me a lot at my work desk mess.

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: Exactly what I needed for my office!  Took minutes to set up and my wire mess is taken care of!

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: So, I picked up this Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray to try and wrangle the spaghetti monster living under my wife's desk. For $16.99 (with that sweet 11% discount), it seemed worth a shot.First off, the no-drill mounting is pretty slick. I was worried about messing up the desk, but this thing just clamps on. Easy peasy. The clamps have some anti-scratch pads too, which is nice. It fits desks from about half an inch to 2 inches thick, so it should work for most setups.The tray itself feels pretty solid. It's metal, so it's not gonna snap if you look at it funny. They say it can hold up to 17.6 pounds, which seems like overkill, but hey, better too strong than too weak, right?I like the mesh design. Makes it easy to snake cables in and out without having to disassemble everything. Plus, it keeps things cool, which is good if you've got power bricks down there.Now, it's not all sunshine and rainbows. The 15.7" length is decent, but if you've got a bigger desk or a ton of cables, you might need to grab a couple. And while the included cable ties and clips are handy, they're nothing fancy.Is it life-changing? Nah. But it does the job. My desk looks a lot cleaner now, and I'm not playing footsie with a tangle of wires anymore.Bottom line: If you're tired of your desk looking like a robot threw up under it, this tray is a solid option. It's not perfect, but for 17 bucks, it's hard to complain. Just don't expect it to solve all your cable management woes in one go.

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: Great value, sturdy, fit everything I needed to snuggly under my desk.  Cheers

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: Looking forward to cleaning up my under desk storage and getting  all the wires and builky power storage and laptop blocks off the floor!

product_name: Spacecare Under Desk Cable Management Tray, Cable Management Under Desk for Cord Organizer,15.7" No Drill Wire Organizer Cable Management Tray, Cable Tray Organizer with Clamp for Desk, Black 2 Pack
description: This attached to my desk easily and holds a large power strip and can hold quite a few cables to keep everything neat and tidy.

description: Focusing this binocular is a breeze. The center focus wheel is large, easy to turn and quick to adjust. They perform well in a variety of environments with good build quality and a smooth focusing mechanism.

product_name: 20x50 Binoculars for Adults, High Power Compact Waterproof Binoculars Telescope with Low Light Night Vision for Hunting Bird Watching Travel Football Games with Carrying Case and Strap
description: I believe these are the best under-$50 binocs you can find with this  large of an objective diameter and this high of a magnification. On the other hand, given the cost, I would be hesitant to rely on these for frequent, heavier duty use, like camping, hiking, travel, etc. Not sure how they'd hold up. product_name: 20x50 Binoculars for Adults, High Power Compact Waterproof Binoculars Telescope with Low Light Night Vision for Hunting Bird Watching Travel Football Games with Carrying Case and Strap

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)

description: The charging power works great. The build quality is lacking. Within a couple of months, both my blue and purple chargers experienced the same issue The foldable part loses integrity and won't stay sticking straight out when open. I have 2 other Anker chargers that aren't as fast, but are also foldable that haven't had any issues. Disappointed in these.

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: I was very happy with this charger. A quick charge. The color was nice, I could see which charger and cord was mine at a glance.Alas. The charger stopped working at almost exactly 1-year. I still use the high speed cord with another charger.I wrote to Anker, so far, no replacement.

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: The product is good but poor quality.The locking mechanism for the pins seems to be broken within months of use. As pins don’t stay put.The charger pins do not lock in place hence, making it almost non-functional.

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: I received on 12/2023 and the cube didn’t last for a year but barely six months. It will not charge any more. Unfortunately, the return window has closed. Anger is usually a reliable brand but I will be cautious moving forward.

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: Caution:  I purchased this unit as a business travel warrior to use something small with a collapsible swivel plug (as described). This would easily be rated 5 Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️, but the swivel action is so loose without a detent or latching mechanism to hold the plug in place.  If you try to plug in the adapter at a slight angle ~ the plug will swivel (collapse) up (or down).  Kind of annoying… I wish the swivel action (plug) had a snap / lock design.  Hey ~ charging speed and quality are great.  Easy / No Fuss Plug in connectivity into a wall ~ that is another story 😡…

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: Updated Review:Anker advertises the Nano 3 to be compatible with everything, unfortunately it is not. Anker charger does not work at all with Motorola or Lenovo Products for fast charging.Was contacted by Anker customer support team member Alieen. We troubleshooted the problem for hours/weeks only to discover directly from Anker that they *do not possess* the ability to match Motorolas charging technology with ANY of their chargers. I was very surprised to learn that Anker *does not* possess the technology to fast charge Motorola or Lenovo products.A lot of hours into troubleshooting this with no results, and at the end of the day, the Motorola charger is available for half of the cost. If you have a Motorola or Lenovo phone, or tablet, stick with Motorola branded charging technology, as Anker themselves claim they have no ability to support these products.I hope this information helps other Motorola buyers from having the same bad experience that I have had.Orginal review:Charge Time And Power VS OEM-This Anker 30W charger, was only able to achieve half it's power and charge time VS the original chargerDuring testing, it took more than double the time for a full charge with this Anker charger when compared to the original manufacturer.I was surprised to discover that the IQ technology was not as advertised. I expected this to atleast match or out preform the OEM charger.Also,The way the prongs are designed, I could see them snapping off in the wall if you are not careful, or, removing at an angle. Which has actually happened to others in these reviews.Cost:When you add up the cost of the Anker charger and the cable, some may pay more and get less performance then if they bought from the manufacturer.The good-Small design:Extremely small design. This is a very compact design. Could be very useful for tightspaces.Hope this information helps!

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: Works great. Small size and charges my new iPhone quickly. Doesn’t get too hot either. Very good value for the money.

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: I recently purchased the Anker 511 Charger (Nano 3) in Misty Blue, and I'm absolutely thrilled with its performance. This USB C GaN charger is a game-changer for anyone on the go. The compact size, at just 1.12 inches thick, is mind-blowing considering the 30W power it packs. It's a true technological marvel, 70% smaller than its predecessor, making it the ideal travel companion.What sets this charger apart is its versatility. With the upgraded Nano technology boasting a 30W output, it effortlessly charges everything from earbuds to smartphones, tablets, and even my MacBook Air. The high-speed charging capability is impressive, especially for my iPhone 13 Pro, reaching full-speed 30W charging. I was also pleasantly surprised by the rapid charge for my iPad Air (5th Generation), reaching 50% in just 45 minutes. Anker's ActiveShield 2.0 technology adds an extra layer of security, intelligently monitoring temperature to ensure my devices are always protected.The Anker 511 Charger comes with a welcome guide, a worry-free 24-month warranty, and Anker's renowned customer service. It's a compact powerhouse that delivers on every front. I can confidently say this charger has made a significant difference in my daily life, making it an absolute must-have for anyone in need of reliable and fast charging on the go. 5 out of 5 stars without a doubt!

description: Cord quality is good and it's weight & size is perfect for travel.

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: Compact little 30 watt charger. Purchased this to use with Ankers 3-in-1 cube MagSafe iPhone, Apple Watch and AirPods charger. Would give it 5 starts, but the folding mechanism for the prongs is a bit weak, a problem that is exacerbated when dealing with worn out outlets.

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: I love this little cube charger. I really like a lot of Anker products honestly. They’re good quality and they work and do what they say they will. I especially love that this power adapter is a cube size and not like the bulkier bricks. This way, I can have room to use all the spots on my power strip instead of my old cubes/bricks block other outlet spots. Even if I plug it into the wall, it fits that spot perfect. Same size as the Apple 5W charging cube, but mucchhhh better power output with the 20W. Plus I love that it’s a light blue and the prongs can fold into the cube. I hated having cubes or blocks where you couldn’t fold the prongs in because I have mesh pockets in my bag and the prongs would get caught in the holes and stretch or rip.

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: Love the size! There's always the clutter and the inability to get various charging blocks to fit on a power strip, well until now. Not to mention when you decide to take it with you when you leave home, it's size becomes a major plus. All that and it sends my S23 into super fast charging! I will be buying a couple more, just to use for the laptop and mamma's Flip5. Another great product from Anker!

product_name: Anker Nano Charger, USB C GaN Charger 30W, PIQ 3.0 Foldable PPS Fast Charger for iPhone 16/15 and More Series, Galaxy, iPad, Compatible with MagSafe (Black, 1pack & 1cable)
description: As stated in the headline, an Anker purchase has always been a great purchase.  This was purchased for my wife and no problems with it, as with any other Anker products that I have purchased.  She needed a charger and I immediately just went and ordered her an Anker.  I cannot express how easy it is in this day and age to have a "go to product" that you can trust.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Prepare yourself for an awe-inspiring journey into the realm of sound! Brace your senses as I unveil the marvel that is this audio system. Let me regale you with a tale of its auditory prowess, commanding bass, and the astounding convenience of its remote control. Oh, and let's not forget about the seamless ease of its setup process. Ah, what a wondrous experience it was!Alas, as I embark on recounting my encounter with this masterpiece, I must confess a sorrowful truth that weighs heavily upon my heart: the abominable monster lurking within its Bluetooth connectivity. At first, it was a beacon of hope, radiating flawless wireless connection for a glorious month. Oh, the melodies danced through the air, embracing my ears with sheer delight!Yet, like an insidious serpent, a poisonous fog began to creep into this sonic paradise. An odd crackle dared to infiltrate the symphony, faint and negligible at first. Alas, my dear friend, that seemingly harmless crackle grew with malicious intent. It devoured my auditory pleasure, morphing into an uninhibited viral infection that unleashed a relentless barrage of stuttering, loud crackling. Oh, the horror! At this point, it had become nothing short of an abomination, rendering the system utterly useless.Fear not, for fortune smiled upon me in the form of a trusty laptop, equipped with a simple yet marvelous headphone jack. Thus, I turned to this faithful companion, reconnecting with the sheer bliss of crystal-clear sound that this system is undeniably capable of producing. Ah, what sweet relief it brought to my distraught soul!In conclusion, my dear compatriots of sonic wonder, I implore you to approach this audio system with cautious admiration. Revel in its glorious sound, revel in its powerful bass, and revel in the utter convenience of its dependable remote control. But beware the fickle nature of its Bluetooth connectivity, for it may lead you down a treacherous path of crackling chaos. Should such a misfortune befall you, take solace in the alternative of utilizing a trusty headphone jack, which shall once again restore your auditory nirvana. May your journey through sound be filled with both euphoria and precaution, my friends!

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: For a basic sound bar, it's OK. I bought it because I wanted to get rid of my outdated speakers which were those speakers that come with 4 small speakers and one woofer, all wired! So I bought this and it said that the optical connection is preferred, so I thought I'd try it. The optical cord is only about 3 feet so it certainly limits the placement of it. The description said it was bluetooth and it does connect to the TV, however, I was thinking listening to it via bluetooth headphones. You can't do that or plug headphones into the bar. A big thing that I miss is having the volume bar show up on the TV. There is no indication as to what level the volume is. Also, now I have another remote to carry around. Finally, the directions are for every model of sound bars they make. I had to read and re-read the directions to figure out which model I had. For basic sound, it will work. Personally, I'd spend a little more for a few more bells and whistles.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Have a Hisense Roku TV and wanted to add a sound bar.  Unfortunately the TV does not let you add a wired connection using the Optical cable. Works fine with a HDMI cable. Sound is adequate for a bedroom.  The cables mount from the back of the speaker and using a HDMI cable with a molded end projects about 5/8" past the back of the speaker.  Purchased a 270* HDMI adapter but it doesn't stand off enough to allow another cable to be plugged in.  There is not a pathway for the cords if the speaker is mounted on the wall.  Purchased a Fire Stick that will work with the Optical Cable.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: The sound bar itself is good; the one problem I encountered with it is that you cannot control it with a universal remote control. That means you must use the control that came with it. Bummer!!

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Issue is with the Remote, skips the Video or track when trying to + - the bass

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: I bought this speaker because I have a small, older Samsung TV in my laundry room.  The sound is horrible, and it is not Bluetooth-capable. I have been looking for a decent, inexpensive speaker to use with it for some time.  I thought this was going to be it.  I did not realize it does not come with audio/RCA cables, but I thought the optical would work fine.  However, I was wrong. I tried to hook it up via optical, and it emits this horrible static sound.  I thought it could just be the TV, so I tried a different TV, and the same thing happened. Finding the correct RCA cables and a speaker that will work with them is difficult, but I guess that is what I will have to do.  Of note is that the speaker works with my other TV via Bluetooth, but that was not the reason for my purchase.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Este producto se puede comprar aunque por el precio no es de un sonido excelente pues es de bajo costo

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: The product worked and sounded fine, but you had to constantly go into setting and change dolby dts off. Some streaming services kept reverting back and it was frustrating to use.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Less than half the price of the big brand soundbars and this thing sounds absolutely incredible! Was easy to set up, lightweight and easy to mount or place somewhere, getting a free Roku TV mouse to go with it is absolutely great. Definitely worth the extremely cheap price point.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: This sound bar is perfect if you are looking for a cheap, quick little boost of sound. The built-in sub woofer in the sound bar is VERY nice. You can definitely hear the bass working. The sound quality is very nice. And you can really turn the volume up without any distortion. And the design feels very solid.I would definitely tell anyone to buy this soundbar. Again I love the built-in sub woofer sound.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: The volume is great, and it sounds good in most cases. This works so much better than computer built in speakers, and a lot better than a clip-on speaker made for computers that was supposed to be good according to reviews here.For a small soundbar it has decent bass and OK stereo imaging. The Bluetooth and the 3.5mm inputs work fine, I haven't had an opportunity to use the subwoofer output so I can't comment on that.The remote works OK, but the various tone controls like music, news, and movie don't seem to do much. The remote doesn't come with batteries, and I guess it didn't claim to come with them, but just have a set of AAA ready if you want to use the remote.The flaw that I hear is hissing instead of proper sound reproduction at low volumes. It sounds like shh-shh-shhh as people are speaking or music is playing. At first I thought it was my computer soundcard, and I tried multiple soundcards, multiple computer settings and multiple software drivers on my computer. I played with turning the volume on this device up, and the computer volume down and vise-versa. Then I tried it with my phone over Bluetooth, and the same shh-shh-shh effect was there.So all I can conclude is it is just that the device is unable to produce usable sound at low volumes, and instead it comes across as noise, scratching or hissing. If you listen at moderate or loud volumes, it probably will be fine. But if you are wanting to listen at low volumes, it can be annoying.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Absolutely amazing surprise!For such a low priced item I was very skeptical.I am a sound guy and listen to a lot of music. This soundbar fills my fairly large living area with amazing Bass, mid-range, treble and everything in between.Also paired easily to my fire stick remote. Bonus!

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Easy setup, sound is decent, works well, perfect for what I wanted, a closer speaker at my bedside so I didn’t have to blast my bedroom tv at night, came with 5 yr mfg warranty

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Perfect! Excellent sound, great price. Easy to use. Has a remote. I love it. Use it everyday.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Update: My tv was recently taken out due to a thunderstorm. My small nitpick at the end of this review has become a huge problem. The replacement tv no longer supports RCA hookups, replacing them with  HDMI eArc. Since this soundbar doesn’t have a HDMI connection, and doesn’t allow you to program a remote, I can no longer control the volume without the soundbar remote.  I’ll probably end up replacing this unit so I can return to one remote functioning.I purchased this speaker before for my bedroom, although it had a different name brand, and I didn’t get the subwoofer. I just wanted the cheapest soundbar with good reviews I could find. I was actually surprised by how well it sounded.I decided to replace an older system in my living room.  Since I was happy with my earlier purchase, I searched my orders for the same speaker. When I clicked on buy again I was taken to a speaker that looked exactly the same, but with a different name. The price was still very good, so I decided to go ahead and purchase it this time with the subwoofer. It turns out this is the same speaker, and it sounds even better with the subwoofer.Overall a great deal for a good sounding soundbar.  Small nitpick:  don’t like that you can’t use a programmable remote or cable remote to control the speaker. I programmed my tv to control the volume, but still need the remote to turn the speaker on and off. Otherwise I’m happy with this soundbar.

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: I bought this soundbar to hopefully fix my TV's volume issue. I received it quickly, attempted to connect it, but I couldn't get sound when using antenna channels but when I switched it to my Firestick, the sound was great. So I contacted the seller & after a few back & forths with different suggestions that didn't work, they sent me a new soundbar (for free) with different connection options. It was delivered promptly. I was excited to finally get things working! Alas, after following each instruction exactly several times, and using some very colorful language, I had the same issue. No sound when using the antenna, but great sound when using Firestick. I contacted seller again & after another bout of back & forths, they advised me to contact my TV manufacturer. I contacted them & they told me they no longer make TVs so they could not help me. I then contacted a repairman who was experienced with my brand of TV, & he said it was probably easier to just replace the TV.So, I contacted the seller to let them know the end result that I was giving up. They were very kind, patient, & helpful throughout this whole ordeal.The soundbar itself has a great sound when it is hooked up to the Firestick, so I know it works great!Definitely recommend, if only for the customer service. They are awesome!

product_name: RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar TV Speakers with Customized Bass Reflector, Compact Design and Easy Set up, Home Audio Surround Sound System for TV PC Projector, Wall Mountable
description: Purchased a sound bar the 26 Sep 2022, the name on the sound bar said (SAIYIN). EXCELLENT. Based on how satisfied I was with the product, August of this year 2023. I went to my order history and decided that I am going to do a second purchase of the item. I did, however when it arrived, the name on it was (RIOWOIS). I said this can't be good, the very fact it is just a bunch of vowels with some consonants creating a word that can not be pronounce. I realized that this can not be good.Anyways, I unboxed, set up. I realized the audio from AUX is very low, bluetooth connects easily but the sound quality takes too much of a high volume level for you to really get the punch.The OPTICAL connection was what puts this product completely in the trash-can. When I connected the sound bar to my TV OPTICAL connection, there was absolutely no audio sound except for a loud interference similar to a transmission from a two way radio.Why would a seller advertise something with a  different name than what the product actually is? Why? Why would a seller use a different name to sell a product?This action is utterly deceiving, cunning and unfair and this kind of behavior should not make it on amazon. Online shoppers need the truth about a product. Is not like you are walking into a store and being assisted by a store attendant.Even at the point of check out the product was still saying (SAIYIN), it was when the product got shipped, that was the time they updated the name to whatever this is (RIOWOIS).This is misleading and Amazon need to conduct a better stream line of the products that are being sold on their platform.This product is a complete piece of garbage and it needs to be treated for what it is. Toss in the garbage bin. VERY VERY VERY BAD PRODUCT.AUG 25, 2023. Ok, so after receiving my item I was pretty upset based on the distortion that i heard in the system. I wrote my initial review based on how I was feeling. However the seller reached out to me.Very curtious, kind, understanding with a 100% professionalism. The seller informed me of some methods that I could try to achive the best sound quality and also some trouble shooting information.The seller even go as far as replacing the item, I am super happy with the great assistance and rhe great customer service from this seller.Just a word of advice to customers, (sometimes before we write reviews based on how unsatisfied we are, contact the seller first and try to see how best the seller can assist). This seller has really opened my eyes to a whole nother level of cutomer service and I would definitely purchase from this seller again.Even if its not about the product but the level of professionalism was the element that won everything.Rest assure as soon as I received the new item, I will be updating this review again.UPDATE TUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 26, 2023.Received the new replacement, set it up and put it to a full system test. works fine in every way, I am completely satisfied with the level of professionalism and the customer service experience. I would definitely  purchase from this seller once more. Sometimes it is not really about the product, most times it's the approach that the seller takes in creating a unique experience for customers and or potential customers. Great job in handling this situation and thanks a million for resolving this issue.Much appreciated.

description: Ich hatte mich für diese entschieden, da es nur wenige Rezessionen gab, die einen Hautausschlag erwähnten. Trotzdem testete ich erst ein Pflaster für ein paar Stunden auf meinem Arm, dort kam es nicht zu einer Reaktion. Auf dem Bauch, über den Wunden, zeigte sich nach einer Nacht aber leider ein Ausschlag. Nicht unter der gesammten Klebefläche sondern nur an einem kleinen Stück davon, dicht am Rand. Der Ausschlag schmerzt nicht, ist aber geschwollen und juckt etwas.Preislich sind die Pflaster sehr gut, sie hafteten auch ausreichend, besser als die vom Arzt. Trotzdem muss ich nun leider andere nehmen.Nachtrag: Ich hatte die Wundpflaster in 2 Größen bestellt (7x5 und 10x6), beide haben zu einem leichten Ausschlag geführt. Das Verhältnis von Größe zu Nutzfläche ist bei der 10x6 Version viel schlechter:7x5 -> 4 x 2.5 Nutzfläche (ca. 29%)10x6 -> 5 x 2.5 Nutzfläche (ca. 21%)der Rest ist jeweils die Klebefläche.

product_name: SUREWO Magnetic Quick Release Adjustable Chest Mount Harness Compatible with Go pro Hero 13/12/11/10/9/8/7/6/5 Black,DJI Osmo Action 4/3/2,Insta 360 ONE R and More
description: This is exactly what I was looking for. It is absolutely flawlessly Perfect.It is very simple to don and extremely comfortable to wear. The magnet is super strong and holds your GoPro in place no matter what you are doing.I bought this mount specifically for scuba diving so I can be hands-free.But I’m sure I will find other uses for it.

product_name: SUREWO Magnetic Quick Release Adjustable Chest Mount Harness Compatible with Go pro Hero 13/12/11/10/9/8/7/6/5 Black,DJI Osmo Action 4/3/2,Insta 360 ONE R and More

description: works as intended, no issue with attachment, removal, easy to use and still going strong after months

product_name: SUREWO Magnetic Quick Release Adjustable Chest Mount Harness Compatible with Go pro Hero 13/12/11/10/9/8/7/6/5 Black,DJI Osmo Action 4/3/2,Insta 360 ONE R and More
description: Awesome harness! I am coming to love (strong) magnets as I get older. Having to rely on locking mechanisms that can sometimes malfunction in a pinch is stressful, so magnets that work well are my favorite. I film bike videos, and I’m often on uneven, frankly pisspoor pavement, so the fact that this can hold my multiple hundred dollar camera in place is not just a little blast of bliss and serotonin, or peace of mind, but it means I get stable footage every time. I used to use a hat mount, but hats can fall off or blow off, and/or make your forehead sweatier. This is a perfect solution that gives me only slightly different perspective with the trade off being less stuff on my head while riding a bike! For that, this gets five stars

product_name: SUREWO Magnetic Quick Release Adjustable Chest Mount Harness Compatible with Go pro Hero 13/12/11/10/9/8/7/6/5 Black,DJI Osmo Action 4/3/2,Insta 360 ONE R and More
description: I have a few Surewo mounts and I like that the ones I have all have interchangeable mounts so I can easily swap from device to device fairly quickly.The magnet on here is fairly strong and I don't have any worries of the magnet failing and my cam falling. I especially like that if the weather isn't the greatest, I can wear the mount under a light jacket and the magnet is still strong enough to keep the camera from falling off.

product_name: SUREWO Magnetic Quick Release Adjustable Chest Mount Harness Compatible with Go pro Hero 13/12/11/10/9/8/7/6/5 Black,DJI Osmo Action 4/3/2,Insta 360 ONE R and More
description: The quick detach magnet is a good feature, so you can put another layer like a rain jacket on and the still attach the camera. Just be aware that you can knock it off accidentally if you bump it hard.

product_name: SUREWO Magnetic Quick Release Adjustable Chest Mount Harness Compatible with Go pro Hero 13/12/11/10/9/8/7/6/5 Black,DJI Osmo Action 4/3/2,Insta 360 ONE R and More
description: This is a very customizable and well-built camera harness system. Designed especially for specific GoPro cameras (a few other competing products are compatible), ensure yours is listed and give it a good workout before the Amazon return period expires.The magnet is very strong but I would not trust it through thick clothing like anything more than a thin rain jacket. The fit is very customizable, but larger individuals may want to consider some other way of using your camera hands-free like a backpack or helmet mount. Users of heavy cameras like the DJI Osmo Pocket 3 may not be satisfied with this according to reviews elsewhere. And you could lose your camera if you land in something of a slide like in skiing/snowboarding because that is how you remove the mount from the harness: sliding them apart.All in all, a good product that will keep your body cam shots very smooth.My rating system:5 Stars = Knocks it out of the park. A great value!4 Stars = Excellent product. A solid buy.3 Stars = It provides some value, but perhaps not as advertised.2 Stars = A little dubious, so do your research. Read the critical reviews!1 Star = Avoid this product and look elsewhere.

product_name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds Ear Buds Workout Headphones 5.3 Invisible Mini Earbud with Mic & LED Display Charging Case IPX7 Waterproof Sports Stereo Sound Earphones for Phone Gym Exercise Running Black

Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds Ear Buds Workout Headphones 5.3 Invisible Mini Earbud with Mic & LED Display Charging Case IPX7 Waterproof Sports Stereo Sound Earphones for Phone Gym Exercise Running Black
description: I recently bought these earbuds, and they have some solid features, especially considering the price.The compact size of the case is one of the best aspects. It fits easily in my pocket, making it convenient to carry around.The fit of the earbuds is comfortable and secure. They stay in place even during workouts, and I haven't had to adjust them much. The multiple ear tip sizes included are helpful for finding the right fit.The Bluetooth connection is quick and reliable. Pairing with my phone was straightforward, and the connection has been stable without any noticeable dropouts.The sound quality has a strong bass, which is great for music lovers. However, if you listen to a lot of vocal-heavy content, the performance is not as impressive. Vocals tend to get a bit overshadowed by the bass.One minor downside is the touch controls. It would be nice if a single earbud could control both volume up and down, but currently, you need to use both earbuds to adjust the volume.Considering the affordable price, these earbuds are a great deal.

description: Are your kids being extra noisy? More annoying than usual? More chatty than they are typically, because they have done something wrong and therefore want to overload you with verbal vomit in the hopes that you shutdown and tune out from reality for a while, allowing them to escape punishment? Or perhaps you and your spouse have found a reason to argue, and they have lots to say about the to-do list that only seems to be getting longer? Or perhaps you have recently taken an interest in chickens – and the latest batch of fertilized eggs you gave  your broody hen have hatched and grown to be 16 weeks old. So cute! Well, until 3 of the little creatures started crowing! If any of this sounds familiar, then let me help you… buy the Songbird Stereo Bluetooth Headset Earphones! These things are great. The sound quality is clear, with deep bass and crisp highs. They're lightweight and comfortable, perfect for long listening sessions. The battery life is impressive, as they lasted all day for me on a single charge. Pairing is easy enough, and the connection is stable even at a distance. The built-in microphone delivers clear call quality. The noise-canceling feature works wonderfully, blocking out background noise effectively. I was able to mow several lawns and despite a noisy mower, could still hear the podcast & music that I was listening to. Overall, these earphones offer exceptional value for the price. You cannot beat these headphones when the price is considered - highly recommend for music lovers, frequent callers, overwhelmed parents, disgruntled spouses, and chicken (well, rooster) owners alike!

description: The world of wireless earbuds is competitive, with numerous brands vying for the top spot. Amidst this sea of options, Zingbird Earbuds stand out as a beacon of quality, innovation, and value. After trying these earbuds, I can confidently say they offer an exceptional audio experience that deserves high praise.Design and ComfortThe first thing you'll notice about the Zingbird Earbuds is their sleek and modern design. The earbuds come in a compact, ergonomically designed case that easily fits into your pocket or bag. The build quality is impressive, with a sturdy yet lightweight feel that exudes durability. The matte finish not only looks premium but also resists fingerprints, keeping the earbuds looking pristine.Comfort is a critical factor for any earbuds, and Zingbird excels in this area. The earbuds come with multiple sizes of silicone ear tips, ensuring a snug and comfortable fit for all users. This customization is crucial for prolonged use, as it minimizes ear fatigue and ensures the earbuds stay securely in place, whether you're running, working out, or just relaxing at home. I have a pair of Bose earbuds and these can compete in the same arena, but at a fraction of the price.

description: I use two sets of earbuds, One for my laptop and one for my phone. The 'laptop' set started acting up, so it was time for a new one. I am very happy with the Zingbird T62 earbuds. The case is compact and has a modern look. The cover is a smoked plastic. This allows you to see the charge percentage of the case. The numbers are nice and large. It is very convenient to know when you need to charge the case.When you take the earbuds out  of the case, the first thing that you notice is that they are small, with a very sleek design. They come out of the case easily. They are very comfortable to wear. One of the most comfortable sets that I have owned. They paired easily, both with my laptop and with my phone.The sound was very clear.  I am very happy with these earbuds.

product_name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds Ear Buds Workout Headphones 5.3 Invisible Mini Earbud with Mic & LED Display Charging Case IPX7 Waterproof Sports Stereo Sound Earphones for Phone Gym Exercise Running Black
description: The Zingbird T62 earbuds hit the sweet spot for budget-minded listeners who prioritize comfort, portability, and everyday functionality. Priced under $30, it offers a feature set that punches above their weight.Let's start with the user-winning design. The lightweight earbuds ensure fatigue-free listening for extended periods. They include three different ear tip sizes (small, medium, and large) to guarantee a secure and comfortable fit for all ear shapes. No more worries about earbuds popping out during workouts or commutes!Smart touch controls located on each bud elevate the user experience. With a simple tap, you can manage music playback (play/pause, skip tracks), adjust volume, and even activate your voice assistant – all without pulling out your phone. It's a seamless and hands-free listening experience.The IPX7 water resistance rating is a bonus for active users. These earbuds can handle sweat and light rain, making them ideal for workouts or jogs.In a nutshell, the Zingbird T62 earbuds are a compelling choice for everyday use. They're comfortable, portable, and deliver long battery life, all at an attractive price point. Whether you're commuting, working out, or simply unwinding with audiobooks, the Zingbird T62 earbuds are a convenient and budget-friendly companion.

product_name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds Ear Buds Workout Headphones 5.3 Invisible Mini Earbud with Mic & LED Display Charging Case IPX7 Waterproof Sports Stereo Sound Earphones for Phone Gym Exercise Running Black
description: I primarily use these with my Google Pixel 7 and the short version is that they are awesome ear buds, especially for the price!Longer version:I think we're in a point of time where you don't need to spend over $100 for a really good pair of ear buds, wired or wireless. The sound is very well balanced. I usually like to test audio devices with jazz and they offer up a lot of clarity. They aren't the bassiest ears buds so you might not get some of those super low bass tones you might want in hip hop or EDM, but at this price point I think they're clear enough.For me, they were super easy to pair with my Pixel 7 which I really appreciate. I think that they're pretty comfortable and are discreet once you put them on. I honestly forget I have them on when wearing them. From personal experience I can also confirm they are durable and at least somewhat waterproof. I accidentally left these in the washer once. After I took them out and let them dry for a bit, they worked perfectly fine.Overall, great budget wireless earbuds!
