product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: Over the years, I have tried many of these types of products instead of canned air.  Early products didn’t seem to have enough air velocity to be a real replacement for canned air, but still functioned well enough for cleaning and blowing away dust from circuits and delicate surfaces.  As these products have evolved over the years, they have become more and more useful.  This product is really useful.  It has sufficient force and velocity, and the battery lasts a decent amount of time to get most jobs done.  The battery, even with a rapid charger, doesn’t seem to take charge as fast as it should.  But that is not a very big issue.I think that this would be a more useful product if the vacuum attachment could have a round adapter that could accept the “crevice” nozzle as a vacuum attachment for working in narrow spaces.The tube could’ve been packaged better.  It was simply rolled into a bag which caused it to have kinks.

product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: Overall, this product does a very good job. Has both a vacuum and a dusting side to the device which is a two in one item. It's small and compact so carrying it and storage is not an issue, it also has a nice handle combined with the lightweight of it makes it easy to use. One issue I have with the product itself is when using the vacuum side to be careful of hand placement or you may just power it down by accident. It's got three settings but all settings do their job very well whether its the low setting or the high power setting. The device itself is not loud but does not sacrifice power for quietness. Changeable tops for different uses like cleaning my gaming pc which it did a good job of doing! Big issue for me was the hose when the package arrived. The package itself did have holes from damaged shipping and the hose ended up being bent/creased inside of its respective package which was disappointing but overall for around 32 dollars I'd say it's worth a buy for small uses.

product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: We bought this to clean our keyboards, couches and cars and it does an excellent job of all three. It is very high quality. The charging takes just a few hours and it lasts for about 3 hours of constant use. The suction/blowing power is excellent. The attachments allow it to be very versatile for all types of cleaning. I also use this a lot for cleaning video game systems which have a lot of small crevices. The price for what you get out of this is amazing. These are definitely worth buying!

product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: Let me tell you about my new favorite gadget – the CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster. It's like having three tools in one! From blowing dust out of my keyboard to vacuuming crumbs off my car seats, this thing does it all. Plus, it's eco-friendly and cost-effective, saving me from buying endless cans of air. The three-speed settings and LED lights make cleaning a breeze, even in those hard-to-reach spots. And with its cordless design and long-lasting battery, I can tackle cleaning tasks anywhere, anytime. Thanks, CLEVAST, for making my cleaning routine so much easier!

product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: We are always needing an air duster and wanted to stop having to buy cans of the air spray for different things. This tool has shown to be the perfect tool to have on hand for that!It works just as expected! It comes with many different little accessories to attach to it for using it as an Air Duster or you can switch it and use it as a small suction vacuum. My husband has loved this for so many different little tasks around the house when he needs it. Either for air duster on his fix-it projects or keyboard for work. Or if he just needs a quick little vacuum to clean up a small mess.The only decrease in star is when the attachments are used, mainly the brush attachment, the suction for the vacuum decreases a bit. So it isn't as powerful during that time.

product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: I ordered this little air compressor/vacuum to have compressed air to blow off my keyboards.  I never expected it to be such a versatile tool.This is the size of a small hair dryer and is an air compressor and a mini vacuum,  all in one.  It is charged via a USB cord and has ten or so attachments.  It has 3 speeds.  I first used the compressed air for keyboards and it worked great.  It says it will inflate a pool tube, but I have not tried it.  I have a robot vacuum cleaner, and have always had my husband blow out the filter and box with his air compressor.  No more!  This little tool does a great job cleaning the filter and box and is is just the right size.So, next was the mini-vac.  You basically screw on the plastic attachment that captures the dust, and plug on an attachment to the other end.  I used it to vacuum lamp shades, to clean honeycomb blinds and to vacuum louvered closet doors.  It has just the right amount of strength for those small tasks!  I used it about 45 minutes on a single change.The only thing I don't like is that the on/off switch is one the handle.  I keep accidentally hitting it.  It would work better on the side of the body, but this is not a deal breaker.  This is a small tool for small jobs.  It is not a leaf blower or full size vac, but for my little tasks, it rocks!

product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: This machine is very handy when you need it. It’s not quite as powerful as a can of compressed air, but for being wireless it’s way more powerful than what I was expecting. I have used it on my keyboard and on my standing fan so far. Dust can build up in there quickly, and this really helped. For the convenience of it, I think it’s well worth the price.

product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: I was actually surprised as to how much suction power this small Vacuum/Blower actually had and it works quite well for cleaning out the dust in and around my PC. I will say the way the Bristle Brush Attachment for the Vacuum is made doesn't give enough suction when used. I believe this is due to the lack of bristles causing it to suck air from the sides instead of what you are using it on and this makes that attachment mostly useless.Also, it doesn't make sense why there is an LED light blasting in your face when you use the Vacuum mode. I have to place my thumb on it just so it doesn't blind me while I'm trying to use it and it would of made more sense to have a light on both sides with a switch. Aside from that the battery has a fairly good charge on it and can last over 10 minutes on high power, which is quite good for this size.

product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: This is a good air duster. Not the best vacuum but good air duster.There are a large number of attachments. Pretty much covers just about everything.Battery life is actually pretty good on this. I charged it up when I first got it and used it for over a month before charging it again.This also has a vacuum function. It is okay but I don’t use it. It just doesn’t have the suction power to make it worth it. Maybe for some crumbs but nothing more.It is still very useable as a duster.

product_name: CLEVAST Compressed Air Duster - 3 Gear 110000RPM Electric Air Duster, 3 in 1 Versatile with LED - Cordless Dust Blower & Mini Vacuum & Inflating for PC, Computer, Keyboard, Rechargeable Canned Air
description: So far, I have used this to detail my car.  I detail at least once a week, so I am meticulous when it comes to cleaning and the products I choose to use.  Comes with a variety of attachments to make cleaning the car easier.  The three different power modes of intensity allow for easy adaption for the specific area you are cleaning.  Attachments can get into the nooks and crannies and blows out debris with ease.  Smaller design of product is easy to manipulate and lightweight.  Easy to charge and has not yet run out of a charge when I use, and I use it for an extended time.

product_name: OPOQO Portable Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth - Electric Focus & Auto Keystone & Zoom, Full HD 1080P Supported Outdoor Movie Projector, Compatible with iOS/Android/TV Stick/HDMI/PS5 (Brown)
description: I am extremely impressed with this mini projector! The WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities make it incredibly convenient to connect to all my devices, whether I’m using iOS, Android, or even a PS5. The FHD 1080P resolution delivers stunning picture quality, and the 200 ANSI lumens ensure bright and clear images, even in moderately lit rooms. I love the electric focus and auto keystone correction feature, which makes it so much easier to set up compared to other projectors I’ve used—no more blurry corners or distorted images! The ability to zoom from 100% to 50% is a great touch, especially when I need to adjust the screen size without moving the projector itself.Overall, this is a fantastic, portable projector that’s perfect for outdoor movie nights or casual home theater setups. The build quality is solid, and the Bluetooth 5.2 connection ensures smooth streaming without lag. Great value for the price, especially with the 30% coupon available! Highly recommended!

product_name: OPOQO Portable Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth - Electric Focus & Auto Keystone & Zoom, Full HD 1080P Supported Outdoor Movie Projector, Compatible with iOS/Android/TV Stick/HDMI/PS5 (Brown)
description: The OPOQO mini projector is a versatile 1080p projector designed for home entertainment, gaming, and presentations. With Bluetooth and Wi-Fi capabilities, it supports a large projection size of up to 200 inches. It takes a few clicks to connect IOS or Android device wirelessly to it. I tested it with Fire TV, Apple TV as well as PC. It worked like a charm.Pros• Excellent image quality with vibrant colors and good brightness.• Large projection size suitable for various viewing environments.• Multiple connectivity options enhance versatility.• Good for gaming with low input lag.• Long lamp life for reduced maintenance.• Easy to set up and operate, making it user-friendly.Cons• Built-in speaker may not be sufficient for very larger rooms; consider external audio options.ConclusionThe OPOQO mini projector is a solid choice for anyone looking to create an immersive viewing experience at home. Its impressive image quality, large projection capabilities, and versatile connectivity options, including Bluetooth and Wi-Fi, make it suitable for movies, gaming, and presentations. The simplicity of use further enhances its appeal, making it accessible for all users.RecommendationBefore making a purchase, consider your specific needs, such as room size and intended use. Checking user reviews and comparisons with similar models can help ensure it meets your expectations.

product_name: OPOQO Portable Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth - Electric Focus & Auto Keystone & Zoom, Full HD 1080P Supported Outdoor Movie Projector, Compatible with iOS/Android/TV Stick/HDMI/PS5 (Brown)
description: This mini projector exceeded my expectation during my recent trip where TV wasn’t available. It will now be used in a spare bedroom as a replacement for my aging TV.Straight out of the box the projector was easy to setup. It connected instantly to Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. Anyone familiar with Android shouldn't have any trouble with this unit. Once connected and setup, the projector worked flawlessly.The projector can be used in just about any reasonable position.This projector support wireless connection and full Hd 1080P resolution. It can adjust the brightness and the screen sizes. It works at outdoor and indoor. Also this mini projector quality is good and it is worth it.The picture quality is fantastic, especially considering the size. The colors are rich and the image is clear, even when I'm projecting outdoors.Overall, I'm very happy with this projector. It's a great option for anyone who wants a portable, high-quality projector for both indoor and outdoor use.

Has great speaker and can also connect to Bluetooth speaker. Great picture quality for up to the advertised size.

product_name: OPOQO Portable Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth - Electric Focus & Auto Keystone & Zoom, Full HD 1080P Supported Outdoor Movie Projector, Compatible with iOS/Android/TV Stick/HDMI/PS5 (Brown)
description: I like how easy this thing is to move around and set up. The focus on the remote is cool, the speakers are mid at best but there is bluetooth. My old project didn't have bluetooth. 720p is not ideal but for the price with the coupon it seems like a decent buy.

product_name: OPOQO Portable Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth - Electric Focus & Auto Keystone & Zoom, Full HD 1080P Supported Outdoor Movie Projector, Compatible with iOS/Android/TV Stick/HDMI/PS5 (Brown)
description: The mini projector was easy to set up and use. Does have a proprietary power supply which shouldn't be a problem as long as you don't lose the cable. The zoom is nice and it does have a screw attachment at the bottom for use with stands.I figured out that with the screen mirroring on Apple devices, you can just connect the projector to your phone's hotspot, and the projector will show up in Airplay/screen mirroring list. No need to connect both your phone and the projector to a separate wifi network- saves a lot of hassle.

product_name: OPOQO Portable Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth - Electric Focus & Auto Keystone & Zoom, Full HD 1080P Supported Outdoor Movie Projector, Compatible with iOS/Android/TV Stick/HDMI/PS5 (Brown)
description: Nice projector for backyard movie nights, the carrying handle makes it really easy to take it wherever you are heading. We have been using it to keep the kids entertained in the evening. It's bright enough to be used during daytime (although I would recommend pulling heavy curtains). The autofocus is just brilliant, the last projector we had was a manual focus on and took 10-15 mins to set up. I'd recommend pairing with a nice set of portable speakers for the ultimate on the go movie experience. Highly recommended buy at this price range

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: Several years ago I switched from Brother printers to Canon. This piece of junk reminds me why. When I needed to replace the Canon that had served me quite well for 6 yrs (prior Canon lasted 5), it was for cosmetic reasons; printer still worked. This time Canons with features I need were all too large and heavy. So I took a chance on Brother. How bad could it be, right? Answer: VERY bad.My main requirement for a printer, besides the obvious, is an ADF. Other lasers I saw with that feature were bulky and heavy. The Brother came and no wonder it was so light. It looked and felt like a toy. I'd say it performed like a toy, but it would have to improve to garner that much credit.First, who the #!%$&* thought it would be a good idea to design a printer that requires user to go in BACK of the printer to clear a paper jam?! Every office I've ever worked in, every home office I've ever had, printers are against a wall. I have yet to see one sitting in the middle of a room. For certain types of jams, I have to pull printer out about a foot or so, turn printer around, then clear the jam.WHY MUST I REPEATEDLY HAVE TO "RECOVER" WIRELESS CONNECTION?  No such thing as a quick print job--at least not the first print job of the day. I never turn off the printer, but do turn off my PC every night. Next day, every day, I have to go into printer settings, choose "Recover WLAN," wait about 5-10 minutes for document to print. I've learned to fix breakfast while it warms up, wakes up, or whatever it's doing all that time.Those are the biggies. More minor annoyances:  Screen doesn't stay lit. Very strange defaults, some of which I still don't know how to disable or change--assuming that's even possible. I've used printers for 25+ years. I've had Epson, HP, Canon; Canon being best, but all were ready to go once set up--and stayed ready till they gave out. My 1998 printers were better than this Brother.Okay, so will it print from my phone or tablet?  Yes, both. But that doesn't make up for its many inadequacies.Scan?  Yes. Adequate I suppose.Fax?  I've had no reason to try that.Obviously, I DO NOT RECOMMEND this Brother printer.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: Wonderfully clear, easy to use.Printer speed and quality are both great

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: In a home office setting with small daily print jobs, the original as-bought toner cartridge is exhausted in a little over one month!  It's not the TN830 XL they recommend to replace it, but quite evidently a lesser fill.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: I bought this under the impression that I would be avoiding most of the annoyances of other printer brands (HP). I thought that with a Brother printer, things would "just work" without too much fuss. It turns out that almost all of the annoyances found in other printers are also found in this one.For starters, Brother's product lines are incomprehensible. Dozens of different printers with different feature sets and inscrutable names. What's the difference between this printer and Brother DCP-L2640DW? The fact that it's not immediately obvious is a major failing on Brother's part. I ended up getting this because it shipped faster, and was surprised at all the useless fax features (they're both marketed as all-in-ones).Setup was a huge pain. Instead of making things easy to work out of the box, they encourage you to download all this software and firmware. After this was done, I'd put over a gigabyte of software onto my computer--three separate programs! And for what? I uninstalled all of them and the printer still works fine.I would strongly avoid this printer if you're looking for something simple, and I would also avoid it unless you desperately need fax functionality for some reason.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: Printing works great, I can print from my phone, PC or laptop without issues.Ever since I switched WiFi, I can no longer scan but only print.and I can not find my printer anymore from the mobile app, I have tried all sorts of ways but no luck.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: Sorry to say, I am quite disappointed in this iteration of the Brother line of products.  The old one I bought 7 years ago worked flawlessly with scanning email.  This one does not.  This is an essential function for us with scanning.  We have relegated it to just using it as a printer since it is so difficult to configure.  To make matters worse, who ever heard of a company going from a touch screen to an LCD interface?  It is like the technology regressed over the last 7 years.  I wished I knew that or I would not have bought it.  To be fair, the printer quality is excellent.  But we bought an all in one device so we could do more than just print.  Disappointed!

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: What a disappointment!!  I really wanted to like this printer.  Based on another B&W Brother Laser that I already have and has performed flawlessly, I bought this all-in-one.  How could I go wrong?  the other Brother has been great.  This one was effortless to set up.  I just plugged it in, loaded the toner and plugged in to our network.  My Macs recognized it instantly and every print mode seemed to work and it was fast to spit out copies.  But I noticed that both copy and print from computers was kind of dim on the paper.  Pencil sketches appeared splotchy with areas that were almost whited out.  Experimenting, I discovered that the Options menu allows increasing print density temporarily - bingo - that fixed one page!  So logically, if I could just set default print density, then all would be well.  After spending an hour or so online, I could not find a way to set the default print density from the Mac or from the printer control panel.  So on to Brother's online chat support.  They were some help, but they concluded after 2 more hours, that there is NO WAY to adjust default print density from the printer control panel or from my Mac.  Their app can't do it.  Yes, if I could access the printer driver maybe it could do it, but tech support couldn't figure it out.  So choices are 1) have a printer that can't print dark enough or give consistent coverage but that prints quick, or 2) send it back and find another printer.  I decided to send it back.  I'm really sad because I liked everything about the printer except the printing...A fatal flaw I fear.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: I wish I had read the reviews before I purchase it. The print was great quality and easy to use. Same to the copying function. can't complain much about that. The only, and the most serious problem, as many people pointed out, was the sleeping mode. Almost no way to fix it when you get into it, and technical support never exists. I was able to bypass it using cable connection and fortunately that works for my home office setting. Never had any luck in waking it up from sleep mode through a wireless connection. So if you can only have wireless connection at your working environment I strongly suggest against this model.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: I hate this printer. I can't get the printer to work via wi fi. And there us no way to scale the size of the print. I want to print return labels and I can't get them to print and if they did print one time the image fills the full page. I want to return it.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: Scanner did not function. I had 2 paper within a couple of weeks. I removed the jammed paper. Now it won't print. I had heard and read so many good reviews prior to my purchase.  I really did my homework.  I'm disappointed.  I have replaced it with a Cannon All-in-One.  Keeping my fingers crossed!

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: Two months in, and I can honestly say this is a fantastic printer. Even though I work in IT (or perhaps because I work in IT), I really appreciate when technology just works.  This printer has not disappointed yet.  If you're looking for a solid, dependable, easy-to-use B&W laser printer, I don't think you'll find a better one out there than this one.  (If you're a long-time HP printer user, switching to Brother will be a breath of fresh air.)Pros:- Doesn't forget the wireless network (always available)- Prints quickly from any device we have (Chromebook, Windows 10, and Android devices)- When adjusted, print quality is very good (I keep mine on 300 dpi to squeeze as much life out of each toner cartridge, but I was very surprised when I increased it to 1200 dpi for a document that was very light)- Scanning resolution is very crispCons- B&W only- I've not had a lot of luck with the scan button on the front of the machine, but when I use the associated scanning software and select "scan" from the software, it works 100% of the timeOverall, I'm quite impressed with the ease of use, quality, and functionality of this product given its price point.  I wanted to stay under $300, and I wasn't disappointed.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: Works great and was easy to set up and connect to my network of 7 machines.I used to manage an apartment 4 plex a while back so I printed a lot of missives from the owner, receipts for repairs and labor, lease agreements, eviction notices and things like that. I became severely ill, almost lost my leg and had a blood clot rip through my lungs so I only have half of the lung capacity now and it so hard to breath. So I am no longer managing the complex. I have to stop half way to the dumpster when taking out the trash and it not far at all. Any way I have to print paperwork for my disability from SS and medicaid once in a while and got tired of having to spend $70.00 on ink just to have it dry up in a few months and then when I needed to print a label or paperwork it would either look crappy being greenish blue ink color or not print at all. It sucks because it was a super nice business class printer, scanner and copier. I should have bit the bullet on the price and went laser a long time ago and if I would have had the extra $ I would have gotten the multi color one this time. I have only used it about 5 times and the only complaint I have if you don't have enough paper in the tray, it thinks it's empty but it prints like a charm

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: Screw the other companies that make you pay to play with their rigged ink cartridges and "new" subscription services.  Go Brother and never go back!  Laser carts will last a long time.  This machine does it all (fax, print, scan, copy) so perfect for your office/home office needs!  Highly recommended!  Great stuff.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2820DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer with Copy, Scan and Fax, Duplex, Black & White | Includes Refresh Subscription Trial(1), Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
description: This is a replacement for my old Epson inkjet unit that finally died. I went with this over other units that I looked at. I had a problem registering the unit. Contacted Brother and after several back and forth emails they took care of that problem.The print is crisp and it's fast. Maybe I kept the old printer too long. Night and day difference. Would definitely recommend.

product_name: 2 Pack USB-A to USB-C Car Carplay Cable for iPhone 16/15,iPhone 16/15 Plus, iPhone 16/15Pro , iPhone16/15Pro Max Carplay USB C Cord,iPad usb C Cable 10th, iPad Air Car Charger Cable Cord (White)

product_name: Mac Book Pro Charger,60W Power Adapter L-Tip Magnetic Connector Charger and Compatible with Mac Book Pro 13 Inch Before Mid 2012
description: Like so many of my Apple cable products, the attachment area on my current MacBook Pro charger (my third charger in 10 years of light use) has been worn out for a long time.  I used heat shrink to repair it, and when that failed I taped it together one last time to get by until I could get a new one.The new one is pretty much a clone of the original, right down to the flip-out cord wrap clips and the pull-out outlet tap.  This charger does not include the extension cable that came with my original charger, but Apple doesn't include those for free anymore anyway.  I've got my old extension which fits the new charger just fine, but I doubt I'll ever use it.I plugged in my MacBook and the light turned green then orange just like the old one.  Yay!  The charge percentage started going up and it charged fully in the normal amount of time.

description: Klang beim Musikhören finde ich für den Preis ganz in Ordnung (auch wenn ich schon bessere Kopfhörer aus ähnlicher Preisklasse hatte).Beim Telefonieren kann kann ich mein Gegenüber durchgehend recht gut hören. Allerdings konnte mich mein Gegenüber nicht immer gut hören, ich war zwischendurch leiser bzw. auch mal kaum/ gar nicht zu horen. Fürs Telefonieren finde ich die Kopfhörer daher weniger gut.Der Kopfhörer sitzt im rechten Ohr gut. Im linken Ohr Tür drückt es aber leider nach kurzer Zeit. Ein längeres Tragen muss ich noch testen, hoffe aber dass es nicht schlimmer wird, da es bereits beim kurzen Trage-Test leicht weh tat. Ich hoffe ich kann noch eine bessere Position finden.Den Bügel (hinterm Ohr) finde ich hingehen bisher angenehm, auch als Brillenträger.Die Touch-Bedienung finde ich ganz gut.Das man mit der Ladebox notfalls auch das Handy laden kann, finde ich praktisch, auch wenn der Ladevorgang langsam ist.Kopfhörer und Ladebox selbst sind ganz hübsch.Zum Akku kann ich bisher wenig sagen, da ich diesen bisher noch nicht ausreichend testen konnte.

I normal don't like ear buds but these are very nice and they did not take long to charge either.

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: I have been using this brand's screen protectors for the last 3 generations of iPhones. I don't use a case so I go through a lot of screen protectors, so this will be my sixth order from QHOHQ.  I have always been impressed with the quality of the product for such a low price.  However, I have two issues with the newest protectors I have ordered for my iPhone 16 Pro Max.I broke one my first day of having my new phone, so it served its purpose, but upon installing the second one I saw it had a manufacturing defect.  There are small lines (kind of line the small lines on a ruler) all up the long side of the protector.  I won't be removing the protector because of this defect, it is hard to see when the screen is on (and I will break it soon enough lol).  I haven't opened the third protector yet but hopefully it does not have this flaw.The second issue I have, is the black borders on the protectors. The borders make it so much more noticeable if it is not perfectly lined up, which even with the aligner tool, can be a challenge.  I did manage to get it perfectly aligned, but the screen bezels on the 16 pro max are so small that you can see that the black borders on the protector are larger than the ones on the screen.  It is a hairline difference, and most people probably won't even notice.In the past, I never ordered the ones with the black borders, but that was all that this brand offered for the 16 Pro Max.  if QHOHQ doesn't start offering one without the borders, I will probably be looking at other brands for my next order.

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: I had to use all 3 of mine in the pack to get it on correctly. The first protector I could not get the bubbles out of the middle. There were several tiny bubbles which in a few days would have gotten larger and looked terrible.The second one I tried to put on, the edges would not sit down on the phone correctly and started to lift upwards.I followed the directions to a T and I have done this many times before with other screen protectors. So to have a problem with 2 of the 3 screen protectors that came in the box is maddening. Because now if I have a weird accident and the protector gets scratched or cracked, I don't have a backup.But this is my experience with these. Maybe you won't experience the same problems I encountered.Because once it is on it looks very good. They are very nice if they attach correctly.

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: Shortly  after I put it on, I kept hitting the back button to erase something and nothing was happening. I assumed it was the thick protective glass or plastic that I put on. I took it off and sure enough the back button was working just fine again. Now i have to look for another solution. I am assuming something very thin and flexible will work much better and interfere much less with the function of the touchscreen. Whoops, I took the first glass off and put another piece on. It came with three in the box only this time I made sure to get it perfectly centered and everything seems to be working fine so I really can’t say I have any complaints against this product at all?

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: iPhone 16 Pro with Spigen case. So I liked the camera lens cover. That was easy to install. I like that it comes with cleaning wipes and towelettes. However, I’m not impressed with the alignment tool which doesn’t really help align the cover. The bigger issue since I was able to freehand it better than using the case, was when I pressed the action button on the top left the screen bulges up and bubbles. It settles down but this seems like a design flaw. Also it was super hard to get bubbles out due to a couple specs of dust that I couldn’t see but must have settled on the adhesive before I set the screen down. I’m returning this mostly because of the button issue and screen lifting up.

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: These are too hard to install cleanly with materials in the package. Out of three, only the last one was a completely clean installation with no bubbles, no tiny dots, etc. That did go on very well. I seated it in the center, and it adhered itself to the screen. That happened when I gave up using what came with it and used a screen cleaner solution and cloth that I use for my glasses to get the screen clean enough. You can't have a tiny speck of dust, or they won't seal properly. It will show a dot with an unadhered circle around it. If these were to go on a new phone immediately out of the box, maybe, but getting the screen perfectly flawlessly spotlessly clean with the postage stamp-sized cloths in the kit is more trouble than these are worth. If you do buy them, bypass those tiny cleaning cloths.

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: It felt like a very plastic almost like glass. Where I was scared it would crack super easy when I put it on. I also was surprised the camera protectors was one giant piece. At first I didn’t like the camera protectors but it is growing on me. It was definitely worth the money.However the install of the screen protector wasn’t very easy because of how hard it was. So if dust got under it I was scared when lifting it back up. However it is very clear and all the bubbles went away and it did come with a guide to help install it.

So if you don’t use a case for your phone, this will work just fine. I however have to order another brand and hopefully that one will work. These are going in the trash..

description: The screen protector seems to be fine. It's easy to install and does the job.The camera protector isn't stable and cracked within a few days (leaving me with bleeding cuts and splinters as the lens is very thin glass), and I didn't even drop the phone or anything.I would not use the camera lens protector again.

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: I’ve ordered these at least 3 times. I keep purchasing them because they are self adhesive and stay on beautifully. They are amazing when they’re not cracked. I’ll say that even cracked, they haven’t effected the cameras ability to take a good picture. I go through the camera protectors way quicker than the screen protectors. I’ll admit I’m not exactly gentle with my phone, but I’m also not horrible. The glass is just very thin and brittle in my opinion. One drop and it’s game over, depending on how it lands. I’ve lost glass from the camera protectors all over. In my purse, in my car, on the floor… and the shards have stuck me and made me bleed. I had a tiny piece stuck in my finger and my husband was afraid when he pulled it out with tweezers that it would break off, leaving a piece behind. Thankfully that didn’t happen, but I would feel horrible if one of my animals stepped on a piece and hurt themselves. I’m going to search for a plastic camera cover next time. I’ve never had a problem with the main screen protector. It has cracked, but I’ve never had pieces fall out.

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: I bought my new iPhone 13 Max Pro about six months ago and, after researching many screen and lens protectors, chose to go with this one. An iPhone, as you know, is an incredibly expensive investment and it really needs to be protected so it can last a long time.When I received this kit, it came with three sets of each of the protectors, which is GREAT! I drive a box truck full time and it’s a bumpy, hard ride. There are times when my phone takes a bit of a beating during the day. Anything I can do to minimize damage to my phone is important.The camera lens protectors are very intuitive to install. Just make sure you clean the lenses prior to sticking in the protector. There are three, as I mentioned, so you have backup for a later date if you need to swap them out. Very cool!The screen protector was a bit tricky for me, only because I hadn’t had previous experience with them. They are hard and I have only had soft protectors in the past. So thank goodness there were three of them because, due to my ignorance, I had trouble installing the first two and threw them away thinking I only had one shot to get them in place (like with a soft protector). This was my mistake. If you place it off-center, you can simply slip your fingernail under the edge, lift it up and reset it. Lol Don’t throw it away, like I did.Use the included alcohol prep pad and wipe to clean your screen before putting on the protector. You want all of the dust and fingerprints off the screen because, once the protector is on, you can’t go back and clean it. Once cleaned, take one of the protectors out of the sleeve. There’s a green tab you can use to pull the film off the back. Make sure you don’t touch where the film was. This side goes against the screen. Pull the film off and use your fingertips to hold the edges. I recommend having the phone in front of you length-wise (sideways) and using two hands to center the protector on top of the screen. Be mindful that there is a small groove cut out on one end that aligns with the top of your screen. Align one edge with your phone and slowly lower the protector so it is even on the edges. The directions say to press in the middle but I found that it will start connecting with the screen on different places. If a bubble forms, simply lift the edge close to the bubble slightly to let the air out and press it down again. It’s easy to do this because it’s a hard protector. Just use small corrections, you don’t have to raise the protector up much, just a tiny bit to let the air out.I got the screen protector on and everything worked perfectly! It wasn’t as noticeable as I thought it would be. It also had NO effect on the touchscreen functions. It’s a great protector kit and works!!!After six months of daily use in a box truck, I began noticing small cracks and was worried that the cracks had gone through to my phone screen. I ordered another kit (because remember, being an idiot the first round, I had thrown out two of the protectors for no reason). I just peeled off my screen protector and I was AMAZED that, although the protector was cracked in many places, my phone screen was in PERFECT condition! Not even a little scratch or small dent. Nothing. Just like new. I took a picture and added it to show you the first protector and my phone screen. I just put my second protector on and it was easy to install! I learned after my first round last year. :)So please buy this if you care about your phone. It’s amazingly scratch resistant, the kit is awesome and generous with multiple back up protectors … and it works!

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: I've tried countless screen protectors over the years, but the QHOHQ 3 Pack Screen Protector for iPhone 13 Pro has stolen my heart (and my phone's screen!). This protector delivers everything I've ever wanted in a screen protector: **exceptional protection, easy application, and a crystal-clear display.****The Good:*** **Effortless Installation:** Gone are the days of wrestling with stubborn screen protectors and ending up with a million bubbles. This QHOHQ protector glides on smoothly, leaving practically no air pockets behind. It's so easy, even I managed to do it without a single frustration-induced expletive.* **Superior Protection:** The 9H hardness rating really stands up to its claim. This protector has saved my phone from countless scratches and bumps, and I can confidently say it's truly scratch-resistant.* **Crystal Clear Clarity:** The ultra-HD material maintains the vibrant colors and sharpness of my iPhone's display, without any noticeable distortion or yellowing.* **Camera Lens Protection:** The included camera lens protectors offer additional peace of mind, safeguarding my precious lenses from scratches and dust.* **Case Friendly:** This is a huge plus for me. The protector fits perfectly under my case, ensuring it doesn't peel or lift at the edges. No more dealing with bulky protectors that interfere with my case!**The Not-So-Good:*** **Limited Quantity:** While three protectors are great for a single phone, it's a bit limiting if you have multiple devices or frequently need replacements.**Overall:**The QHOHQ Screen Protector for iPhone 13 Pro is a fantastic value for its price. It's a highly effective, easy-to-install screen protector that delivers the protection I need without sacrificing clarity. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a reliable and user-friendly screen protector for their iPhone 13 Pro.

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: I was so thrilled when the new iPhone was released,  & I wanted to make sure I protected my investment,  so I was looking for a high-quality screen protector.  I must say, I am impressed with this product! The delivery was incredibly fast, and the quality is evident as soon as you open the package! The screen protector fits perfectly & was easy to install, leaving no bubbles, so that was amazing! I'm actually surprised something of this high quality was so affordable. I highly recommend it!

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: As an update 10/6, the seller reached out to me and sent a replacement screen protector package. Great service.This is the first time I've used this screen protector brand. The camera lens protectors were fine. No problems applying them and clarity is good. However, the screen protectors are a completely different story. I tried the first one using the frame guide and the wipes to clean the screen. After the screen was applied I tried to squeegee out the bubbles but they were at least 5 or 6 that would not come out and did not disappear after a day. I had to remove it and you can't really reuse the screen protector. Then I tried the second one and same issue with bubbles remaining between the glass and the screen. Had to remove that one too. Finally, I tried the third one and it gently released the adhesive throughout the screen. Squeegee out a few small bubbles and this one was perfect. Really disappointing that if this one cracks, I have no spares left. I've used many other iPhone tempered glass screen protectors over the last 4 or 5 years and none of them have ever had this problem with bubbles remaining trapped. It's likely a defect in the adhesive not being uniformly spread as it contacts with the screen.

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
description: I was skeptical at first, especially at this incredibly low cost (and for 3 sets of screen and camera protection!!). Also I don't usually review anything but I was amazed at how quick, straightforward and flawless the installation went. Zero bubbles, looks great, and took all of 3 minutes to install. Last time I had my Verizon guy install a thinner, typical protector it took 2 tries and the cost of the protector was almost $70. Granted, I installed this on a pristine and very clean brand new iPhone 16 Pro Max, but I'm amazed at the technology used to adhere this to the phone with no bubbles. Just follow the easy instructions. I have no idea how they make money on these things since they give you three sets. This works out to about $10 each at the time of my purchase (using Prime). Bravo!

product_name: QHOHQ for iPhone 16 Pro Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector, [Military Grade Shatterproof], Top 9H+ Tempered Glass, Full Edge Coverage, Ultra Durable, with Easy Installation Tool [3+3 Pack]
