product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: I’ve been wearing my Oura ring every day and night for a little over 3 months and it seems very accurate. I’m usually skeptical of wearable monitoring devices, but often try them nonetheless, so I use several different ones, along with non-wearable, more accurate monitors to compare reliability. The Oura seems to be spot on with my sleep, stress, and activity. It’s always detected my naps and routine “workout” activities (I created a label for my strenuous every day activities). Those are really the only stats I look at. Battery life is pretty good (mine usually needs charging nearly every 3-4 days).  It’s very stylish and comfortable. I like the pulse ox and heart monitors as well. It works very well with the Apple Health app and integrates seamlessly. The Oura App is also very well designed and functions perfectly. I have not been very careful with my ring—I‘ve dropped it twice on a hard tile floor and I also wear it while working with power tools and while doing light construction/carpentry/craft work and it has held up exceptionally well. I also have worn it while washing my hands, but take it off during bathing/showering. When I first purchased it, I wore a silicone ring over it for protection, but it was too bulky. Overall, I am very happy with this tracker and would definitely recommend it. I love the sleep tracking with my Apple Watch, but sadly, it needs to be on the charging dock at night, so that feature is pretty useless for me. The Oura, however, is perfect.

product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: I’ve had the Oura ring for a month now and I love it so much! I had wanted this ring since it first came out but could never afford it. Now that you can use your FSA/HSA, it is possible. Since I used mine, I went with my favorite color rose gold. The color itself is gorgeous but not a true rose gold. It’s more of a true gold. Doesn’t matter because it’s beautiful and so functional. I look forward to waking up and checking my stats on the app. It is so accurate too! I thought I was getting a bit sick one day and it told me to take it easy so it picked up on the changes within my body. The sleep tracking is what I mainly got the ring for. I have trouble tossing and turning all night and this ring picks up on my sleep cycles. It will give suggestions of when you should go to sleep to get a better night’s rest. It is pretty comfortable to sleep with as well. Doesn’t bother me at all.Choosing the right size of ring is very important. Since our fingers do tend to swell in our sleep and with the weather. I recommend sizing up. I usually wear a size 8 but with the sizing kit, I found I had to size up to a 9. Even when my finger has swelled, it’s not uncomfortable at least for me.I have seen a lot of people being put off on the monthly subscription. Although it would be nice not to have to pay for one, I don’t mind it.As far as the work out option, I haven’t gotten a chance to test it. I do feel it needs better options to choose from with the workout options they have. If it were more like the options on my Apple Watch, it would make it even better. I also feel the period tracking could be better. It’s very basic. Just lets you choose a start date and your flow. This is what I wish Oura could put more effort into tweaking on the app. Its period predictability is pretty spot on. But why should we have to use a separate app if we want to get a more detailed breakdown of our menstrual cycle?I know there are other competitors with more reasonable pricing but Oura really is the way to go. I was able to easily put in my order here and got it the next day! Don’t order through the Oura site though. I had an order on their site that was taking forever to get any updates on my order and as it turns out, they were so backed up because they were busy fulfilling their Amazon contract. So just cancelled with them and ordered here and it worked out. If you’re debating on getting one, just do it!

product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: I love my Oura ring! I've had it for a couple of months now and it is great for activity tracking, sleep tracking, and cycle tracking when linked to Natural Cycles. I love the look of the gold, and it's so light and comfortable to wear all day and when you sleep. It holds a charge for several days and charges super quick when it does need to be charged.

product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: The Oura ring is AMAZING. I love wearing rings and how the Oura is multi functional. I wear it everyday and it lasts for almost a week without a charge. I enjoy looking at my sleep statistics, however, the accuracy still has some improving to do. I have narcolepsy so naturally I fall asleep and hit REM extremely quick. The ring is often inaccurate about when I fall asleep and my sleep cycles. I am addicted to it though and cannot wait for it to improve. But, very pricey for the color difference and don’t think you should have to pay for a monthly subscription.

product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: I recently, at 32 years old realized how birth control has impacted my body and is making it hard for me to now conceive. After a lifetime of always being on birth control, I went cold turkey and am now naturally tracking my cycle. You could go the thermometer route, but it can vary and you must have a good memory to remember to take your temp each morning. Through much research I found the Oura ring to be the most accurate. My partner had one when they first came out, provided by a military trial program. I knew a little about them and that his survived all he put it through. I ordered the sizing kit right before prime day and pulled the trigger on prime day. The size kit is crucial. As recommended I wore the size ring constantly to make sure it was comfortable. I was in between sizes but chose the one larger because my hands swell significantly overnight making the smaller one uncomfortable. I also moved around to different fingers to see about comfort.So far, the app has been able to track my cycle, along with the Natural Cycles app. The paid app is definitely worth it. I got a uti and it knew there was something wrong with my body before I did!I am also a petite female with very small wrists. I’ve had all the types of smart watches and fitness trackers out there and I cannot sleep with any of them. They hurt my wrists as a side and stomach sleeper. This is a great alternative.The quality and color of the black titanium is very pretty and it is bulky on my hand, but not unattractive. Most of the time I forget it is on my hand.

product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: I loved my Apple watch because of all the data it provided about my health and workouts. However, I didn’t want to wear it every day because I have an emotional attachment to my dumb watch. And I definitely couldn’t wear it to sleep.Finding the Oura has been a wonderful game changer. I can wear this for days and only take it off when I’m having a shower to charge. I find that I’m responding more to the data feedback from the ring than from my watch and don’t see myself going back to a smartwatch.My only cons are: (1) I wish I didn’t have to keep aligning the ring constantly so it can read optimally. (2) I would like to get an extra charger for the office but it’s ridiculously priced, and there are no aftermarket options.

product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: I had this ring for less than a week and absolutely loved it. It’s incredible all of the things that it is able to track. The fit is a little weird, and the ring is bulky. I ultimately returned it because the Oura ring 4 has just been released and I’m planning to get that one instead and hoping it is less bulky and the fit is less weird. Absolutely love the app and technology, though!

product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: ****See below for long review on ring color, battery life and Natural cycles. *****I have never been so aware of my health before. I recently got Covid-19. 2 days prior to any symptoms, my Oura app picked up on a change in my usual vitals. At the time I had no idea why because I felt fine. Well, the ring knew I was getting sick before I started to actually feel it. I was able to prepare before by taking it easy. I decided to stockpile some airborne, a neti pot, soup and medicine before I was in bed feeling like crap. For the record the ring did not diagnose me! However, through my resting heart rate being unusually elevated and temperature it notified me by asking if anything had changed.I got tested 3 days after symptoms started to kick in and sure enough I had covid. This ring has helped me to take my health and rest so much more seriously.Battery life: I usually recharge every 4 days while I shower and get ready. It takes about 30 min- 1 hour to completely charge depending on how low the charge is. I’ve only ever let it completely die once.Color: I have mixed feeling about the color. It’s got more of a stainless steel /krome/mirrory look than silver. Silver tends to be lighter or brighter that stainless steel. It’s gotten a ton of scratches as with any piece of hand jewelry. I think the scratches add character and don’t mind them at all. The scratches and wear have not changed the color of my ring at all which is something I’ve seen in other reviews for the black and gold varieties. If I had the money to splurge I would get one in every color.Natural cycles: I have a subscription with NC. You do have to go in at least 1x week to sync all the basal body temps. At first I thought I would forget to do this. Once I started to look at all my statistics, I was so into it, that it became second nature to just look in the app. I love seeing notifications from my Oura app and my Natural cycles app. It keeps me off instagram.Cheaper version from TikTok: I got the TikTok ring to compare and honestly the Oura app has so much more to offer in comparison. The Oura app is user friendly and intuitive.Overall, I am very happy with my purchase. I feel like I am doing something to make myself better both physically and mentally. I feel like I’ve taken it to another level on self love.

product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: Easy to use. The sizing kit is a great idea! I have used the ring for a couple of weeks already, almost everytime. It comes with a USB charger  and you can charge it in a couple of hours, when you are at rest, like seating in front of your PC. The whole idea of measuring your vitals and have insights on your health does not really works if you are not willing to pay $5/month for the service of updating and sincronizing your data. It is like a printer. You have the printer but if you don't buy the cartridge it's useless. The paid service is very good. It provides additional information, like sleeping good habits, for example. That info is worth if/when connected with your actual sleeping data. Nevertheless, I'm missing two vitals that are not included: blood presure and ECG.

product_name: Oura Ring Gen3 Sizing Kit - Size Before You Buy The Oura Ring Gen3 - Unique Sizing - Receive Credit for Purchase
description: I want to start out by saying that this in no way is a fitness tracker, if you are into fitness in any way and have an Apple Watch continue to use your Apple Watch. If you are curious about your sleep, stress, your period cycle I would say this is a good purchase, and get the ring sizing kit. Also make sure you check with your insurance provider — they might just cover this.1.  Sleep- this really goes into detail about how much lite, deep, and REM sleep, this also calculates how long it takes you to fall asleep, your movements throughout the night, a part of this calculates your readiness (will talk about that at the end)2. Live Heart Rate - this along with the “daytime stress feature (will do into that on 3), you can actually monitor your heart rate and do a “live” heart rate and actually feel the beats per minute, it calculates your HR in 30 minute increments. This will measure your HR at night (and it kinda calls you out if you have an elevated HR from drinking alcohol)3. Daytime stress - the app/ ring is able to calculate your HR based on stress (this will take a couple of weeks to figure out). It tells me when I’m in relaxed, engaged and stress stage, and the restored stage (how long it will take you to recover from being stressed) this has really been helpful for me especially since working from home. This plays into your Rediness score.4. Cycle Insights / Natural cycle- Ladies this one is for you if you are looking to come off hormonal birth control and/or looking to start a family or if you’re honestly just curious. I will say the more data that you provide the app on your last 6 periods the better it has predicting (but no worries if you don’t know it) will talk about the natural cycles app in a few. This will take your body temperature every day and create a graph, when you download the natural cycles app (which btw pairs wonderfully with the Oura ring) every morning you will open up the Oura ring app and allow everything to sync then it will transfer that data to your natural cycles app. There you will have Green Day’s ( your safe days for s*x), and red days when it’s not safe (unless looking to start a family I’m sure yours will be very different from mine). This will predict days of ovulation based on your body temp. And your est. next cycle. You will then fill out this form it will ask you if you’ve had s*x, bleeding (for period), LH test, ovulation symptoms and your overall “how are you feeling”. The more information you give the app the better.5. Your Readiness Score - basically everything I talked about sleep, HR, temperature, “activity” even though I don’t use it. I put my Apple Watch information into it” your stress, this calculates everything and gives you a readiness score to take on your day. It may give you advice to relax, call you out on your drinking “hey your HR was elevated did you consume alcohol or have a late light snack” sometimes it can tell you that you might be coming down with something, or that you can take the day on.I will say there are CONS— it’s a wellness ring, not a fitness ring. The app…… it’s $5.99 a month… for a ring that you pay $350 based on the ring and finish. Kind of annoying. This does scuff pretty easy (so if you wear this while working out get a ring protector).However the Pro’s outweigh the cons…. I’m able to learn a lot about my sleep I’ve got some PTSD/ insomnia from the military. I’ve been able to learn a lot about my stress and period tracking. I think this was very much worth the purchase (I did hold off for a year).

description: Ho deciso di prendere questo speaker perché, guardando le varie recensioni, ho visto un punteggio abbastanza alto.Esteticamente è molto carino e di dimensioni super compatte, apprezzabile anche il led RGB che lo rende più accattivante.Parlando di prestazioni devo dire che il volume è parecchio alto per essere uno speaker così piccolo, ma la qualità del suono è quello che è.Mi spiego meglio: i bassi sono accettabilmente accentuati ma l'ampiezza del suono ne risente a svafore degli alti. È come se lo speaker fosse dentro una grotta, si sente il suono abbastanza "ovattato". Considerando il prezzo (l'ho preso in offerta a 19 euro) direi che può andar bene, se fosse costato di più avrei sicuramente fatto un reso. Diciamo che vale quel che costa, senza infamia e senza lode. Se non siete dei "puristi" del suono va benissimo, altrimenti dovrete buttarvi su altri marchi e, soprattutto, su ben altri prezzi.

description: Critique en usage TWS (par 2 enceintes)Les +- son clair, propre et stable jusqu'à 90% de volume, à 100% sature un peu mais reste encore correcte;- bonnes finitions.Les -- basses limitées, volume pourrait être plus puissant (où son les 15W?), à 50% vraiment peu fort, on a une conversation sans être gêné ;- présence sonore moyenne (parce que volume et basses limités), rempli la pièce pour une écoute casual, non festive.A titre de comparaison, j'ai 2x les Tronsmart T7mini de 15W également, le rendu général et la présence sont nettement meilleurs, pour une gamme de prix équivalente.- commandes difficiles à utiliser, on se trompe souvent. C'est quelque chose d'habituel avec les buttons combinés sur ce type d'appareil compact. Bluetooth bug parfois (à cause de l'usage en TWS?), il faut alors le retirer et remettre des préférences bluetooth (Windows)

I bought them for work to listen to music in the background.The sound is good (actually very good for the size) and the volume is sufficient. It may not be enough to throw an outdoor party, but it has a decent volume for its size.The setup was super easy with good instructions. It remembers your device, so subsequent start-ups automatically pair to stereo sound. You just have to turn on the speakers individually.Today I ordered another pair for my office at home.

product_name: Bluetooth Speaker Wireless,IP67 Waterproof & Dustproof Portable Speaker with Lights,15W Loud Stereo Sound,500mAh Battery All Day Playtime, TWS Pairing, BT5.3,for Home/Party/Outdoor/Beach (Black)
description: Well worth the price. I would recommend purchasing two speakers as they have True Wireless Stereo capability. You connect one speaker via Bluetooth to your device and then press the TWS button on that speaker that will connect the two speakers together. The speaker connected to your device will be the left stereo channel and the slave speaker will be the right stereo channel. Each speaker has a subwoofer at the top with a normal range speaker built into each side. A TWS setjp would give you two subs and 4 stereo speakers total.

description: I bought the PS1 speaker to replace an Anker Mini 5 watts speaker. The PS1 sounds great for a room, kitchen or for travel. It’s not for a party. The sound its nice balance but the volume less than 50% its not powerful, it’s useless. Great connectivity to any Iphone or Ipad. Its not cheap quality made.I have different bluetooth speakers from 5 watts to 80 watts.Comparing the PS1 with my Anker Soundcore Motion B (12 watts) the Anker its loader maybe is that the Anker has two 6 watts speakers.I compared the PS1 with another 15 watts speaker and the PS1 its not closer in sound volume.Conclusion: If you get it under $20 (some discount) it will be the best bang for the buck. The PS1 its closer to a 10 watts speaker excellent for a room, kitchen or travel. Will provide more than 7 hours at 60% volume. It’s suppose to be waterproof but for me it’s water resistant. I’m not sure about the open usb-c plug if it really sealed.

description: I purchased this item during a 50% off sale and, even if the item was not discounted, it is definitely worth the money! Bluetooth connectivity is extremely easy to follow and the sound quality was excellent. This persuaded me to buy a 2nd one and functionality of connecting the two was easy and made a huge improvement with them synced together. The buttons are easy to click and understand although I would still recommend reading the instructions manual to understand pairing 2 speakers to your device. Battery performance is also long lasting and I only need to charge once every few days. I use these in the shower, at work, and by the pool and have received several compliments. I’ve even persuaded my manager to purchase some to keep at work and my boyfriend bought 2 himself to keep in the bathroom during his showering. They are travel-friendly and the loop allows them to hang around any party for the best sound experience! If you don’t have the hook, the bottom of the speaker is a rubbery, anti-slip material that, even while loud bass shakes the room, will not shake the speaker off any surface! This is exactly what I was hoping for and this exceeded my expectations by a mile!!

description: These open ear "buds" or headphones are really quite special. They were packaged really well and everything about them feels premium. The packaging includes a 8-10" USB-C cable for charging, though the "buds" were at 80% already and the case was fully charged at 100%, upon arrival.The case is really nice with the power level shown on the outside, which is a great feature. You can see this in the stock Amazon photos. I love the way these headphones "drop" snuggly into the case and the fact that the lid of the case has a really strong close to it. You have no doubt that it is shut tight.They are also SUPER comfortable to wear. When I put them on, I was a little suspect about how they would sound, because they didn't seem to "cover" my ear and of course they aren't buds, so didn't go into my ears. But when I connected them (which was super easy and quick), they actually sounded amazing! Good rich sound and it surprised me because of the "fit" noted above.Controls seem to work well and as expected. The oval portion of the unit, that goes "inside" the ear is a touch "panel". I've included a pick of the smart control portion of the manual. The manual/instructions are comprehensive, though there are the misspelled words/grammatical errors here and there.Would I recommend these? 100% yes! Great product that arrived incredibly fast via Amazon. LOVE THEM!

product_name: TAGRY Open Ear Headphones Bluetooth Ear buds 80Hrs Playtime Wireless Earbuds with Earhooks IPX7 Waterproof Touch Control Air Conduction Sport Headsets Bluetooth 5.3 Earphones for Workout Running White
description: I bought these earbuds to use during my long-distance run. The one I currently have tended to pop out of my ears when I sweat. These K8 earbuds work perfectly because they are comfortable, and they stay in place for my entire exercise period. They don't feel intrusive at all. They are lightweight, with a quick charge with the case, and have great battery life. I listen mostly to audiobooks and music, and the sound quality is great. They don’t pressure my ears; therefore, they make listening easier and enjoyable. My son, who plays basketball, used them shooting hoops and said they stay in place during jumps.The charging case is sturdy and looks like it will last for a long time. The earbuds charge automatically whenever they're in the case and turn on automatically when you take them out of the case.These are nice for the price. I give it a 5-star rating and highly recommend it for anyone who wants good sound quality without spending a fortune.

description: I bought a set of these in one color. I really like them, so I got more in the other color. It is a little hard to get the protective cover on the sticky pad off, but once they are on they stick well. With the magnetic closure on the hinge it is very easy to get the cords in and out. There is enough room for the cords to slide out for extra length, but if you pull too hard at an angle, they will pop open  rather than pull on the adhesive and make them more likely to come unattached. I have used these to organize my bedside cords and I may order more for my desk.

These were easily attached to our nightstands with the sticky tape that was included. The little "doors" easily open to accept the cables and snap closed to keep them in place.  You can easily pull them out or place them back as needed. The "doors" are magnetized.  We are very happy with these MAGNETIC CABLE CLIPS and highly recommend them to simplify your busy life!

description: I have ONE USB cable on my keyboard drawer. I don't want all kinds of cables flopping around and the darn cable kept falling to the floor. This little cable manager really fulfilled my needs. It lets the cable spool out with the opening/closing of the drawer and looks nice too. Oh, and the cable doesn't fall on the floor anymore

product_name: 6 Pack Magnetic Cable Clips, FlyCoco Cell Phone Cord Holder for Nightstand, Cord Organizer for Side Table, [Smooth Adjustable] Mini Cube Cord Holder for Home Office Desk Phone Car Wall Desktop(White)
description: I'd say these are pretty good, 4 vs 5, for two reasons. One, when you try to peal away the "tag" to expose the sticky stuff, it either just rips the paper, or pulls the entire sticky side (ie the backside) off. I found the only way I could separate the paper was to use an exacto knife to get the paper to seperate. Then it's simple to stick that side to the device, peal off the backside and stick on to your surface. The magnets work well, and snap open as needed. Two, even after 24 hours if using, I found they tend to rotate if just a little bit of force is applied from cables. I had cleaned my cabinet with alcohol and dried before applying. That said, they work well in organizing my USB cables. I used three to hold my long USB cable.

product_name: Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
description: I was in need of a new versatile portable speaker to fit my summer adventures; one that was portable enough to fit in a beach bag and left in my car or to play out in my pool area that packed a punch in sound. After a week of owning this speaker, all in all it has checked every box.TLDR: This speaker, while a tiny bit smaller than what I was expecting, packs amazing sound quality from a trusted brand to easily liven up any outdoor occasion. Their app is great for EQ settings, however the physical ULT button provided great boost to your music by itself to hype up any outdoor event. Waterproofing is great and holds a good charge while being extremely portable with its carrying strap.Packaging:- The speaker arrived in a regular cardboard box. While it was nice to see Sony turn to the newer trend of making packaging as recyclable as possible, I did notice that the pieces holding the speaker were flimsy and could possibly be a concern during delivery. However, mine thankfully arrived in perfect condition. Included inside the box was the speaker itself with the carrying band already attached, a USB A to USB C charging cable, and a very small paper pamphlet. Instructions for the speaker are found through a scanned QR code within this pamphlet which allowed for more information about the speaker to be addressed.Sound Quality:- As to no surprise from this being from Sony, this speaker sounds amazing. It doesn’t get tinny at higher volumes, the dual drivers create amazing bass, and overall it covers all genres with no issue presenting truly enjoyable melodies for all music. At max volume, while the speaker does not get deafening loud if you are outdoors (indoors it possibly will depending on what you define as deafening lol), it certain gets loud enough to entertain a large area. In my 40 foot by 120 foot patio, this speaker shined and was the center piece of great sound quality and entertainment. While it certain suits my needs for loudness, you can always take it a notch up by either using the ULT button or pairing it with a second ULT Field 1 and working them in stereo (both discussed in features).Features:- This speaker is packed with all of the expected features of a modern Bluetooth speaker. It quickly connects to remembered devices when powered on (one nice little note: to power on/off this device, only a single press of the power button is needed for each. While a small detail, it truly is something that is appreciated for ease of use) and has a great battery life. While I cannot speak for the full I’ve gone 6 hours of using the speaker which left it at 50%, so I believe their claim of 12 hours of battery life to be true. This speaker also has a quick charger feature of 10 mins of charging for 3 hours of playback. I haven’t tested that myself as of yet, but I have other newer Song products with similar fast charging features and their claims for those products have not fallen short, so I believe these ones as well.- There is also a Bluetooth pairing button, a multiple use button that can play/pause tracks, skip/reverse tracks, and answer/hang up phone calls depending on need. Functionality was clearly a forethought of this speaker, since this button’s commands—while certainly vast—are greatly designed. Play/pause is a single press, skip is a double press, reverse is a triple press, and it converts to a call answer/hang up button with a single press functionality when you receive a call. There are also independent volume up/down buttons which increase the volume by a decent percentage in each press.- Then there is the ULT button, which is a built in EQ adjustment presented as a physical button on the speaker. It comes with default settings when pressed that noticeably enhance the all around sound quality of any melody, with an emphasis on bass and treble. The EQ for the ULT button can be adjusted in the Sony Music Center app. It’s a great feature to use when you want to give that extra boost to your music.- While I have not tried it myself, this speaker also has the ability to be set in stereo with a second ULT speaker, and I’m sure the dual speaker combination could easily work as a stereo set up for any venue needs.- The waterproofing of this speaker is on par with expectations. I’ve taken it to many water-based areas and have gotten it splashed with water and it’s been completely fine. The USB C charging port is covered with a water tight seal that you can open and close easily.- This speaker works with Sony’s music center app, and while it’s a bit rougher than their headphone app, it still works wonderfully to optimize the speaker’s functionality and performance. Full EQ settings are available, along with specific battery percentage, updates, and settings for the speaker.- The included carrying strap is a nice touch that, I will admit I did not initially think I was going to like, however it very quickly grew on me and I find myself carrying the speaker solely by the strap anywhere I take it. It is tied onto the speaker and can be removed, however you will have to re-tie it yourself if you want to reattach it.Build Quality:- Once again, as expected from this price point and the Song brand, this is truly a high quality speaker. It feels great to hold, with the fabric being sturdy and made of soft material. The buttons are covered in strong rubber that give a satisfying response when pushed. The carrying strap is thick and made of a high quality and very slightly elastic material. You are certainly getting your money’s worth on quality alone, which is what I expect from the Song brand.Final Thoughts:- While it is certainly understandable to hesitant when looking at a $120 Bluetooth speaker, this one truly is worth its value. I have very little complaints with this speaker, and think that it’s a great edition to anyone’s outdoor entertainment experience. The ULT button is a feature I find myself using more than expected (in a good way) to help boost my music during gatherings to help the entertainment. With its waterproofing, I feel comfortable using it as a travel speaker to any destination I plan on visiting. This feature packed speaker is truly one of a kind, and I’m certainly satisfied with my purchase.

product_name: Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
description: We were on the market for a bluetooth portable speaker for our 18 year old daughter as a birthday present.  We normally gravitate to the JBL brand - which ARE, and still remain to be, great speakers.  But, being the baby of the family and living with hand-me-down [you name it]s all her life, I knew she'd appreciate a speaker in a style that was totally her own -- not another one of mom and dad's (or big brother's) speakers.  Fun and easy as that sounds, this meant stepping out of my comfort zone.  (You know how it is: you like what you like!)  So I REALLY did my homework by researching many different brands/styles/specs (Bose, Beats, etc.) of speakers in the (about $100-150) price range.  The number one thing our daughter was asking for was portability - hesitantly saying nothing bigger than her brother's JBL Charge 4, but I could tell smaller would be better.  Bigger speakers may give better sound, but she wanted a "water bottle speaker" as they're called because they fit nicely in cup holders.  So I began my search by comparing models to JBL's Flip 6 - the one I was originally going to purchase.  I came across this Sony ULT Field 1, which is a new model that Sony released just a few months ago. I was impressed by it's veratility.  Built the same way as the Flip 6 (outward facing woofer and tweeter, side bass) it has many of the same features as the Flip 6 like an app with an equalizer so you can fine tune your music and 12 hours of battery life.  But the Field 1 came with a few extra features that raised my eyebrow...  A ULT bassboost button giving you an extra, little option: go with a deeper bass if you're dancin' the night away - or turn it off if you're, say, talking with friends around a campfire and save on battery life. (By the way, it sounds GREAT even with it off!)  It also  comes with a phyical pause button and voice feature  - where you can answer the phone through the speaker, (like in your car).  Although it IS bigger than the Flip 6 it is smaller than the JBL Charge 5 - the newer version of her brother's speaker.  As far as sound quality, several reviewers (YouTube) stated that the Field 1's sound quality falls BETWEEN JBL's Flip 6 and Charge 5 models.  (I used my headphones to listen while they demonstrated the different speakers' sounds and, yes... uh-huh... I agree.)  Again, ALL 3 speakers have very, VERY good sound quality - you really can't go wrong with any of them.  We were looking at Sony's ULT Field 1 simply because we wanted to give our daughter something unique to our household - that fit her description of "bottle speaker" but measured up to my (ha!) standards of sound quality.  I also want to point out (on a petty note) that we DO LIKE the carrying cord - a feature I thought at first glance might be awkward. It can be removed if desired but lemme tell ya, it's QUITE handy!  :D  So I added it to my cart, did that lil' 'hold-your-breath' pause thing we all do ...then tapped the 'ORDER' button.  It arrived today (very next day) and, wanting to surprise her [a month] early, went ahead and handed her the package.  (Sigh...gone are the days of my elegant gift wrapping sessions.)  The surprise alone tickled her - but when she opened it, her eyes grew WIDE!  She genuinely LOVED it!!  (May I be clear here: I couldve given her a cleaned up, secondhand, garage sale speaker and she, in her sweet-nature, would have "LOVED" that. Ha! Ha!  It was a sweet treat to do this for her.) 😄🥲I asked if the size was too big and she said it was very much OK!  Now, my picky ears are truly impressed by it's CLEAR sound - even turned ALL the way up, there's no "fuzziness" here!  I had chosen the white color and it's very nice. It's not a sporty, bright white - just kind of a classy, muted off-white.  One thing I DO like over the JBL brand is that the buttons have little, lights by each one  so they'll be more easily seen in the evenings. (Cool!😎) Connectivity was easy - or so I assume.  She had it out if the box and connected to her iPhone faster than I could say "Wait; there's an app...".  She was already downloading the app and was playing music as I sat at down at the table to look it all over.  So I'm feeling pretty confident to say it's easy to set up.  As far as fitting in the cup holder, it does fit...kind of. It sits about 2½ inches down  - snuggly enough to keep it securely upright while driving, but not all the way seated down inside it.  Our car's cupholders (Ford Escape) have these little spring loaded, retractable, grabber things that prevent it from being seated all the way down inside.  Bump it with your elbow and it'll go flying.  That said, it still may fit in YOUR cupholders.It definitely will fit the (Ford) truck's cupholders. Lol!She loved the speaker so much though, it wasn't a deal breaker!After all that - go figure!  (RME)  But, hey!...that just tells you how good this speaker is!!)  Overall, it is very much a sweet little speaker for its size and price point!  (Way to go, Sony!)  As they say in other Amazon reviews: "If you're on the fence give it a try - you will be pleasantly surprised."(🤔Hmmm...Let's see...MY birthday is in March...) 😄

product_name: Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
description: This little speaker surprised me. This “ULT” button packs a punch, but not in the way you would think. Most of my past speakers with a boost button basically increased bass. It’s fine if that’s all you want, but the equalization isn’t there. The bass over-powers the voice or the other instruments. This ULT button gives you more bass - check , and the other sounds also get enhanced. It’s pretty remarkable. The strap is cool. I can hang it from the table umbrella in my back yard. Porting the side speakers was smart. You can use it horizontal like normal or when you stand it vertically, the bottom speaker isn’t fully covered. The air can go somewhere. I think Sony has a winner here. This is definitely coming pool side and beach side on our next trip to FLA. I got the white color. Looks good. I’m glad I picked this one. It’s definitely a keeper.Oh, all the other good stuff. Easy to connect to iPhone. 12 hour battery is very good for me and small for its power. Also works as a speaker phone and all the proofs. Beach proof and clumsy (me) proof.

product_name: Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
description: What I was looking for was a compact bluetooth speaker that packs a punch in bass, so I decided to give this Sony speaker a try and boy was I surprised by it! 1. Bluetooth pairing - First, pairing this was super easy. I happen to have an Android phone and once bluetooth is on, it automatically pops up on my phone and asks if I want to pair it.2.  Design - for a compact size speaker, it is really lightweight and because the speaker is shaped the way it is, it can easily stand up by itself or laid out sideways. The tether that comes with it can easily be strapped on to my backpack or a bicycle.3. Bass - The sound varies depending on the position of the speaker, but the bass is surprisingly good! The secret here is the "ult" button. Once you press that, it really amps up the bass while not sacrificing the clarity of the vocals. What I thought was cool was the companion app that you can use to control the speaker in which you can also customize the sound through the equalizer. I am not too picky when it comes to sound, but the opportunity to customize it will be super flexible for those who like their own sound.4. Sound Quality and Distance - This to me was the main reason why I am giving it 5 stars. The sound quality has really good range from the low tones to the high tones. I like to listen to the variety of different styles of music and I am very impressed of the sound reproduction of this speaker. Usually, I am not too far away from the speaker, but there had been times where I had to go downstairs to do something and what's nice is that the speaker had really good range for a bluetooth speaker. The sound never cut out once. As a bonus, what I discovered in the app, was an option to either turn on sound quality performance or focus on a stable connection and I think that will allow some people to really enjoy their music even from a far away distance.5. Price - $128 is still a lot of money, but for this amount of money and what I am getting from this speaker. I say it is well worth it because I can take this literally anywhere outside or inside. There have been a couple of times when my phone was paired to the speaker and somebody called in and I had a conversation with them not knowing I can actually talk to them from the speaker! So yes, if you can afford this speaker, I say give this a try! You won't be disappointed!

product_name: Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
description: So I bought this new ULT field 7 and overall it sounds really good the highs sound pretty detailed but the mids sound very full which surprised me you hear a good left in our Channel without no problem my only issue is that when you turn the Ult on it can have a chance of blowing out your speaker does this speaker hits pretty low frequencies which is quite impressive but dangerous for a small speaker so I recommend using it while the u l t is turned off and just put it to custom and set your bass like down 3 clicks other than that the speaker sounds great it's a good travel size and you won't be disappointed of its performance.

product_name: Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
description: The ULT field 1 is an incredible compact speaker. My Go-to was always the JBL flip series, as i right now own the flip 6.Design: The utility here is great, it has a carry strap that doubles as a hanger, or a handle!, the build is very rugged and high quality, i would not baby this thing at all, it handles its own!Sound & Performance: Out of the box the speaker comes with ULT on, and WOAH!, it gets very loud for its size!. This speaker connects to sony’s music center app, where you can customize the eq, connect in stereo to another field 1, and many other settings!. The sound is very open, clear on vocals ,it fills up a big room really well and maps the sound out. A really great sounding speaker. Battery life is really good,it varies how you use it, but real world use ( 50-80% volume, ULT on) its good for 8-10 hours straight. It does take a while to charge, about 5 hours if its completely drained. But thats good for the overall life of the battery.Compared to JBL flip 6: Ive been back forth between these two for the past couple days. And i found myself reaching for the field 1! It sounds better, its more open, it sounds like the music fills up any room, as for the JBL, it targets the sound directly at you, and the highs are a bit harsh, sony simply just outperforms it!Value: at retail ($128). I would buy this speaker no question. Its great and performs as well as speakers above its weight class.On sale : $98, i would buy it IMMEDIATELY:), insane value.

product_name: Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
description: After trying out Sony Wireless Speaker, I have to say, my family and I were impressed. My teenage son has always been a hard sell on design. He was sold. The shiny Sony logo caught his attention immediately.I was surprise on the sound quality. This is me speaking from comparing to a different Sony speaker I've owned in the past (xb23 is the model number, I think).The "cool factors" for me were: 1. push the ULT button to enhance the bass and clear highs that really bring out the music while hanging out in the backyard. 2. Strap - It allows me to hang the speaker on the patio umbrella and out of the way of things (see pic). 3. Setting it up was a breeze. Wifey opened up the box, push the power button, paired the bluetooth, all on her own. Lastly, what really stood out to me was how well-built this speaker is. It feels sturdy and durable, but it's lightweight enough to take with me wherever I go. Plus, the sleek design looks great.Haven't had it long enough to noticed any "cons" about this speaker. If I were to say something, I'd say price. I purchased the speaker at regular price because I needed a second unit for our backyard. I'd like to wait for the first sale to purchase 1 or 2 more for my family members with Mother's Day and Graduation around the corner.

product_name: Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
description: I looked at many reviews. One top brand speaker was so "crisp" that it became difficult to listen to for very long and I fully understood what he was talking about. Other speakers were mellow but muddy sounding and one top brand was even weak. This speaker seemed to have the best balance of clarity, volume, simple operation and the high-quality build expected of a Sony. It also has the option of adding base at the touch of a button for when you are listening to music rather than a podcast. The Sony ULT went on sale, so I bought it and have to agree that it has the perfect balance for a speaker of this size. It sounds much bigger than it is and fills a large room, although that was not why I bought it. Very happy with this product and there is no second guessing this time around.

product_name: Sony ULT Field 1 Wireless Speaker Compact and Portable Design, Enhanced Bass and Sound Diffusion, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Waterproof Shower Speaker with Bluetooth SRSULT10W, Off White
description: The Sony ULT Field 1 is an incredible speaker which enhances the sound by concentring its features in a rich powerful bass eq system analysis. It reads the bass and empower it to another level that I haver never seen on its price range. Great connectivity, a great battery life (I haven’t charge it since I open the package). Size-wise, you can tell this is a mid-high product in size but it is convenient for traveling purposes, I even use it on the court playing basketball. Great product with a great price, I wish it could be a bit more affordable for the skeptical, but let’s be honest, we can’t go lower or higher, it is Sony, and it is quality!

description: Came pkg. well.  The instructions are pretty straight forward but you do need to practice with it. We went to a cabin rental they had outdoor cameras and it picked those up, just wanted to see.  scanned the rest of cabin and  low and behold found one more pin hole camera in a clock on the fire place mantel.  Called owners and they said in the instructions to cabin cameras where in there just didn't say where, we re-read it and yes it was stated cameras  where in use just not where. Covered it up scanned rest of cabin nothing else.

description: IDK, this just seems like the bare minimum in every way.  The 3 solid stars (average) are because it does work as intended.  It was fairly easy to install, and is holding my TV onto the wall.  That's the best thing I can say about it.When it first arrived, I was shocked at how light it was.  When I took it out of the box I was shocked at how small and thin it was.  I wondered if it would even hold up the TV.  The center brace, that helps keep the thing from twisting, is held on by machine screws.  It shouldn't have to do much I guess, but make sure you keep those hanging brackets as far to the outside as possible, and make sure your top two lags into the wall are right in the middle of studs, or you could have issues.  Overall not a bad item, but I'd want something beefier for a larger TV.

description: Provides plenty of outlets for all devices, including USB and Type-C. Widely spaced plugs are good for not blocking each other. Reliable and does the job without any fuss.

description: This power bar has become a mainstay when travelling.It has 8 plug ports.  4 grounded, and 4 without ground.  The 4 without ground are on the side, where the 4 with ground are up top.  This creates scenarios where larger wall warts can hang down (or up), and not block the other plugs.  I do find that larger wall warts can be a pain with this.It also comes with 3 USB A ports, and a single USB C port.  The USB C port is limited to 5V at 2.4A.The plug itself is a flat mount and slightly angled, which means it should have decent wall clearance. All said it's about 1" clearance from the wall.The bar has mounting point options on the back which is ideal.

product_name: Extension Cord 5FT, Surge Protector Power Strip with 8 Widely Outlets 4 USB Ports, Flat Plug, Wall Mount Outlet Extender, Multiple Outlets for Indoor Home Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: Happy enough with the overall form factor of this surge protecting power bar from brand NANXSON which is generally nondescript in a basic white colour with a fabric stitched cord, and offers a good variety of both regular outlets along with USB and USB-C options which are more than enough for basic electronics and mobile phone charging, giving a user plenty of options when connecting devices.It is also fire-resistant, and energy-absorbing to a capacity of 1080 joules, but the outer molding is poorly made and doesn't fit together in some spots on the bottom, but that's not too big a deal as it's just sitting on a desk out of the way. There's not really much to complain about when the overall profile of the unit is just what I was looking for. Satisfied overall. 4 stars.

product_name: Extension Cord 5FT, Surge Protector Power Strip with 8 Widely Outlets 4 USB Ports, Flat Plug, Wall Mount Outlet Extender, Multiple Outlets for Indoor Home Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: The power bar is a versatile and essential addition to any home, office, or dorm, designed to meet all your charging and power needs. Featuring 8 widely spaced outlets, it accommodates large plugs and adapters without crowding, making it perfect for powering multiple devices simultaneously. The inclusion of 4 USB ports, including a Type-C outlet, allows for fast and efficient charging of your smartphones, tablets, and other USB-powered gadgets. Whether for home, office, or dorm use, this power bar combines convenience, safety, and functionality in one sleek package.

product_name: Extension Cord 5FT, Surge Protector Power Strip with 8 Widely Outlets 4 USB Ports, Flat Plug, Wall Mount Outlet Extender, Multiple Outlets for Indoor Home Office, Dorm Room Essentials

product_name: Extension Cord 5FT, Surge Protector Power Strip with 8 Widely Outlets 4 USB Ports, Flat Plug, Wall Mount Outlet Extender, Multiple Outlets for Indoor Home Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: This surge protector power bar has quickly become an essential part of my home office setup. With 8 widely spaced outlets and 4 USB ports, including a USB-C port, it offers all the connectivity I need in a compact, efficient design. The outlets are well-spaced, so I can easily plug in multiple devices without worrying about the plugs blocking each other, which is a common issue with other power strips.The flat plug is a thoughtful feature that makes it easy to fit the power strip behind furniture and in tight spaces. I especially like the 5-foot braided extension cord, which is both durable and long enough to give me flexibility in positioning the power bar. The cord’s UL approval and the fire-resistant materials used in the power strip’s construction give me confidence in its safety and reliability.What really stands out is the surge protection capability, which has a minimum energy-absorbing capacity of 1080 Joules. This ensures that my devices are protected from unexpected power surges, which is crucial for safeguarding my electronics. The option to mount the power strip on the wall is a great space-saving feature that has helped keep my workspace clutter-free. Whether for home, office, or dorm use, this power strip is a practical and reliable choice.

product_name: Extension Cord 5FT, Surge Protector Power Strip with 8 Widely Outlets 4 USB Ports, Flat Plug, Wall Mount Outlet Extender, Multiple Outlets for Indoor Home Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: I ordered this off of Amazon Vine because i needed a few more plugs for my room. This has a surge protector and comes with extra USB ports for charging and powering devices. So that was a bonus.I will start by saying that I do feel the power bar feels a bit cheap and hollow compared to my other ones. It feels like thin plastic without much weight. My other ones are pretty solid. This one not so much.The bar comes with 4 plug sockets with 3 prong grounding and 4 with just 2 prong and no grounding. It also has 4 USB ports. One of them being Fast charging USB-C.It has some slots to fit it on the wall with screws. The main plug cord is very nice and braided. Feels strong and tough.  Looks pretty nice to. The plug head is a thicker style diagonal fitting one. Good for not blocking the other plug on your main wall socket. .All in all it is good. Seems to work. All the ports and plugs work. I have had no problems with it. Braided cord is a nice bonus. Thanks.

product_name: Extension Cord 5FT, Surge Protector Power Strip with 8 Widely Outlets 4 USB Ports, Flat Plug, Wall Mount Outlet Extender, Multiple Outlets for Indoor Home Office, Dorm Room Essentials
description: My experience has been good with this surge protector power bar. It is light in weight, the cord is durable, the sockets and USB charging ports provide firm connections, and they are operating as expected. The USB-C port even charges certain devices that other power bar USB-C charging ports failed to charge in the past. There isn't any CSA, ETL, or other type of certification stamped directly on the unit itself, but the grounded plug connector is stamped with ETL. I like how the USB-A ports light up blue when the power bar is turned on, making them very easy to locate in a not-so-well-lit room or under a desk.

description: All the ports are very handy for my work station, good quality for what I am using it for and does great keeping everything connected and working. The cable is very sturdy and the flat plug fits perfectly behind the dresser where that is the on;y place I have an outlet in that space.

product_name: DEPOW Travel Power Strip, Ultra Thin 5FT Braided Flat Extension Cord, Wall Mount Charging Station with 6 Outlets 3 USB Ports(1 USB C), 3-Side Outlet Extender for Cruise Ship, Travel, Dorm, Home Office
description: Able to charge multiple devices at the same time. It’s convenient to use and carry for traveling

product_name: DEPOW Travel Power Strip, Ultra Thin 5FT Braided Flat Extension Cord, Wall Mount Charging Station with 6 Outlets 3 USB Ports(1 USB C), 3-Side Outlet Extender for Cruise Ship, Travel, Dorm, Home Office
description: This power strip works as expected, and it has an ETL certification so it's safe.We've used it with 120V items and multiple types of USB plugs, and it's worked without any issues.Having a switch on it is very convenient, as are the outlets facing many directions.No complaints or issues.

product_name: DEPOW Travel Power Strip, Ultra Thin 5FT Braided Flat Extension Cord, Wall Mount Charging Station with 6 Outlets 3 USB Ports(1 USB C), 3-Side Outlet Extender for Cruise Ship, Travel, Dorm, Home Office
description: I travel often and always find myself in need of more power outlets.  I don't know why I haven't gotten one of these years earlier, but now that I have this, it really has already has gotten plenty of use.There really isn't much to say when reviewing a travel power strip other than it's small and light enough to easily fit in my small pouch of cables and such that I carry with me when I travel.  I like the braded cord which is easy to roll back up when I'm done.  Having two USB full sized adapters and 1 USB C built into the adapter is awesome - and there are SIX plugs, so that's plenty for my needs.Very happy with this adapter, and if you need one when traveling (especially if you are on a cruise ship) then you'll be glad you have one of these.

product_name: DEPOW Travel Power Strip, Ultra Thin 5FT Braided Flat Extension Cord, Wall Mount Charging Station with 6 Outlets 3 USB Ports(1 USB C), 3-Side Outlet Extender for Cruise Ship, Travel, Dorm, Home Office
description: There is an outlet in the bedroom that we can't use because it is being block by the bedframe.  This plug is very low profile that  fits perfectly into the tight space.  We can now charge our electric devices.  It is also good that it comes with USB port.

product_name: DEPOW Travel Power Strip, Ultra Thin 5FT Braided Flat Extension Cord, Wall Mount Charging Station with 6 Outlets 3 USB Ports(1 USB C), 3-Side Outlet Extender for Cruise Ship, Travel, Dorm, Home Office
description: Great power cord. It is compact and easy to travel with. I love how there are so many outlets. I also love the outlets for the phone or earbuds to charge. I like the power surge protection. Really nice power cord.

product_name: DEPOW Travel Power Strip, Ultra Thin 5FT Braided Flat Extension Cord, Wall Mount Charging Station with 6 Outlets 3 USB Ports(1 USB C), 3-Side Outlet Extender for Cruise Ship, Travel, Dorm, Home Office
description: The best compact cords for traveling. Esp at the airport when no port is easy to find to charge phone and laptop. Good charge performance and good quality plug in cord

product_name: DEPOW Travel Power Strip, Ultra Thin 5FT Braided Flat Extension Cord, Wall Mount Charging Station with 6 Outlets 3 USB Ports(1 USB C), 3-Side Outlet Extender for Cruise Ship, Travel, Dorm, Home Office
description: This is a light power strip, meant for travel.  As such, I am not sure why there are mounting screws included, as I don't think they would even work with the little mounting hole on the back anyways.  It is fairly light, but not any lighter than a larger power strip I recently ordered.  It is fairly small in terms of packabilityThe braided cord is nice, and it does come with a velcro band to keep it together (especially convenient for packing).  The outlets are nicely spaced, so it will handle several bulky plugs if needed, although maybe not 6 if they are really bulky.  It has two USB-A and one USB-C plugs, which is fine, as so many of my cords are still USB-A.  It does have an on/off/reset button, as well, for those power outages which are so frequent here.

product_name: DEPOW Travel Power Strip, Ultra Thin 5FT Braided Flat Extension Cord, Wall Mount Charging Station with 6 Outlets 3 USB Ports(1 USB C), 3-Side Outlet Extender for Cruise Ship, Travel, Dorm, Home Office
description: Excellent compact power strip. Great form factor. 6 3-prong power outlets. 2 USB-A ports, 1 USB-C port. When energized, there’s an amber light that’s nice during the day, but maybe too bright to use in a bedroom. Flat plug.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: I purchased this shredder about a year ago from my home office and it’s already dying.Typically, I shred a handful of items here and there through out the year, and then, once a year, I’ll shred a stack of documents to clean things up and make space for the coming year. My old shredder handled the load well—even if it could only do 1-3 pages at time—and lasted well over ten years.This shredder did great in the beginning. It handled the handful of pages here and there well. But when I started my annual purge the other week, it struggled to shred more than 1-2 pages at a time, over heated quickly, and the switch between settings broke when I tried to switch it on to auto. At least forward still works, but now the machine has to be unplugged to turn off and it can’t shred more than a handful of pages before the pages just stick in the machine while it’s still running.It worked great in the beginning, but it’s disappointing to have to replace something that’s barely a year old.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: EDIT: I decided to change my review to 3 stars because Bonsai customer service reached out to me after my review. After attempting to solve the problem they eventually sent me an all new shredder. So far that one seems to be working as designed to. I do appreciate the way that they reached out to me.Well I learned two things, you get what you pay for and I wish Amazon allowed a zero review. Actually this shredder may not have worked up to what I even paid. Worked great out of the box and continued to do so for about 90 days. At that point it would not do more than 2 sheets of thin paper at a time. About a month later the button on top broke so all of those features were gone. It was either on or unplugged. Now just a few days ago it seems one of the shredding wheels seized up (there were no jams or anything) which caused it to quit turning. I think Bonsaii will now be off my list of companies shop with. I expect to get longer than 6 months of working at all and 90 days of working like it is supposed to.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: This replaces a paper shredder that was at least 15 yrs old and finally became unreliable. This new Bonsaii does the shredding job like it's supposed to. However, there is something about it that I don't like. My old shredder had handles on the tank part sides so that when it was time to empty, it was easy to pick up. This new Bonsaii doesn't have handles, just slick sides, so it is not as easy to pick up to empty.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: I went with the Bonsaii brand because I had one previously that worked fine for 2 years.  Its was only for home office so it wasn't overused.  However, this particular model is EXTREMELY noisy and it sounds as though its on its last legs.  I do hope it lasts for at least 1 year!

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: Overall it’s functional, my only issue is that it overheats quickly. The capacity is small and it will fill quickly. Speed is okay, it’s power is fair.  I feel secure shredding my documents with it and that’s all one could ask for.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: I've had shedders in the past and this one is about the same as most.  Love the credit card shredding option and the cross cut function.  Pretty noisy I would say.  Overall a good product for the price point.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: This shredder is perfectly decent for light use. I attempted to use it to clear out a 2 drawer personal filing cabinet, single sheet by single sheet, and it last for a full 24 hours. So lighter use is ideal.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)

description: Bought this to replace my old shredder. It’s very loud and it seems to run a long time after the paper has disappeared. I should’ve spent more, but how do you know? i’m getting used to the loudness. I have noise sensitivity issues and it is one foot away from my chair. so its fine

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: Had no idea it was going to be so noisy.  If I can find a quiet micro cut, I will return this one.Do like compact size.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: If you want something that is like an electric vehicle then do buy it, it's not loud. Just like any other Shredder out there for sale, they all make noises. This one is actually quite than my old Fellow shredder and so far after "READING THE INSTRUCTIONS" I have not had a problem with it so far. I keep it below 6 sheets of paper and I make sure that any stickiness is covered when shredding and the instructions are clear "NO SHREDDING MEDAL". this is common in any shredders I have ever owned and if you want to shred medal all day and 50 pieces of paper then you need to buy the thousand-dollar product. Once again it's a decent product and does the job and again I follow the instructions that are given to me. For I want the product to last, some just don't have that common sense, and why they are having problems with theirs. Thus why the review is saying overheats and, making loud noises, or not lasting long, take care of the product and follow the instructions. The product will take care of you as well, if not and you want to go crazy well it's not going to last then

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: I love this shredder just the right size for a home office. This even shreds credit cards in the center part of the shredding mechanism. When it fills up I just take the top part off and it sets on it own waste receptacle. I place a plastic bag over it and flip it over and then everything is collected in the bag. Such as a Walmart or any plastic grocery bag you get at your local store you shop at will work. Great shredder for the money I've been using mine for 2 months and it works great no problems.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: My 12-sheet shredder just died one day. It was a heavy machine that sat atop a plastic basket and needed a good fit for the “actuating pin” to sit on this plastic receptacle bin. Over time, the weight of that shredder had cracked the bin and made everything unusable. No replacement for the bin available and superglue and duck tape just wasn’t working.I considered a new shredder that had a pull out bin, but after analyzing how much use (including number of sheets to feed into the machine at one time), cost, and overall weight of the machine, I realized a lightweight shredder might meet my needs. Good decision on my part.Excellent aspects:It is very lightweight machine that has an excellent and comfortable folding handle to lift it off the included basket. I have serious arthritis in both wrists and most fingers, and I can lift this off without any issues at all. It also easily seats right back into the correct position without any problems when put back onto the receptacle bin.It is pretty quiet when running.It has a window that clearly tells you when the bin is getting full, ensuring that you do not overfill and jam the machine. When full, the bin is easy to lift and dump its shredded pieces into  a larger trash bag. The pieces may get a little statically attached to the plastic bin, so try covering the opening of the bin with a trash bag before you invert the bin and then tap the aides of the bin to get all the shredded pieces into the trash bag. I still had to round up some “shred debris” that clung to the inside of basket or missed the bag…not big deal.Price was awesome!Average/neutral aspects:My previous shredder had a lock out mechanism that let me ensure the shredder could not be accidentally turned on if the main selector switch was unintentionally moved to the “on” position. This machine does not have such a feature. It has 4 positions: FWD (on with continuous shredder wheels engaged regardless of whether something is sensed in the shredder slot), AUTO (power on, but shredder wheels not engaged unless something is sensed in the shredder slot), REV (shredder wheels in constant motion, but pushing things back out of the feeder slot), and OFF (which powers down the machine, red power light goes off). As there is no “guard switch” to prevent accidental activation, I simply unplugged it when I am not using it for a time and if any small children/pets are around.It also has an overheat light if the motor os getting too hot from continuous or heavy load use.It is not top heavy, but still can be tipped over if you move or bump against it. I have it freestanding on the floor between a similar sized trash can and the side of my desk. I have had no problems with it tipping or moving during use.There is a credit card slot, and while the machine will “chew” these up, you can hear the machine slow and even see the credit card wobble as it is being shredded. Worked OK as I only shred a card or two annually.I would not place more than 3-4 sheets of regular paper in at one time as you can hear the machine slowing to shred that amount. I am sure it can do more, but I decided to simply be cautious. The machine does shred as quickly as most residential use machines, however.Note: The actual continuous run time on this machine is much better than advertised. I ran it for 10 minutes without any problems, although I was only inserting 1-2 sheets at a time, not the max they say you can at a time. No overheat light came one, albeit the top of the machine did become a little warm.Overall, very happy with this machine. It will only get used every couple of weeks and then for only about 15-20 sheets of paper or other junk ail (credit card mailings, credit card receipts, etc…

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: This shredder works really well I have shredded 3 garage bags of documents. product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: I have a large shredder for all the junk mail I get, but I needed a smaller version for my office, and this is perfect. It does not take up too much space, and the bucket collects a good amount of shredded material before needing to be emptied. It can shred up to 6 pieces of paper at a time. It's not too noisy, but it does make some noise.  There are forward and reverse settings as well as an auto setting.  For the price, it is a good buy in my opinion.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: Good product, but only shreds 3 sheets at a time, at least that's all the one I received does. For the price it's a great product!

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: This shredder does the job very well. The shredded paper is really small, almost like confetti. The noise is loud, but I have yet to find a quiet unit on the market.But what the heck is that residual glue left on the unit after I removed the protective wrapping tape? Everything sticks to it: the shredded paper, my fingers....... everything.  It won't come off. It's all along the top edge on one end of the basket and the plastic casing of the motor assembly. I tried soap, rubbing alcohol and even nail polish remover to rub it off, but the cotton ball, cloths and whatever I use to dab at it just adheres to the glue.  And it's extremely difficult to wash off my hands too.  I took off one star from my rating due to the aggravation this is causing me.

product_name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
description: This is really tiny - surprisingly so. I almost sent it back but thought, you know I’m gonna give it a try and I’m really glad I did. It’s perfect for me because as I look through my papers and sorting through them, I just shred one or two pages at a time. I also have some small bags that are just the right size so I don’t have to worry about emptying it. When the bag is full I can just pull it out. I took a picture with 8 1/2 x 11 paper so you can see how small it is. I don’t know how long it will hold up but I’m glad I got it and it’s a really great deal too.

description: I was looking for a cell phone stand for general purposes that I could take with me to work sites. This stand seems to have the right features. The unit was easy to use and had lots of power for many hours of operation.The main thing I liked was the solid feel and the stability. This cell phone stand resists tipping, and the phone can be placed on the stand in the profile or landscape positions. The phone holder can stretch or tilt a lot without affecting the stability of the stand. The unit also folds down into a compact shape for transport.The first thing I did not like was the need to use a power cord to charge the cell phone. I am used to wireless chargers even with my power banks. Cables and connectors wear out and can get tangled.The next thing I did not like was the sound quality. Yes, there is a lot of bass, but the rest of the sound is distorted. This speaker compares very poorly to other Bluetooth speakers I have had.Overall, this cell phone stand did not meet my expectations. The cost is a bit high for the value.

description: Both of these cables (2 in a package) have decent connectors at each end and work as expected.  I appreciate the cable length and the improvement in quality the cables provide when connecting my iPhone directly to to different off-brand, Bluetooth portable speakers I have, as opposed to connecting to the speakers via BT.  The direct cable connection eliminates BT buzzing provides a feasible solution for low-volume listening with cheap BT speakers.The one thing I do not like is the cable retains the coil shape it had when packaged.  In other words, the cable doesn't lay flat or hang/drape nicely, but instead stubbornly retains its coil shape.  I've had the cable unpackaged and extended for a couple of days and it has relaxed a bit, so I'm hoping it will relax fully at some point, but I have my doubts.

product_name: Aux Cord for iPhone 16, 3.3ft USB Type C to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Aux Audio Cable for Car Home Stereo Headphone Speaker Compatible with iPhone 16/16 Plus/16 Pro/16 Pro Max/15/15 Plus/15 Pro/15 Pro Max
description: I am reviewing the product "[Apple MFi Certified] Aux Cord for iPhone, 2 Pack Lightning to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Adapter " on 15 October, 2024.Ever since 2016, when Apple stopped including headphone jacks on iPhones, an accessory cable like this has been a requirement to get analog audio out of an iPhone. I recently found myself needing one in a situation where I was aligning a vintage audio tape recorder. To do this, I needed a signal generator to produce specific audio frequencies for testing and calibration. I didn’t have a dedicated signal generator but found an iPhone app that could accomplish the task. But my tape recorder, which was manufactured decades before bluetooth audio was conceived, required audio input through its RCA stereo jacks.That’s when I ordered this product. It works exactly as advertised, connecting easily to the iPhone’s Lightning port and delivering analog audio via a (formerly) standard 1/8" stereo TRS jack. Et, voila! I now had my signal generator connected directly to the tape recorder.The nylon-braided cable seems quite durable, and I expect it will serve me for many years to come. At two cables per order, this represents a fine value. I can recommend this product without hesitation to anyone needing analog audio output from a late-model iPhone.

product_name: Aux Cord for iPhone 16, 3.3ft USB Type C to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Aux Audio Cable for Car Home Stereo Headphone Speaker Compatible with iPhone 16/16 Plus/16 Pro/16 Pro Max/15/15 Plus/15 Pro/15 Pro Max
description: I'm using this cord to hook my iPhone 14 to an old iPod speaker that only has an aux input jack. It works great. The sound comes through nice and clear with no buzz or static, unlike other cords I've used. The cord itself is thick and sturdy, yet flexible, and the connectors at each end are attached securely. 2 cords are included, so I have a spare to use if I lose one.

product_name: Aux Cord for iPhone 16, 3.3ft USB Type C to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Aux Audio Cable for Car Home Stereo Headphone Speaker Compatible with iPhone 16/16 Plus/16 Pro/16 Pro Max/15/15 Plus/15 Pro/15 Pro Max
description: Hard to beat the price here. my old corvette has an aux jack as does my 1998 frontier. for just a few bucks I now have the ability to stream phone to car audio. No complaints on sound quality, but be warned that both these have stock sound systems that are not great sso if you have a higher end system not sure how clear things will be as i have no experience there. For the layman end user though sounds good to my ears.

product_name: Aux Cord for iPhone 16, 3.3ft USB Type C to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Aux Audio Cable for Car Home Stereo Headphone Speaker Compatible with iPhone 16/16 Plus/16 Pro/16 Pro Max/15/15 Plus/15 Pro/15 Pro Max
description: This is a really well made durable braided auxiliary cord for a connection between lightning and a 3.5mm headphone jack.  It is really useful to plug in a headphone to your I-Phone.  It works as it should!

product_name: Aux Cord for iPhone 16, 3.3ft USB Type C to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Aux Audio Cable for Car Home Stereo Headphone Speaker Compatible with iPhone 16/16 Plus/16 Pro/16 Pro Max/15/15 Plus/15 Pro/15 Pro Max
description: There isn't much you can say about a cord. It either works or doesn't. These work fine. No problems with sound.
